[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde wa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D231}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rad na me g+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_/
[\[1b.2\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri la dge 
[\[1b.3\]]slong bdun khri nyis stong gi/_dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par 
[\[1b.4\]]gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_bur bor ba/_bdag 
[\[1b.5\]]gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]son pa/_chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/_chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_sems rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/_legs par rab tu byung ba/_legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/_brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_
[\[2a.2\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/_
[\[2a.3\]]thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/_chags pa med pa'i 
[\[2a.4\]]gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa/_mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/_lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa/_sgrib pa dang /_chod pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/_byams 
[\[2a.5\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/_smon lam la gnas pa 
[\[2a.6\]]thams cad dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa ye shes mtha' yas pa/_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/_sems ri'i rgyal po ri rab 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]ltar mi sgul ba/_sems pad ma ltar ma gos pa/_sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa/_sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal dang /_lag na rdo rje 
[\[2b.2\]]rin po che dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_rin po che'i cod pan dang /_gtsug na rin po che dang /_rin po che brtsegs pa dang /_rin po che 'byung gnas dang /_rin po che'i rtse mo dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rdo rje'i snying po dang /_gser gyi snying po dang /_rin po 
[\[2b.3\]]che'i snying po dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_dge ba'i snying po dang /_dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /_ye shes kyi snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang /_pad ma'i snying po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /_
[\[2b.4\]]kun tu zla ba dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_kun nas mig dang /_pad ma'i mig dang /_dri ma med pa'i mig dang /_yangs pa'i mig dang /_kun tu spyod lam dang /_kun tu mdzes dang /_kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros 
[\[2b.5\]]dang /_ye shes kyi blo gros dang /_chos kyi blo gros dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_khyad par bla gros dang /_seng ge rnam par rol pa dang /_sgra chen po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs dang /_sgra dbyangs brjod pa 
[\[2b.6\]]zab mo sgrogs dang /_gos pa med dang /_dri ma kun bral dang /_zla ba'i 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_ye shes kyi 'od dang /_ye shes kyi dpal dang /_bzang po'i dpal dang /_zla ba'i dpal dang /_pad ma'i dpal dang /_rin po che'i dpal dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[2b.7\]]dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /_byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu shin tu gnod bral la la sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu kun tu dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu shin tu 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul 
[\[3a.2\]]dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug 
[\[3a.3\]]chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang /_stobs can dang /_nor sbyin dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong du ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_gzi can dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]mtha' yas dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang /_dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma dang /_klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[3a.5\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug tu skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang gang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[3a.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis ma gang bar gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam/_bar snang gi phyogs de med do/_/'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad gcig_/kho ra 
[\[3a.7\]]khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos bu du ma ni bting /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas ni bla re bres/_dar gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma ni dpyangs/_me tog sil mas ni gtor ba zhig bshams te/_seng ge'i khri de'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de dngos rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag mthil 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ltar mnyam pa dang /_chag chag legs par btab pa dang /_phyag dar legs par byas pa dang /_dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir phyogs de na gser gyi pad ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/_'dab ma brgya stong 
[\[3b.2\]]du ma yod pa/_chu ba ni bai dUr+ya/_snying po ni in dra nI la/_ze ba ni asma gar b+ha ste/_dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to/_/seng ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhir ha cang yang mi ring /_ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad phyed dang 
[\[3b.3\]]gnyis/_sboms su rgyang grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so/_/seng ge'i khri legs par bshams pa de la bcom ldan 'das blo ni rab tu rnam par dag_/chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/_'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni ma gos la mi 
[\[3b.4\]]bsnyengs shing mi 'dzem ste/_seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa/_mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dang ba/_rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing gting dpag dka' la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/_nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/_zla ba 
[\[3b.5\]]ltar rab tu sim pa/_klu chen po ltar chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa/_tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/_slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[3b.6\]]brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs ma dud par bzhugs te/_'khor tshogs pa de na lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer 
[\[3b.7\]]gyi 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/_de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/_phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsums par yang mi mngon no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du/_de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs 
[\[4a.2\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_bye ma'i phung po la mar ram 'bru mar ram/_chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/_de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon no/_/de nas shar phyogs 
[\[4a.3\]]su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_pad ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[4a.4\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste/_theg pa gcig las brtsams nas chos ston te/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[4a.5\]]zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dang /_mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[4a.6\]]de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_zas kyi bya ba yang mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 
[\[4a.7\]]kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang /_chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gza' dang /_skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtswa dang /_shing dang /_bong ba dang /_rtsig pa dang /_ri la sogs pa yang mi snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na byang 
[\[4b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba zhig gnas te/_de 'od des reg ste bskul nas/_rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[4b.3\]]pad ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang /_rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_bcom 
[\[4b.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pad ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las 
[\[4b.5\]]langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4b.6\]]'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa/_yid du mchi ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid par byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[4b.7\]]rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa tsam 
[\[5a.2\]]gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/_des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa/_rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba/_lus dang sems shin tu rnam par dga' bar byed pa 'di phyung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[5a.3\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[5a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[5a.5\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog shig ces 
[\[5a.6\]]smon lam btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ma yin no/_/
[\[5a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu thos so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa yang yin la phyir ldog pa yang yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar/_gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags la/_phyir ldog 
[\[5b.2\]]pa yang lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pas/_sems can de dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung ston to/_/mtshan thos pa kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi 
[\[5b.3\]]ldog par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/_de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/_sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/_myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i 
[\[5b.4\]]bar du rkyen rnams yod na/_rigs kyi bu sa bon de la ji skad ces bya/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/_de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[5b.5\]]sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[5b.6\]]sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_btsun 
[\[5b.7\]]par bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_bkur sti bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod song shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi 
[\[6a.2\]]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_btsun par bgyi ba dang /_ri mor bgyi ba dang /_bkur sti bgyi ba 
[\[6a.3\]]dang /_mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod deng shig_/'jig rten gyi khams der 
[\[6a.4\]]bag yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag ni rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/_zhe sdang mang ba/_gti mug mang ba/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_phar mi shes pa/_mar mi 
[\[6a.5\]]shes pa/_chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba/_brlang ba/_gtum pa/_zhe gcod pa/_mu cor smra ba/_pho theg can/_g.yengs pa/_brkam pa/_le lo can/_ngan pa'i ngang tshul can/_sdig pa'i chos can/_phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su dkris pa/_nyon mongs 
[\[6a.6\]]pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te/_sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[6a.7\]]dka' ba mdzad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin te/_gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang de lta bur kun nas nyon 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci mtshar kyi/_gang dag de ltar kun 
[\[6b.2\]]nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang dad pa rnyed pa dang /_se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_se gol gtogs pa 
[\[6b.3\]]srid du yang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste/_spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to/_/de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to/_/de bas kyang gang dag se gol 
[\[6b.4\]]gtogs pa srid du yang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[6b.5\]]de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu 'thun pa'i rjes su bstan pa de mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo 
[\[6b.6\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo /_/dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/_'bras bu dang bcas pa/_chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/_la las ni bai dUr+ya'i shing rnams/_
[\[6b.7\]]la las ni shel gyi shing rnams/_la las ni dpag bsam gyi shing rnams/_la las ni gser gyi shing rnams/_la las ni me tog gi shing rnams/_la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams/_la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/_la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams/_la las ni spos kyi 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]sprin rnams/_la las ni phreng ba'i sprin rnams/_la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams/_la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/_la las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/_la las ni sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul te/_mngon par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus 
[\[7a.2\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[7a.3\]]so/_/kye ma'o grogs po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo/_/de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[7a.4\]]chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[7a.5\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang ba/_dri ma med pa/_rnam par dag pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang /_gang 
[\[7a.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/_bde zhing 
[\[7a.7\]]khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang /_gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang /_zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lam me/_lhan ne lhang nger ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/_gang der skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi 
[\[7b.2\]]ri rnams dang /_khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang /_ri btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang /_de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang /_blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/_'og tu ni mnar med pa'i sems can 
[\[7b.3\]]dmyal ba chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/_/de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas 
[\[7b.4\]]zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob/_btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/_gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni bzhon pa/_nor 'dod pa rnams ni nor thob/_long ba rnams ni mig thob/_'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/_sgren mo rnams ni gos can 
[\[7b.5\]]du gyur/_smyos pa rnams ni dran pa thob/_sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur/_sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/_/de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 
[\[7b.6\]]yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba der nye ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs par kun tu snang ngo /_/steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/
[\[7b.7\]]lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang /_lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang /_lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang /_lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang /_lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang /_lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang /_lha'i chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi sprin gyi 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]char mngon par rab tu bab bo/_/de dag mngon par rab tu bab pas sems can gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/_yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri la shing tha mal pa dang /_sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par snang 
[\[8a.2\]]ngo /_/sa phyogs de dag na rin po che'i shing rnams dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang /_me tog gi shing rnams dang /_'bras bu'i shing rnams dang /_tsan dan gyi shing rnams dang /_a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/_de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to/_/
[\[8a.3\]]bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dag sgra 'byin cing /_sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo /_/lum bi'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa/_/mnyam med gzhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur/_/nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du/_/
[\[8a.4\]]ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing dbang drung /_/bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nas sangs rgyas pa/_/dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang /_/chu zla 
[\[8a.5\]]'dra bar gang gis rtogs gyur pa/_/bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang /_/gar mkhan tshon 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa/_/mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo 
[\[8a.6\]]mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni/_/thugs rje'i thugs kyis tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa/_/dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang /_/lha 
[\[8a.7\]]yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa/_/gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/gang gis mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing /_/thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang /_/mnyam med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid/_/pad ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa/_/yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du/_/ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/_/mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su 
[\[8b.2\]]dag pa'i sku/_/dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang /_/yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du/_/bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[8b.3\]]chen po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos sngon ma mthong 
[\[8b.4\]]ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[8b.5\]]snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so/_/'tsho'o/_/gzhes so/_/chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[8b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu mi mjed 
[\[8b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bdar te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[9a.2\]]'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/grags chen shes rab chen po pa/_/thub chen dpa' bo chen po pa/_/srid pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po/_/nyon mongs rgal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[9a.3\]]thams cad du yang tha le ste/_/kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs/_/kun nas rnam par grol ba po/_/phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la/_/rab tu mi sgul ri bo bzhin/_/gting tshod yangs pa rgya mtsho 'dra/_/mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod pa/_/chos rgyal khyod la 
[\[9a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa/_/rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan/_/la la la ni lam yang bstan/_/la la yang dag nyid la bkod/_/la la yang dag mya ngan bzlas/_/la la byang chub 
[\[9a.5\]]lung yang bstan/_/bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen/_/khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med/_/de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams/_/gzigs pas khyod kyi bka' 'grub bo/_/byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams 
[\[9a.6\]]kyang /_/khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs/_/rgal nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing /_/grol nas skye dgu grol mdzad de/_/srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi/_/'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so/_/srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag_/yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams/_/
[\[9a.7\]]sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod/_/gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang /_/thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs/_/dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na/_/'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad ma'i snying 
[\[9b.2\]]po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[9b.3\]]btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/
[\[9b.4\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phyes/_de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris 
[\[9b.5\]]shig dang /_dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[9b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan 
[\[9b.7\]]phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs 
[\[10a.2\]]pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na zla ba lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na nyi ma lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/_ji 
[\[10a.3\]]ltar na pad ma lta bu rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[10a.4\]]blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/_ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/_ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/_
[\[10a.5\]]ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[10a.6\]]ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba 
[\[10a.7\]]rnams lags/_ji ltar na byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/_ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/_ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na skye ba dran pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams 
[\[10b.2\]]lags/_ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_ji ltar na lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[10b.3\]]dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams lags/_ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na lam ma log par ston pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams lags/_bcom 
[\[10b.4\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na phying pa can rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na stan gcig 
[\[10b.5\]]pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na zas phyis mi len pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na shing drung pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bla gab med pa pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na dur khrod pa rnams lags/_
[\[10b.6\]]ji ltar na cog pu pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/_ji ltar 
[\[10b.7\]]na ma mo 'dzin pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa 
[\[11a.2\]]rnams lags/_ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na bdag shes pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/_ji ltar na 
[\[11a.3\]]mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye/_ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams 
[\[11a.4\]]lags/_ji ltar na bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na mang du thos pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/_ji ltar na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang 
[\[11a.5\]]'jig rten skyong bas bstsu ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal 'tshal ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na des pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'grogs na bde ba rnams lags/_
[\[11a.6\]]ji ltar na bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams lags/_ji ltar na bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/_
[\[11a.7\]]ji ltar na sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi 
[\[11b.2\]]don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems 
[\[11b.3\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa 
[\[11b.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_
[\[11b.5\]]mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[11b.6\]]rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/_shes kyi khe 'dod 
[\[11b.7\]]pa'i phyir ma yin/_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/_gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/_chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston to/_/ji ltar rgyal po'am 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]blon po chen po la yang dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa'am/_gdol bu la yang yang dag par ston na/_de ma yin pa grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi gzhan dag la lta ci smos/_chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[12a.2\]]dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang /_mtshon cha bor ba yin te/_gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de 
[\[12a.3\]]nyid la gzhog go/_/de sems can thams cad la phar 'du shes pa yin/_mar 'du shes pa yin/_bur 'du shes pa yin/_gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/_nye du'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 'di snyam du 
[\[12a.4\]]sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyod kyi pha'am/_ma 'am bu'am/_gnyen bshes sam/_nye du'am/_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu med do zhes gsungs so 
[\[12a.5\]]snyam nas/_de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/_srog chags chen po che ba gzhan dag la lta ci smos te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang 
[\[12a.6\]]zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i las rab tu byed pa mthong na/_de dag zang zing gis sdud cing /_zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste/_dge ba'i gnas su 'god do/_/
[\[12a.7\]]de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/_de bas na bdag gis de bzhin 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i 
[\[12b.2\]]sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa yang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/_phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/_don gyi phyir ma yin/_g.yog gi phyir ma yin/_'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi/_gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/_gang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[12b.3\]]sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no snyam ste/_de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhis phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji 
[\[12b.4\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_gcer bu dang /_gos ngan pa dang /_bgo ba ngan pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_dpung gnyen 
[\[12b.5\]]med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_rten med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/_de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu skyed cing /_de 'di snyam du sems te sems can gang dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[12b.6\]]bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba/_mgon med pa/_dpung gnyen med pa/_skyabs med pa/_gnas med pa/_rten med pa 'di dag yin te/_kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_
[\[12b.7\]]rten du 'gyur snyam nas/_de snying rjes rab tu mi bzad de/_bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so/_/phan btags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/_brnyas shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_nyon mongs shing 
[\[13a.2\]]sbyin pa mi sbyin/_phyug pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/_grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/_ci sbyin pa de yang bsti stang du byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin 
[\[13a.3\]]par byed do/_/ri mor byas te mchod cing rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[13a.4\]]dpas slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma lta bu dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/_lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/_sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/_des gus pa bskyed/_ri mo bskyed nas gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[13a.5\]]bstsu ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'dud pa'i las dag byed do/_/de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la yang grogs su 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang /_
[\[13a.6\]]rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la 
[\[13a.7\]]spos sam/_me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_byug pa'am/_skyong nul lam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do/_/ji ltar na chos la bya bdag byed ce na/_de chos nyan to/_/klog go/_/'chang ngo /_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]yi ger 'dri'o/_/kha ton byed do/_/kun chub par byed do/_/sems so/_/ma log par sgom pa'i sbyor bas goms par byed de/_de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed do/_/ji ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/_de gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i rkyen 
[\[13b.2\]]sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang /_chung ngu na chu grang mo khyor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/_de ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa 
[\[13b.3\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/_sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha'am lha la la zhig tu shog shig ce'am/_rgyal po'am rgyal po la la zhig tu shog shig ces de ltar sems mi skyed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin 
[\[13b.4\]]pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te de sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang /_
[\[13b.5\]]sbyin pa de dang de la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/_/de de ltar so sor rtog pa la gang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes pa dang /_sbyin pa'i dri ma dang /_sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[13b.6\]]no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas 
[\[13b.7\]]bsdams pa rnams yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_las kyi 'jigs pa rnams yin/_kha na 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/_'jigs par lta ba rnams yin/_yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/_mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar 
[\[14a.2\]]na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde'am/_'dul ba'am/_gnas gang yang rung ba la la dag tu bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan 
[\[14a.3\]]pa'o snyam du sems te/_gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slob kyi/_rigs la 'dod chags pas ma yin/_lta ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/_'khor la 'dod chags pas ma yin/_gang zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ri mo byed pa ma yin te/_
[\[14a.4\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis ni/_bdag gis bla 
[\[14a.5\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la bdag gis 
[\[14a.6\]]bslab par bya'o zhes rnam par dpyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/_dus 
[\[14a.7\]]ma yin par mi spyod/_yul ma yin par mi spyod/_dus ma yin par mi smra ba yin/_dus mi shes pa ma yin/_yul mi shes pa ma yin/_tshod mi shes pa ma yin te/_de sems can rjes su bsrung ba dang /_bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]phun sum tshogs shing 'jam par smra ba dang /_dal bus smra ba dang /_'du 'dzi mi mang ba dang /_rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang /_bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[14b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa'i bslab pa'i gnas de dag la gus par byed pa yin/_brtson par byed pa yin te/_de ltar na 
[\[14b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba'am/_zhe sdang gis 
[\[14b.4\]]yongs su gdung ba'am/_gti mug gis yongs su gdung ba'am/_nyon mongs pas yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la'am/_yo byad kyis phongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/_de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la rten cing 'dod 
[\[14b.5\]]chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo /_/'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na/_mi sdug pa sgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o/_/yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen to/_/mi sdug pa bsgom pa de gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[14b.6\]]lta ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_rngul dang /_dri ma dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rtsa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_snying dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_pho ba dang /_sul [{]mangs [,]mang [}]
[\[14b.7\]]dang /_long ka dang /_lgang pa dang /_mtsher pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchil ma dang /_rdul dang /_snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_gcin 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]dag kyang yod de/_dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas/_'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed 
[\[15a.2\]]na/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba yin no/_/yul gyi bzang mo de gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpas chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med gzugs bzang ba/_yid du 'ong ba/_
[\[15a.3\]]mdzes pa/_mig tu sdug pa/_sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de lta bu dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/_byung nas med par 'gyur ba yin na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la 
[\[15a.4\]]'dod chags skyed par byed ces gsungs so snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo /_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong 
[\[15a.5\]]zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la byams pa mang ba yin te/_de gzhi gang dang rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang /_khon du 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang /_rkyen de dag yongs su spangs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang 
[\[15a.6\]]gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing /_gti mug skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/_de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gti mug dang bral 
[\[15a.7\]]bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam/_yo byad ma 'byor kyang yongs su yi 'chad pa med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]sems dpa' gcig pu lkog tu song ste/_rab tu dben pa na gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/_bdag ni rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o/_/dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gzhan dag ni kun kyang 
[\[15b.2\]]'dres par gnas pa/_'du 'dzi mang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyis 'jigs pa yin zhe na/_'di 
[\[15b.3\]]la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams bsod nams dag gus par bya'o/_/tshul khrims gus par bsrung ngo /_/shes rab gus par bsgom mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod pa dang /_'thad pa dang /_
[\[15b.4\]]dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do/_/de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyis 'jigs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na 
[\[15b.5\]]ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta zhing sdig pa chung ngu yang khyad du mi gsod pa yin te/_de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag dug chung ngus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dug chen 
[\[15b.6\]]pos kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sdig pa chung ngus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do/_/sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do zhes gsungs so snyam du sems te/_de de ltar yongs su rtog pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[15b.7\]]sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang /_gser dang nor bu dang /_mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang byi ru la sogs pa nor dang /_yo byad kyi rnam pa dag 'debs kyang /_de la byang 
[\[16a.2\]]chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi skyed do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi'am/_dge 'dun gyi dngos po'i phyir las su bskos na yang dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'tsho ste/_de 'di snyam du sems shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas ni bdag gi lus las sha 
[\[16a.3\]]zos kyang bla'i gzhan gyi zas sam/_skom 'am/_yo byad kyi rnam pa gang ci yang rung ba dag ma byin la/_ma gnang bar spyad pa ni mi rung ngo zhes gsungs so snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la 
[\[16a.4\]]brtan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis gtses sam/_nor dang /_'khrig pa'i yan lag gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[16a.5\]]na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung na/_tshul khrims 'dis bdag lhar shog shig ce 'am/_lha la lar shog shig ce 'am/_rgyal por shog shig ce 'am/_rgyal po la lar shog shig ces sems mi skyed 
[\[16a.6\]]de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/_ngag dang yid kyis yongs su dag pa 
[\[16a.7\]]yin te/_ji ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_de gang lus kyis ngan du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_lus kyis ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/_de 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/_/ji ltar na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_de gang 'di dag ngag gis ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_ngag gis ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_
[\[16b.2\]]tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa ste/_de ltar na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no/_/ji ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_de gang 'di dag yid kyis ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[16b.3\]]ste/_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba'o/_/de ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[16b.4\]]tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_
[\[16b.5\]]chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum 
[\[16b.6\]]tshogs pa rnams yin/_rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod 
[\[16b.7\]]pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di nang gi mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la yongs su yi mi 'chad de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las smos pa 'am/_pha las smos pa 'am/_nye du las smos pa 'am/_mkhan po las smos pa 'am/_slob 
[\[17a.2\]]dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lam ngan du brjod pa dang /_ngan du smras pa pha rol las thos sam/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun la mi snyan pa brjod pa thos na/_mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la khon du mi 'dzin te/_de bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/_
[\[17a.3\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyud chad pa/_mtshams 
[\[17a.4\]]sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba bsdur med pa 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad thog ma nas zhi ba'o/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur te/_de 'di ltar chos 'di dag ma shes sam ma thos par ni bla na med pa 
[\[17a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/snyam du sems te/_de'i phyir gang chos de dag 'dzin pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_mos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 
[\[17a.6\]]bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/_gnod sems kyi bsam pa skyes na/_'di ltar khra ba 'di gang nas byung /_gang du 'gag_/
[\[17a.7\]]gang las 'byung /_ji ltar 'byung /_ji'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/_des de ltar yongs su brtags na/_khra ba'i skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'gag pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gang las skye ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ji ltar skye ba de 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rkyen gang gis skye ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la kun nas ldang ba mi mang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 
[\[17b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin par bzod la mtshan mo mi bzod pa'am/_mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa'am/_bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi bzod pa'am/_gzhan gyi yul na 
[\[17b.3\]]bzod la bdag gi yul na mi bzod pa'am/_bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa'am/_mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni dus thams cad du'ang bzod/_yul thams cad du'ang bzod/_thams cad la'ang bzod pa 
[\[17b.4\]]yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha dang /_ma dang bla ma dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang nye du 'am snag gi 
[\[17b.5\]]gnyen mtshams la bzod la/_gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan chad la yang bzod de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta 
[\[17b.6\]]ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin/_'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/_phan thogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/_'jig rten gyi tshul gyis ma yin/_ngo tsha bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par yang 
[\[17b.7\]]bzod pa mang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' nam de la khro ba skye ba'i rkyen gang gis zil 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gyis non na/_khu tshur gyis 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/_thal mos 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/_dbyig pas rdeg par 'gyur ba'am/_mtshon gyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/_mi gtsigs pa'i tshig gis don du brjod pa de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/_
[\[18a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te la la zhig gis brdegs sam/_bsdigs sam/_spyos sam/_brgyad na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di dag byas te/_bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/mas ma byas/_phas ma byas/_nye du dang /_
[\[18a.3\]]snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/_las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/_de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur gyi/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[18a.4\]]la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nang gi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o/_/de de ltar ma log par rtogs pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen/_
[\[18a.5\]]de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/_rnam par ma dkrugs kyang bzod de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18a.6\]]rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po phyug cing nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por gyur la/_de la sems can de dag gis mi snyan par brjod kyang rung /_kyal kyang rung /_gtses kyang rung ste/_mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/_bdag por 
[\[18a.7\]]gyur pa lta bur mi ston gyi/_gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bzung ba ste/_sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang par bya ba yin la/_de ltar yongs su bsrung ba na/_brlag par bya ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o zhes/_de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gzhag ste/_bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems 
[\[18b.2\]]dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can rnams bsgral 
[\[18b.3\]]bar bgyi'o zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags kyis/_de ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dul ba dang /_zhi ba la rab tu dgod par brtson la/_bdag nyid khro ba mang ba dang /_gnod sems mang ba dang /_mi bzod pa mang 
[\[18b.4\]]ba dang /_phog snya med pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sman pa thur ma can zhig yod la/_sems can rnams kyang rab rib kyis ldongs par gyur na/_sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi rab rib kyi skyon bsal bar bya'o/_/
[\[18b.5\]]zhes bsams la/_de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang ldongs par gyur na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_ji ga sman pa des sems can de dag gi rab rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[18b.6\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs pa'i gti mug gi dri ma shes rab kyi mig gis bsal bar 'dod la/_bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/_de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du 
[\[18b.7\]]len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//_//
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams 
[\[19a.2\]]yin/_mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[19a.3\]]brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/_snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/_rigs 
[\[19a.4\]]kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par 
[\[19a.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/_de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig to can 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' de la rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ngas kyang sems can gyi 
[\[19a.6\]]khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan la bzla ba dang /_ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 
[\[19a.7\]]brtsams te/_de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang 'drid pa'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma shes so/_/rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bye ba du ma nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyis/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlog shig_/don med par nyon mongs pa la sten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing kyal ka byed kyang /_de la 
[\[19b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka byed par 'dod do snyam ste/_des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/_sdig can khyod bya ba nyung ngu gyis shig_/'jig rten gyi sko sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/_sdig can bcom ldan 
[\[19b.3\]]'das kyis kyang las bdag gir bya ba ni 'jig rten pa yin te/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o/_/las kyi skye gnas pa'o/_/las la rton pa'o zhes gsungs te/_sdig can khyod kyang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las la 
[\[19b.4\]]rton pa yin gyis/_sdig can khyod gang nas/_'ongs pa'i lam nas song shig_/nga la kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring por don med pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o/_/bdud sdig can de yang bdag gi sems ni sems kyis tshor bar rig nas yibs 
[\[19b.5\]]yibs te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te dad pa dang dbral bar byas kyang mi 'gyur/_mi 'jum/_zhum par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can yin 
[\[19b.6\]]no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su 
[\[19b.7\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro/_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/_de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing /_sdig pa mi 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems 
[\[20a.2\]]dpa' ha cang brtun ngas pa'am/_ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ha cang brtun ngas pa'i brtson 'grus ni yab yab por 'gyur/_ha cang zhan pa ni le lor 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can 
[\[20a.3\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar 
[\[20a.4\]]mi snang ba dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid de yang bdag la yod par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de ltar 
[\[20a.5\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gser ram/_nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge ste/_de ni 
[\[20a.6\]]a la la 'bar ba'i gser ro/_/a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/_le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/
[\[20a.7\]]snyom las ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/zas la tshod mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/bdag mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/tshul ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/_/'du 'dzi ni 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/_de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang /_brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la med pa yin te/_de'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang /_'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su byang ba yin no/_/
[\[20b.2\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_ci nas kyang lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems skyo 
[\[20b.3\]]bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_de ltar rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 
[\[20b.4\]]'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/_gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa/_byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang 'thun pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub tu 'brang ba de dag 'phel 
[\[20b.5\]]ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_yangs par 'gyur te/_de la mi dge ba'i sems skye ba phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi skye na che ba lta ci smos te/_de ni rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[20b.6\]]sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig man ra med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang bar gyur la/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[20b.7\]]de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig cig sdug bsngal zhing /_skyabs med/_mgon med de/_gnas dang /_rten med pa zhig yod na'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de la rkang gis 'bogs te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas sems can gcig po de thar bar bya 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bar bdag spro na sdug bsngal phal lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin 
[\[21a.2\]]pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mir gyur pas ni byang chub thob par dka' ste/_bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni chung shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/_byang chub ni 
[\[21a.3\]]mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po/_bskal pa stong phrag mang po/_bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang por bsgrub dgos pas bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bskur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/_byang chub sems dpas ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[21a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba dang /_lam 'di dang 'dra ba dang /_brtson 
[\[21a.5\]]'grus 'di dang 'dra bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/_bdag ci 
[\[21a.6\]]nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang /_sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar btsal lo 'bad do/_/bdag sems can 
[\[21a.7\]]thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na brtson 'grus de'i ro myong bar mi byed de/_brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi smod/_bdag la mi stod de/_de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las la 
[\[21b.2\]]brtson pas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang 
[\[21b.3\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/_skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/_mang du thos pa rnams yin/_ma log par gdams 
[\[21b.4\]]ngag bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/_dbang po rno ba rnams yin/_sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/_de la ma zhen pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[21b.5\]]de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags shing tshe rabs tha dad pa de dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/_
[\[21b.6\]]de bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/_de skyes nas kyang rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur 
[\[21b.7\]]te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam/_byang chub sems dpa' dag go/_/de skyes na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms pas 'di ltar dpyod de/_kye ma skye dgu 'di ni sdug 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bsngal ba'o/_/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni nyam thag pa'o/_/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni na ba'o/_/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni mi gnas pa'o/_/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'o/_/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni gti mug gis ldongs pa'o/_/de'ang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i
