[\[22a.2\]]phyir te/_de bas na 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni bdag gi mi cha'i/_'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams 
[\[22a.3\]]ni gsal shing lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni mtshon shag ti lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni ral gri'i so lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni rul pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams 
[\[22a.4\]]ni dri nga ba'o zhes gsungs so snyam ste/_de de ltar skyo nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa 'thob par bya ba dang /_khong du ma chud pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_mngon 
[\[22a.5\]]du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/_/de de'i rgyu de de'i rkyen de'i gzhis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i thos pa 'dzin to/_/de gnyis ka la yang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par bsgom mo/_/
[\[22a.6\]]gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la 'jug ste/_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_
[\[22a.7\]]yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/des lam khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang /_dbang po gsal ba dang /_de shes pa'i dbang po can yin no/_/de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'i dbang 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]po can yin pas dben pa mang ba yin te/_de 'du ba thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_'du 'dzi thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/smra ba la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog 
[\[22b.2\]]pa dang /_lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dang /_rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/_de sems la 'di snyam 
[\[22b.3\]]du bdag gis sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/_de ste mi dge ba'am/_'on tam lung du ma bstan pa'am/_chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyod de/_gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_mos pa skyed do/_/dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[22b.4\]]lta ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/'on te mi dge ba la spyod na de la skyo ba mang ba dang /_rtog pa mang ba yin te/_mi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson pa yin no/_/mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[22b.5\]]mug go/_/de la 'dod chags rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/_chen po dang /_'bring po dang /_chung ngu'o/_/de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/_gang lus thams cad du khyab ste/_sems kun nas bzung zhing gnas pa dang /_gang gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 
[\[22b.6\]]sems mi 'thob pa ste/_de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang /_'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur te/_ji ltar na ngo tsha ba dang /_'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med pa yin zhe na/_de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/_de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/_de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog 
[\[22b.7\]]cing /_de nyid la legs par shin tu smon pa dang /_de nyid la yang yon tan du lta ba yin te/_de ltar na de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis pha ma'am/_bla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang /_rtsod cing phyir bzlogs pa dang /_rgol bar 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]byed cing des ngo mi tsha la de la yon tan du lta ba yin te/_de ltar na de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin te/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de ni 'dod chags chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dod chags 'bring po gang zhe na/_gang gis 'dod pa 
[\[23a.2\]]rnams la sten par gyur na bya ba grub kyi bar du sten gyi/_bya ba grub nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang /_'gyod pa 'thob pa dang /_sems la mi chab 'thob pa ste/_de ni 'dod chags 'bring po zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dod chags chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang gis 'dod pa rnams 
[\[23a.3\]]la sten par gyur kyang mnams pa dang /_byugs pa dang /_lus kyis reg pa tsam 'am/_tshig tu smra ba tsam 'am/_mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod chags chung ngu zhes bya'o/_/mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i sems su gyur pa ste de ni 'dod chags zhes 
[\[23a.4\]]bya'o/_/de la zhe sdang gang zhe na/_zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/_chen po dang 'bring po dang chung ngu'o/_/de la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/_zhe sdang gi rnam pa gang gis zhe sdang zhing rngam 'khrugs gtum par gyur nas mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung ba la la byed pa'am/_
[\[23a.5\]]dam pa'i chos spong ba gang byas pa la/_mtshams med pa lnga bsdoms pas kyang grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba de lta bu byed de/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye zhing /_gal 
[\[23a.6\]]te brgya lam na mir skye na yang gnag cing mig dmar la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis yang sems can dmyal ba dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la zhe sdang 'bring po gang zhe na/_gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur te/_sdig 
[\[23a.7\]]pa mi dge ba'i las byas na myur ba myur ba/_skyen pa skyen pa/_la gor la gor du 'gyod cing de'i gnyen po la yang sten pa ste/_de ni zhe sdang 'bring po zhes bya'o/_/de la zhe sdang chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur nas tshig tsam dang /_mi snyan pa tsam dang /_ngan du brjod pa tsam 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gyis mi dge ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ste/_de yang de la brgyal bar 'ga' 'byung ste/_byung na yang de'i skad cig de'i yud tsam de'i thang cig la gnyen po la sten pa ste/_de ni zhe sdang chung ngu zhes bya'o/_/de la gti mug gang zhe na/_gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/_chen po dang /_
[\[23b.2\]]'bring po dang /_chung ngu'o/_/gang de la gti mug chen po gang zhe na/_gang ji skad du smos pa'i gnas de dag la nyes kyang dga' zhing mya ngan du mi byed/_smre sngags mi 'don/_'gyod pa med pa yin te/_de ni gti mug chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la gti mug 'bring po gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[23b.3\]]gis mi dge ba'i las la la byas kyang /_la gor la gor du 'gyod cing /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi drung du 'chags shing mi 'chab la/_de la yon tan du yang mi lta ba yin te/_'di ni gti mug 'bring po zhes bya'o/_/de la gti mug chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang gis rang 
[\[23b.4\]]bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa/_bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba bslab pa kun spyad pa'i lam gnyis gsum las 'da' ba ste/_de ni gti mug chung ngu zhes bya'o/_/de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems phyir bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin te/_de de ltar sems la mkhas pa la/_gang 
[\[23b.5\]]'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang 'dod pa rnams la mos pa dang /_'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa de lta bu med pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/_/'on te lung du ma bstan pa la spyod na/_de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan du byed la/_de 
[\[23b.6\]]brtag pa la brtson pa yin te/_de la ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa la spyod pa yin zhe na/_gang gi tshe sems phyi rol tu'ang mi rgyu/_nang du'ang mi rgyu/_dge ba la'ang mi spyod/_mi dge ba la'ang mi spyod/_lhag mthong la yang mi spyod/_zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing zhum la gnyid 
[\[23b.7\]]kyis non par gnas pa ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu nyal nyal ba las sad pa mig gnyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems mi gsal ba de bzhin du de'i tshe sems de mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la mkhas pa yin no/_/de de ltar sems la mkhas pas chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni 
[\[24a.2\]]mi dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/_de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/_sems las byung ba/_sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/_sems 
[\[24a.3\]]shin tu bcil/_shin tu btul/_shin tu khong du chud par byas na/_chos de dag thams cad kyang shin tu bcil ba dang /_shin tu btul ba dang /_shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/_des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[24a.4\]]nan tan du byed de/_/de sems nyid la sems 'dogs so/_/sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do/_/sems nyid la sems rab tu gzhog go/_/de de ltar zhi ba la brtson pas sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te/_rtse gcig tu red nas mnyam par gzhog go/_/sems mnyam par 
[\[24a.5\]]bzhag pa la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba mngon du 'gyur te/_de yid dga' bar gyur nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan 
[\[24a.6\]]dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dga' ba dang /_bde ba'i ro de'ang myang bar mi byed de mi rtog go snyam nas bsam gtan dang po las sems skyed do/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing chags pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas 
[\[24a.7\]]nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de dga' ba dang sdug bsngal ba yin par khong du chud par byed de/_sdug bsngal lo snyam nas 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/_btang snyoms la gnas pas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa 
[\[24b.2\]]rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan gsum pa gtong ngo snyam nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste/_des bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pas bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog go/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog pas bde ba yang spong /_sdug bsngal ba yang spong ste/_de bde ba 
[\[24b.3\]]yang spangs/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bdag gi lus dang nam mkha'i lus su gcig 
[\[24b.4\]]tu mos par byed de/_de de ltar mos pas gzugs kyi 'du shes las thams cad du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin/_thogs pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin te/_de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing 
[\[24b.5\]]sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas sa snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[24b.6\]]skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/_ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min 
[\[24b.7\]]skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de'i gong na gang sems kyi mtshan ma med pa/_rgyu ba thams cad 'gags pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni 'gog pa zhes bya ste/_de ni shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi_/de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas mi 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]skyed do/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa chen por gyur pa tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/gcig 
[\[25a.2\]]tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_grwa'i 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa chen por 
[\[25a.3\]]gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa chen 
[\[25a.4\]]por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_grwa'i 
[\[25a.5\]]'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/
[\[25a.6\]]de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do/_/de la yang ma zhen pa yin te/_gong du yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos rnams yongs su tshol lo/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[25a.7\]]chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/_'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]rnams yin/_'khor ba'i ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/_bdud kyi las yongs su spangs pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_ma log pa'i shes rab can rnams yin 
[\[25b.2\]]mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs la rtog_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[25b.3\]]par shes pa la rtog ste/_de gzugs la rtog pa na gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/_kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/_'gog pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs/_kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/_
[\[25b.4\]]'gog pa mi dmigs so/_/de yang don dam par yin gyi tha snyad kyi rang bzhin du ma yin te/_des don dam pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka yang brjod pa'i rang bzhin du mi dmigs te/_de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed de/_
[\[25b.5\]]mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[25b.6\]]'di ltar dpyod de/_'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gar mkhan gyi tshon dang 'dra ba/_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la/_sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin na 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas de dag de'i phyir lam khong du chud pa mi 'thob bo/_/de dag ni 'di snyam du 
[\[25b.7\]]gal te bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba po'am/_gso ba'am/_skyes bu'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes sam/_shed bu med na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems mod kyi/_sems can med du zin kyang las kyi 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rnam par smin pa yang mngon no snyam ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' de ji ltar sems can de yang med la/_ji ltar dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang mngon pa de yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na 
[\[26a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas kyi chos rnams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtog par byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dus byas kyi chos 'di 
[\[26a.3\]]dag ni mi gnas pa/_g.yo ba/_zil pa'i thigs pa lta bu/_ri bo'i 'bab chu lta bu yin na/_de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhen pa dang /_chags par byed pa'am/_de dag med par gyur pas mya ngan du byed snyam nas/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis skyob dang /_'dod 
[\[26a.4\]]chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa la sems gtong ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/_kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di 
[\[26a.5\]]ni ma rig pas ldongs pa/_'khor ba la phyogs pa/_srid pa'i zhags pas bcings pa ste/_len pa nye bar len to/_/de len pa'i rgyus dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/_de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pas srid par yang mtshams 
[\[26a.6\]]sbyor bar 'gyur te/_de'i rgyu las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba yod pas rga bar 'gyur ro/_/rga ba'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba las mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 
[\[26a.7\]]'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po de zo chun rgyud mo'i 'khor lo ltar/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyun du 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de yang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/_ma rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par mi 'gyur/_'du byed la zhen pa med par gyur pas rnam par 
[\[26b.2\]]shes par mi 'gyur/_rnam par shes pa med par gyur pas ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sred pa med par gyur pas len pa mi 'byung ste/_len pa med pas srid pa yang mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur/_srid 
[\[26b.3\]]pa yang mtshams sbyor ba med par gyur pas/_skye bar mi 'gyur/_skye ba med par gyur pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sa yang dag pa'i shes 
[\[26b.4\]]rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/_chos 'dis ni rgyun du 
[\[26b.5\]]zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'dis ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur/_'dis ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_srid pa'i kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/_yang mtshams sbyor ba med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/chos 'dis ni rang sangs 
[\[26b.6\]]rgyas bse ru lta bur gcig pu spyod par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed de/_chos 'di dag mngon du yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can gyi khams bdag gis bzung /_bdag gis 
[\[26b.7\]]seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/_sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad sgrol lo zhes dam bcas la/_gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la yang slob la/_slob pa yang mi dmigs/_bslab pa'i lam yang mi dmigs/_gang slob pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis 
[\[27a.2\]]chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las spong ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_mi cha ba'i 
[\[27a.3\]]yul la gnas pa dang /_'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig la sten cing sgom pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro la ched cher 'dzin pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag 
[\[27a.4\]]kyang thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong zhing /_de dag gi gnyen po la yang sten te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las yongs su spang ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 
[\[27a.5\]]pa'i gtsug lag dang /_gsang tshig dang /_las dang /_bzo'i gnas thams cad la shes rab gtong ste/_de yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/_shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_de bzhin 
[\[27a.6\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/_de la yon tan du lta ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/_gsung rab 'di ni dam pa ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'o snyam nas/_de de la yon tan du lta bas mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta 
[\[27a.7\]]ba can du mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]skye dgu'i dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang de dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can sems can gyi ris na med de/_de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_
[\[27b.2\]]bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_skye dgu'i dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/_shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis mnan pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[27b.3\]]bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_mu stegs can rnam par 
[\[27b.4\]]zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la 
[\[27b.5\]]mkhas pa rnams yin/_len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_gzengs stod pa dang /_shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod 
[\[27b.6\]]pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag me tog gi rnam pa'am/_'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa/_yongs su bzung 
[\[27b.7\]]ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de gang 'di dag bdug pa'i shing ngam/_spos kyi shing ngam/_rin po che'i shing ngam/_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dpag bsam gyi shing ngam/_me tog gi shing ngam/_'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[28a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de mdo sde rnams la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag nyan cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o/_/gang phyogs bcu na byang chub 
[\[28a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams dang /_de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cing byang chub kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag la snying thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de bzhin 
[\[28a.4\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos gsol na sems can thams cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i dri nga ba bsal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o/_/de phyag dar dang zhal zhal 
[\[28a.5\]]byed na sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o/_/de me tog gi gdugs gsol na/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongs 
[\[28a.6\]]su bsngo'o/_/de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzud do snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de phyir 'byung na 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas 'don to snyam du sems skyed do/_/de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di 
[\[28a.7\]]ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o/_/snyam du sems skyed do/_/de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcad do snyam du sems skyed do/_/de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la dgod do snyam du sems skyed do/_/
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]de glo g.yas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems skyed do/_/de de nas ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslang ngo snyam du sems skyed do/_/de lus kyi ched 
[\[28b.2\]]la 'gro na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems skyed do/_/de der 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo snyam du sems skyed do/_/de bkru bshal byed na 'di 
[\[28b.3\]]ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems skyed do/_/de lag pa bsnyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems skyed do/_/de rkang pa 'khru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[28b.4\]]rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems skyed do/_/de so shing za na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems skyed do/_/de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs su sngo'o/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[28b.5\]]rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar shog shig snyam du sems skyed de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog 
[\[28b.6\]]pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/_mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i mu stegs can gyi gnas de dang de dag tu 'phrul ba dag mngon par sprul te/_de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs byed 
[\[28b.7\]]cing de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas bdag gis sngar slob dpon gyi tshul gyis gdul bar ni mi nus kyis/_slob mar khas blang ngo snyam ste/_de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas ji ltar spyod pa dang /_spyod yul dang /_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]mang du thos pa dang /_spyod pa dman tshegs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zil gyis gnon pa de lta de lta bur rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/de dag gi nang na slob dpon dang bla ma lta bur bkur bar 'gyur/_tshig bzung zhing ngag mi gcog par 'gyur 
[\[29a.2\]]te/_kye sems can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes nas/_grogs po dag 'di ni skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no zhes mu stegs can de dag gi ma legs pa rjod par 'gyur te/_des mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las 
[\[29a.3\]]bslang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do/_/de phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag gi gan du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/de tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing chos de thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod cing rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/de rtsol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 
[\[29a.4\]]'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub ste/_ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag pas ches mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /_ches 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang /_slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /_mkhas par bkur bar 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub bo/_/des sems can de 
[\[29a.5\]]rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus dang /_tshod shes nas grogs po dag lam 'di ni skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no zhes/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi ma legs pa brjod pa yin te/_des sems can de 
[\[29a.6\]]dag gnas de las bslang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems 
[\[29a.7\]]dpa' sems can gang rab tu 'dod chags can rab tu 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can rnams mthong na/_des de dag gdul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas des de dag gi drung du bud med sprul pa bzang mo blta na sdug pa bud med thams cad kyi mchog dag sprul te/_sems can de rnams de dag la 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]rab tu chags par rig nas sprul pa'i bud med de mal de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed du 'jug go/_/de yang skad cig de nyid dang /_yud tsam de nyid dang /_thang cig de nyid la rul cing dri nga ba dang 'jig par 'gyur te/_de dag gis kyang de mthong nas dngangs skrag skyo bar red de/_bdag cag 'di 'dra 
[\[29b.2\]]ba'i dri nga ba'i nang nas gang thar bar byed pa su zhig yod ces nyam thag par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/_de byang chub gsum las gang yang rung ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/_de ltar na 
[\[29b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams med pa'i las byed pa'am/_mi dge ba'i las 
[\[29b.4\]]byed pa mthong na/_de'i gan du song ste/_kye skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro/_/des kyang smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag gis mtshams med pa'i las byas pas de'i phyir bdag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa med pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[29b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur grang zhes yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas so/_/de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug go/_/nyes pa yang 'chags su 'jug go/_/de la chos bstan pa zab mo zab mo yang byed do/_/de ste 'gyod pa mi gtong na de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[29b.6\]]thog mar 'di lta ste/_rdzu 'phrul lam/_sems kun rjod pas yang dag par yid ches pa skyed do/_/de nas sems can de yang dag par yid ches pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_rangs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dga' ba dang /_mos pa 
[\[29b.7\]]dang /_rangs pa rnyed pas de chos bstan tu rung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'thun par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de'i mdun du 'di lta ste/_pha mar sprul pa mngon par sprul te 'di skad zer ro/_/kye skyes bu khyod ltos la 'gyod pa chod cig_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]nga yang khyod kyi grogs te/_las 'di lta bus su'ang shin tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_don thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba med do/_/las de ye shes kyis bsal du mi nus pa yang ma yin no/_/zhes de skad smras nas/_pha ma srog dang phral lo/_/
[\[30a.2\]]srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang phral na/_bdag 'dra ba lta ci zhig smos snyam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' de yang de'i tshe sems can de la ci nas kyang de'i las de sbrang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra 
[\[30a.3\]]bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston par byed do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpas 
[\[30a.4\]]sems can gang chos bstan par rung zhing nus pa dag mthong la/_de dag kyang shin tu mi dge ba'i las byed par gyur na/_de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpas 'phrul ba dag mngon par sprul te/_de la sems can gang rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal 
[\[30a.5\]]por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/sems can gang rnams blon po chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/sems can gang rnams bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul mis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag 
[\[30a.6\]]la bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul mir sprul pa dang /_sems can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la lhar sprul pa dang /_gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag la lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/sems can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul 
[\[30a.7\]]bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston/_sems can gang rnams brdegs pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_gsad pa dang /_bcing bas gdul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston/_sems can gang rnams des pas 'dul ba de dag la des pas 'dul/_sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa byed 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyad par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis zlog cing zil gyis gnon par byed/_phyogs gzhan du yang bskar bar byed do/_/mtshams med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sbas te/_de 'dra bar de'i mdun du sprul pa ston to/_/yang na sems 
[\[30b.2\]]can dmyal ba ston to/_/mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe'i mtshan ma shes pa ni byed 'dod pa dang /_gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te/_de yang 'di snyam du/_kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni phung bar 'dod pa'o/_/
[\[30b.3\]]kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shing /_de dag des lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga' ba'i sems chen po skyed de/_de yang 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma 
[\[30b.4\]]ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu ma bzhag pa'i bar du/_mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal bkur bar bzod na/_sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa thabs gzhan gyis ni bzlog par mi 
[\[30b.5\]]nus te/_sems can de rnams tshe yang thung dad pa yang med pa dag cig la yul gzhan du bskar ba'am/_zil gyis mnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag la med na sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i las 'dis lus zhig nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 
[\[30b.6\]]'gyur grang zhes de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag nas las bdag gir bya ba dang 'dra bar byas nas/_sems can de rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/_thabs gzhan gyis mi nus nas chad pa rab kyis 'chos te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed 
[\[30b.7\]]pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs mi nus te/_zas dang gos lhur 'dzin cing de kho nas 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]chog par rtsi ba mthong na/_de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yi ge dang /_gtsug lag dang /_rgya dang /_grangs dang /_shod thabs la sogs pa'i las dge ba dang ldan pa dag ston te/_mi dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[31a.2\]]can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam thob na yang len te/_dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na'ang len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 'di ltar 
[\[31a.3\]]sems te/_sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can/_brkam pa/_'dod pas 'khol ba/_'jungs pa yin te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung nub byed pa de dag la/_de ni yun ring por don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde 
[\[31a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de blangs nas bdag gir mi byed/_chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la bya ba byed do/_/sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la yang phan par byed do/_/sbyin pa'i 
[\[31a.5\]]bdag po de yang gzengs stod pa dang /_shin tu dga' bar byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang 
[\[31a.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing nus pa zhig la/_de yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhing 'bad de brtson 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/_de gnas de nas bslang ste/_tha na 'khor dbye ba yang byas 
[\[31a.7\]]nas theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang /_gzengs stod pa dang /_shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems skyed du 'jug_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba/_tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag ni brtson 'grus la 'jog_/sems can 
[\[31b.2\]]gang rnams bslab pa kun spyod pa phra mo las 'gal ba dag de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis sems kun khebs shing 'khod de/_dga' mgu rangs pa yang mi rnyed pa de dag la/_de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bur chos ston par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 
[\[31b.3\]]'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_gzengs stod pa dang /_shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang 
[\[31b.4\]]chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rnyed pa chung ngu yang chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/_de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/_rab tu dben par gnas nas/_de 'di ltar sems te/_ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba bsam mo snyam 
[\[31b.5\]]nas/_de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems te/_de ltar sems pa de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_de la gang mchod pa dang /_
[\[31b.6\]]rim gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing 
[\[31b.7\]]shin tu dga' ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sems mi skyo ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu 
[\[32a.2\]]po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi dman pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_ma zhum pa'i smon lam 
[\[32a.3\]]pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa 
[\[32a.4\]]rnams yin/_mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/_legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman 
[\[32a.5\]]pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing smon lam mi 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[32a.6\]]dpa' ni khams gsum las skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin 
[\[32a.7\]]zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smon lam 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can gyi khams ji 
[\[32b.2\]]snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/_mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyod du btsud nas byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams 
[\[32b.3\]]kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod 
[\[32b.4\]]pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang bdud kyi sgra'am/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[32b.5\]]sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/_byang chub 
[\[32b.6\]]sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyis dpyad de/_sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal ba la bltas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[32b.7\]]sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas nyi tse ba'i smon lam mi 'debs kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]sems mi skyo bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang /_gang dag dka' ba spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas gang dag 
[\[33a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba de dag rnams la snying thag pa nas bsams te/_de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do/_/mos par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[33a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang chos zab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba 
[\[33a.4\]]zab mo thos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa zab mo thos pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag rab tu mi skrag shin tu skrag par mi byed do/_/de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha' yas/_sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas/_sangs 
[\[33a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/_de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nus kyi/_sangs rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/_bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa 
[\[33a.6\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod sems can gdul dka' bar rig ste/_de rnams kyis yi chad nas/_'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di lta bur gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag 
[\[33a.7\]]gis chog go zhes te/_de'i phyir yongs su skye zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te/_gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam mi 'debs so/_/sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang mi 'gyur te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba/_blun po glen pa/_lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i 
[\[33b.2\]]chos can/_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsnyigs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/_bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug tu 
[\[33b.3\]]bcug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems skyed de/_byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags 
[\[33b.4\]]pa gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji 
[\[33b.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_
[\[33b.6\]]yang de las 'das par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_mar ram/_'bru mar gyi snod kha tha chad du gang ste/_lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa yang mi shong na/_de'i phyir e ma'o snod gang ba/_e 
[\[33b.7\]]ma'o snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir smon lam ma rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med do/_/de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/_
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zil gyis mi non pa'i 
[\[34a.2\]]stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[34a.3\]]gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum 
[\[34a.4\]]tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa yin te/_de ltar na zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum 
[\[34a.5\]]tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum 
[\[34a.6\]]tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpas ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod 
[\[34a.7\]]nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang /_
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]mngon du ma byas pa dang /_khong du ma chud pa de dag med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims 
[\[34b.2\]]nyams pa ma yin/_lta ba nyams pa ma yin/_cho ga nyams pa ma yin/_'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[34b.3\]]no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_de'ang rdzu 
[\[34b.4\]]'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa/_mchog gis zil gyis gnon to/_/de 'dod na 'dzam bu'i gling skra nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go/_/de bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 
[\[34b.5\]]de bzhin no/_/de 'dod na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go/_/de bzhin du gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu nas 
[\[34b.6\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang /_bri bar yang mi mngon te/_'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'dos par mi 'gyur/_sems can de rnams la 
[\[34b.7\]]gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo/_/de 'dod na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[35a.2\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig don tha dad pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang brjod 
[\[35a.3\]]pa tha dad pa dang /_tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpas skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/_khong du chud par byed/_sgom par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang 
[\[35a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed 
[\[35a.5\]]pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_thabs mkhas 
[\[35a.6\]]pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na ma mthong ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35a.7\]]stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_nyi tse ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_
[\[35b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum 
[\[35b.3\]]tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong /_'jig pa dang /_'gog pa yang yang dag 
[\[35b.4\]]par mthong ngo /_/des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_gsog tu yang dag par mthong /_phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/_de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gsob 
[\[35b.5\]]med pa dang /_gang zag med pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdag go/_/bdag cag gi phung po rnams la bdag yod do/_/bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod do/_/bdag 
[\[35b.6\]]cag gi bdag ni phung po can no snyam ste/_de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas de kho na nyid khong du mi chud do/_/de kho na nyid khong du ma chud pas mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor bar 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing /_de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[35b.7\]]bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos la sgro 'dogs pa dang /_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]chos la skur pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming gdags te/_chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/_yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/_'di ni ming tsam dang /_tha snyad 
[\[36a.2\]]tsam du bya'i/_'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad du thams cad med pa ma yin te/_gzhan gyi rkyen dang /_gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang /_gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod do zhes de thams cad 
[\[36a.3\]]byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tse ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' nyi tse ba'i 
[\[36a.4\]]ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tse ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[36a.5\]]na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu 
[\[36a.6\]]shes/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes so/_/des ting nge 'dzin gang dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/_ting nge 'dzin gang dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/_ting nge 
[\[36a.7\]]'dzin gang dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/_des ting nge 'dzin gang dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]nge 'dzin ni rab tu shes kyi/_rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[36b.2\]]no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi 
[\[36b.3\]]rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/_sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la 
[\[36b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang /_bdud thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[36b.5\]]dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag pa dang zhing rnyog pa med pas sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/_des de na sems can la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang /_
[\[36b.6\]]la la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa dag dang /_la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag dang /_la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang /_la la sa dang po la gnas pa dag dang /_la la sa bcu'i bar la gnas pa dag dang /_la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag 
[\[36b.7\]]dang /_la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dag dang /_la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang /_la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang /_la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ba dag dang /_la la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang /_la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo /_/de ltar sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[37a.2\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'am/_'greng ba 'am/_'dug pa 'am/_'gro ba 'am/_'ong ba na lhun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi gnyid 
[\[37a.3\]]kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa dag lhun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o/_/ye shes de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[37a.4\]]no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/_mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/_sgyu ma'i mtshan 
[\[37a.5\]]nyid du'ang rab tu shes/_yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang rab tu shes te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes 
[\[37a.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de 
[\[37a.7\]]dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//_//'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/_gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa 
[\[37b.2\]]rnams yin/_dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/_rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/_rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/_mi sgul ba rnams yin/_mi dngangs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad 
[\[37b.3\]]med pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni thams cad du yangs shing tshad med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs 
[\[37b.4\]]shing tshad med pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[37b.5\]]sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang /_phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/_
[\[37b.6\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu dper na sa chen po ni gnod pas kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur/_phan pas kyang 
[\[37b.7\]]chags par mi 'gyur te/_de la gnyis su 'du shes pa yang mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis khong khro bar mi 'gyur/_phan pa dag gis kyang chags par mi 'gyur te/_de ni sems can de dag la chags pa dang /_khong khro ba yang mi skyed de de ltar 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni sprin chen po las 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po kun zed de/_bzod 
[\[38a.2\]]cing kun 'dzin to de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa chen po rab tu phab pa kun zed cing bzod la 'dzin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[38a.3\]]dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 
[\[38a.4\]]'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa bon thams cad ni sa chen 
[\[38a.5\]]po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po 
[\[38a.6\]]che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/_sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/_byang chub 
[\[38a.7\]]sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo /_/de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du 
[\[38b.2\]]gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sgul ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[38b.3\]]dpa' yang 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sgul ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dngangs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa chen 
[\[38b.4\]]po ni glang po'i rgyal po dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag rab tu mi skrag shin tu mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na mi skrag rab tu mi skrag shin du mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[38b.5\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dngangs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang 
[\[38b.6\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/_dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/_dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud thams cad srul ba rnams yin/_dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba 
[\[38b.7\]]rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/_'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/_zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/_mthon dman 'gengs pa rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang /_gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i 
[\[39a.2\]]chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_rtsi dang /_nags tshal thams 
[\[39a.3\]]cad skyed de/_skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par byed do/_/skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur gyi bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/_/thams 
[\[39a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_
[\[39a.5\]]rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/_gzhan yang gsher bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/_sems can 
[\[39a.6\]]gzhan yang dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa'i gsher ba can du byed do/_/de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o/_/dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la rten pa'o/_/rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[39a.7\]]dpa' dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni shing gi rnam pa dang rtswa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun thams cad srul lo/_/de bzhin du byang 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]chub sems dpa' yang sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/_ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi ming yang mi shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[39b.2\]]sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal lo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[39b.3\]]yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no/_/de la bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral bas na rnyog pa med pa'o/_/dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/_de ltar na 
[\[39b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa dang /_de las gzhan yang sems can 
[\[39b.5\]]rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa 
[\[39b.6\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa 
[\[39b.7\]]dag la gang gi sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog par byed do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dper na chu'i 'jings ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang 'di lta ste/_bdud thams cad dang /_mu stegs can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/_de ltar na byang 
[\[40a.2\]]chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i klung ni sa'i phyogs mthon dman 'gengs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu klung gis 
[\[40a.3\]]sems can gyi khams mthon dman 'gengs te/_ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod pa byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/_sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/_de ltar na byang 
[\[40a.4\]]chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chus ni sa'i phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul ba thams cad snum par byed cing /_rdul de 
[\[40a.5\]]dag zhi bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste/_shes rab la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems snum par byed cing sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[40a.6\]]sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu 
[\[40a.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skom par byed/_me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/_snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]skrag par byed pa rnams yin/_dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/_mchod par bya ba rnams yin/_mi brnyas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams 
[\[40b.2\]]cad bsreg ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na me ni phyag dar khung dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_rtsi dang /_sdong po thams cad sreg go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang /_'dod chags dang /_
[\[40b.3\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khungathams cad bsreg ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad bsreg pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[40b.4\]]'di lta ste/_dper na me ni lo thog dang /_rtsi dang /_sdong bu'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'ang ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su 
[\[40b.5\]]smin par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_me ni chu bran gyi 'dam thams cad skam par byed do/_/
[\[40b.6\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[40b.7\]]'di lta ste/_dper na sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyis rab 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]tu dro bar byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gangs kyi rtse mo'am ri bin da'i rtse mo la me'i phung po chen po 'bar na/_des 
[\[41a.2\]]dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed/_dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang /_dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug tu yang snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/_dpag tshad 
[\[41a.3\]]stong du yang khyab par byed/_dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang khyab par byed pa nas/_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas/_sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed de/_ye shes kyi snang ba des mi shes pa'i mun pa 
[\[41a.4\]]mun nag thams cad rnam par sel te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khro bo'am/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na 
[\[41a.5\]]skrag rab tu skrag shin tu skrag par gyur cing /_'di lta ste/_me'i 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas te/_de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar spong ngo /_/de bzhin du bdud rnams sam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas skrag rab tu skrag shin tu skrag par 
[\[41a.6\]]gyur cing /_'di lta ste/_gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na/_mthong ba lta smos kyang mi smos par ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo /_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin no/_/
[\[41a.7\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/_de de logs su song ba dang /_des de na grong ngam/_rdzi'u brang mthong na de shugs phyin te/_rab 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]tu dbugs phyin nas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/_shugs phyin par 'gyur/_rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/_
[\[41b.2\]]nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na me ni 
[\[41b.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/_ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/_ji ltar rgyal po la phan par nye bar 
[\[41b.4\]]gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na me la ni bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_
[\[41b.5\]]grong ba dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no/_/ji 
[\[41b.6\]]ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na me stag chung ngu yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mi brnyas pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa/_theg pa chen po la las dang po
