[\[41b.7\]]pa yang lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brnyas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_bla na 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs 
[\[42a.2\]]kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas med par spyod pa dang /_spyod yul kun tu mu med pa dang /_sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa dang /_chos 
[\[42a.3\]]kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la chos dkar po lus 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang /_chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 
[\[42a.4\]]'dzin pa dang /_chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 
[\[42a.5\]]'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /_ri rab dang /_'od dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_
[\[42a.6\]]nags tshal dang /_khang pa dang /_dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab 
[\[42a.7\]]tu gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med rten med de/_gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ri rab dang /_rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[42b.2\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_
[\[42b.3\]]sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi 
[\[42b.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_mig gi skye mched dang /_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_
[\[42b.5\]]yid kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched la mi gnas pa yin/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong 
[\[42b.6\]]ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas par mi byed de/_de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang /_
[\[42b.7\]]dngos po med pa dang /_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin nyid la sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing dmigs pa med la rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'ang byed la/_
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du'ang rgyu la/_chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba yang yin zhing mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_
[\[43a.2\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de g.yob 
[\[43a.3\]]cing rgyu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang /_don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/_reg par byed/_rnam par 'god cing ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[43a.4\]]dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing /_phyogs thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul par gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin no/_/
[\[43a.5\]]rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil par byed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni ri dang /_khyim dang /_nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed/_rab tu rnyil bar byed/_rnam par 
[\[43a.6\]]'jig par byed/_'thor bar byed/_mi sngar bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang /_rlom pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams gzugs dang /_dar la bab pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang 
[\[43a.7\]]dang /_stobs dang /_tshe dang /_nad med pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_bzo dang /_thos pa dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_g.yog dang /_smra mkhas pa dang /_dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang /_yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag bstod pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]tshogs pa bstan pa dang /_chos bstan pas nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal kyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[43b.2\]]chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang /_zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can/_klung ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 
[\[43b.3\]]'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa/_glog gi phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/_'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang /_lo tog dang /_sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 
[\[43b.4\]]char gyi rgyun chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas slong ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang lus sna tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar 
[\[43b.5\]]byed pa/_'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i glog gi phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba/_yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa sgrogs pa/_snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par mtho ba/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par 
[\[43b.6\]]byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing ngan song dang mi khom pa la sogs pa nas sems can rnams rnam par bslang ste/_rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs te/_
[\[43b.7\]]bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas/_lha dang mi dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa/_dga' ba dang bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang /_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rtsi chen po dang /_sdong po thams cad rnam par bskyed pa dang /_thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/_
[\[44a.2\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar dri zhim po'i char gyi rgyun gyi 
[\[44a.3\]]snying po can ldang na/_sems can rnams kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing /_lus shin tu sim pa dang /_bsil bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_ngan par 
[\[44a.4\]]lta ba dang /_nyes byas dang /_the tsom dang /_phongs pa mi bzad pa dang /_yul la sred pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang /_nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med 
[\[44a.5\]]pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /_smon lam dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg pa dang /_'grogs pa dang /_bstan pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed 
[\[44a.6\]]cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang /_
[\[44a.7\]]rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung mar nye bar spyad pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang /_khor yug ri dag dang /_khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang /_gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /_
[\[44b.2\]]rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang /_ri rab dang /_ri rab chen po dang /_de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang /_gangs dang /_ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /_grong rdal dang /_nags tshal dang /_gzhal med khang dag dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dag dang /_gling chen 
[\[44b.3\]]po bzhi dag dang /_stong dag dang /_stong gnyis pa dag dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag bkod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum 
[\[44b.4\]]tshogs pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/skyed do/_/yongs su gzhog go/_/de la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/_/ji ltar gling chen po bzhi dang ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[44b.5\]]rnams blta'o/_/ji ltar stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/_/ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/_/
[\[44b.6\]]ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/_shin tu rnam par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa 
[\[44b.7\]]thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/_/de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o/_/
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gling dang /_bar gyi gling dang /_ri gzhan dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang /_gzungs dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o/_/grong rdal dang /_nags tshal dang /_gzhal 
[\[45a.2\]]med khang ltar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o/_/dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal ltar ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_ye shes snang ba dang /_dbang dang /_
[\[45a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_snying rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams 
[\[45a.4\]]brgya ba'i mtshan gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod 
[\[45a.5\]]nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/_de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur te/_rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[45a.6\]]thams cad 'das te/_de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/_snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can yod do 
[\[45a.7\]]cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te/_de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/_phyogs 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig cig ldan par gyur te/_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs 
[\[45b.2\]]pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/_bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur 
[\[45b.3\]]la/_bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la/_tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te/_snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag dang /_byang 
[\[45b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/_'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/_dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/_de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs 
[\[45b.5\]]pa'i dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig 
[\[45b.6\]]mngon par 'grub bo/_/ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo/_/dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du 
[\[45b.7\]]med pa bcur bsgyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo/_/de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong bas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa mngon par 'grub bo/_/de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo/_/de yang brjod du med 
[\[46a.2\]]pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su sim par 
[\[46a.3\]]gyur la/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa 
[\[46a.4\]]dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/_gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du 
[\[46a.5\]]gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba/_dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i 
[\[46a.6\]]bsod nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/_phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing 
[\[46a.7\]]khyer yang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba'am 'bri bar mi mngon te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]sa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_'od byed pa dang /_'od 'phro ba can dang /_shin tu dka' rgyal dang /_mngon du gyur pa dang /_ring du song ba dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_legs pa'i blo gros dang /_chos kyi sprin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od de/_sa bcu 
[\[46b.2\]]gnyis po de ni de dag go/_/de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang /_log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_
[\[46b.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[46b.4\]]'khor dang ldan pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/_stong gi 'jig 
[\[46b.5\]]rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas thogs pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/_phyir mi ldog pa/_phyogs 
[\[46b.6\]]kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba/_yang dag par 
[\[46b.7\]]mnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/_blta na bzang zhing yid du 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'thun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/_
[\[47a.2\]]mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa/_chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i 
[\[47a.3\]]bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba 'thob pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la/_gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i 
[\[47a.4\]]bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa'o/_/
[\[47a.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las 'das la/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/_don dam pa'i 
[\[47a.6\]]byangachub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang dbung med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/_kun tu shin tu lta ba/_sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/de la 
[\[47a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/_bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rin chen kun tu 'phags pa dang /_shin tu gnas pa dang /_mi sgul ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang /_don thams cad grub pa dang /_ye shes sgron ma dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so/_/gzungs ni 
[\[47b.2\]]bcu gnyis te/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang bskur ldan dang /_ye shes ldan dang /_sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang /_mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang /_'khyil pa mtha' yas dang /_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang /_pad ma bkod pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug 
[\[47b.3\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/_de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/mngon par 
[\[47b.4\]]shes pa ni drug ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang /_gang zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/_/
[\[47b.5\]]dbang ni bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[47b.6\]]bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang /_dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[47b.7\]]cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang /_dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ba dang /_chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbung med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_mngon 
[\[48a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang /_dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang 
[\[48a.3\]]chub pa ston pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/_bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa'i stobs dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /_sbyor ba'i stobs dang /_shes rab 
[\[48a.4\]]kyi stobs dang /_smon lam gyi stobs dang /_spyod pa'i stobs dang /_theg pa'i stobs dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang /_byang chub kyi stobs dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs te/_bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so/_/de la byang 
[\[48a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /_bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[48a.6\]]bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang /_chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang /_dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 
[\[48a.7\]]nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/_ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang /_ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang /_ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang /_ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[48b.2\]]can rnams dang /_ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang /_thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gi theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa 
[\[48b.3\]]rnams dang /_theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang /_zung dang snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang /_ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par 'phags 
[\[48b.4\]]pa rnams dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang /_'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams dang /_byis 
[\[48b.5\]]pa dang /_nyan thos mi bzad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang /_chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal 
[\[48b.6\]]ba bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[48b.7\]]da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_rnam par ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[49a.2\]]'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/_bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 
[\[49a.3\]]'jigs pa dang /_zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /_bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa 
[\[49a.4\]]ste/_bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba med pa dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bsnyel ba med pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa 
[\[49a.5\]]med pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_mos pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /_
[\[49a.6\]]rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_
[\[49a.7\]]lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag ni sangs 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang 
[\[49b.2\]]bzhin du 'byung ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni bdag med pa na sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni sems can med pa na sems can 
[\[49b.3\]]rnams ni sems can du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni srog med pa na sems can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa 
[\[49b.4\]]na sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni med pa na sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni gnas 
[\[49b.5\]]med pa na sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa na sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni nga 
[\[49b.6\]]yir bya ba med pa na sems can rnams ni nga yir bya ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa na sems can rnams ni yongs su bzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/
[\[49b.7\]]chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa na sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ma skyes pa na sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]chos thams cad ni ma 'phos ma byung ba na sems can rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon ma mongs pa na sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la 
[\[50a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba na sems can rnams zhe sdang 
[\[50a.3\]]bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'ong 
[\[50a.4\]]ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/
[\[50a.5\]]chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa na sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa na sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir sems 
[\[50a.6\]]can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni stong pa na sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa na sems can rnams ni mtshan ma'i 
[\[50a.7\]]spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa na sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma 'jig rten 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas/_de dag la gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon spong ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma 'jig rten 
[\[50b.2\]]gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/_de dag la yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod 
[\[50b.3\]]pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/_chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_shes rab dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin 
[\[50b.4\]]gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu smad dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru la sred pas 'khol ba ste/_snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis de dag la shin tu mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin 
[\[50b.5\]]gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/_gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/
[\[50b.6\]]kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin gyis/_de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la 
[\[50b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste/_bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/_de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir 
[\[51a.2\]]brtson 'grus brtsam par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[51a.3\]]kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams 
[\[51a.4\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[51a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[51a.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/srog chags brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[51a.7\]]rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos kyi rnam par 'god pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/_de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu 
[\[51b.2\]]med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/_rgya mtsho dang /_gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/_ri rab dang /_ri 
[\[51b.3\]]btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po dang /_gangs dang /_khor yug ri dang /_khor yug ri chen po dang /_ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /_grong rdal dang /_'bab chu dang /_nags tshal dang /_gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[51b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab 
[\[51b.5\]]dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa dang /_ri btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po dang /_gangs dang /_khor yug ri dang /_khor yug ri chen po dang /_ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /_grong rdal dang /_'bab chu dang /_nags tshal dang /_gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu 
[\[51b.6\]]bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang /_sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[51b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni 
[\[52a.2\]]gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed de/_nags tshal dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_ldum bu dang /_myu gu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo ma dang /_sdong po la 
[\[52a.3\]]sogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa'i 
[\[52a.4\]]ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/_/rnam par 'byed par byed/_snang bar byed/_yongs su ston par byed/_thob par byed cing rnam 
[\[52a.5\]]pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/_chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[52a.6\]]rten sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o/_/de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/_'di dag ni brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni gzugs dang /_g.yog 
[\[52a.7\]]dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_dpal chen po sgrub pa'o/_/'di dag ni rig pa'o/_/'di dag ni sgyu rtsal to/_/'di dag ni bzo'i gnas so/_/'di dag ni gtsug lag sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/_nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni theg pa chen po ste/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang /_gzhan gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.2\]]du mdor bsdus te/_'di dag ni sa rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_rig pa rnams dang /_dbang rnams dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_
[\[52b.3\]]mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas/_chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed 
[\[52b.4\]]de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su dgod pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi 
[\[52b.5\]]gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang /_mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med 
[\[52b.6\]]par rnam par rtse ba dang /_nyams bde zhing yongs su spyod de/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kha dog dang /_stobs dang /_mthu dang /_yid bde ba las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang /_me tog dang /_rgyan dang /_gos dang /_rnga dang /_sil snyan la sogs pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[52b.7\]]pa'i char mngon par 'bebs/_yongs su skyod cing 'byin par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang gis sems can de 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_gzi dang ldan pa dang /_yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa 
[\[53a.2\]]dang /_mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_rtogs pa 
[\[53a.3\]]brjod pa dang /_'di lta bu 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so/_/lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs 
[\[53a.4\]]dang mi 'thun pa dang /_snrel zhi dang /_spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub bo/_/tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la rnam par byang bar byed do/_/chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang 
[\[53a.5\]]dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to/_/sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro/_/ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed de/_chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do/_/'dri ba thams 
[\[53a.6\]]cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do/_/mtha' dang dbung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas par byed do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu 
[\[53a.7\]]mngon par 'bebs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /_ri rab dang /_'od dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]nags tshal dang /_khang pa dang /_dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/_bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 
[\[53b.2\]]'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang /_khor yug ri dang /_
[\[53b.3\]]rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rmeg med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags 
[\[53b.4\]]pa'i sems can bsod nams dang /_ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i 
[\[53b.5\]]sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa/_bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa/_tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/_yang dag par sems nang du gnas 
[\[53b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te/_srid pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/_'jig rten thams cad las yongs 
[\[53b.7\]]su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par bshig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa/_rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /_ri rab dang /_'od dang /_zla ba dang /_
[\[54a.2\]]nyi ma dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_nags tshal dang /_khang pa dang /_dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/_bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho ba dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/a la la 
[\[54a.4\]]de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul bcu po 'di bstan pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag 
[\[54a.5\]]la mos shing nan tan bgyid na de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang bcas par thob par 'gyur te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na'ang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang /_tshe rabs gzhan 
[\[54a.6\]]gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_kun tu rnam par 
[\[54a.7\]]bltas pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro/_/gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/_sdug bsngal thams cad la rten pa'o/_/lha dang /_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o//_//'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[54b.2\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dri ma med pa rnams yin/_ma chags pa rnams yin/_zhi ba rnams yin/_shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/_ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/_chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[54b.3\]]kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/_so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/_mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/_rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs 
[\[54b.4\]]kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang yid 
[\[54b.5\]]du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_grags pa 
[\[54b.6\]]dang ma grags pa dang /_bstod pa dang smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 
[\[54b.7\]]'dra ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang /_mthong na dga' ba rnams yin/_chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang /_chos nag po rnams bri bar byed pa dang /_rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/_lus yongs su 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]dag pa rnams yin/_bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/_rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/_chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/_'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams 
[\[55a.2\]]cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang /_yid du 'ong bas rab tu sim par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/_
[\[55a.3\]]nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/_zhi ba dang /_dang ba dang /_sems shin tu dga' 
[\[55a.4\]]bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste/_dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang /_sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam dang /_yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' 
[\[55a.5\]]zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/_rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur gyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_
[\[55a.6\]]byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de na rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa na/_zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[55a.7\]]'khor kha dog dang /_snang ba dang /_chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de na/_de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]cad du thams cad rab tu 'bri ste/_ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_
[\[55b.2\]]khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i 
[\[55b.3\]]bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste/_rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang /_gsal ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/_chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa/_rdzus te skyes pa/_pha 
[\[55b.4\]]ma'i btsog pa dang /_mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/_yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/_gling bzhir snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub 
[\[55b.5\]]sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis 
[\[55b.6\]]rtag tu brgyan pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' 
[\[55b.7\]]ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste/_bsod nams chen po dang /_ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[56a.2\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/_'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams yin/_phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed pa rnams yin/_dge ba'i chos mngon par shar ba rnams yin/_de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[56a.3\]]yin/_snang bar byed pa rnams yin/_mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/_chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/_skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[56a.4\]]rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/_ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang ma rig pa'i mun 
[\[56a.5\]]pa thams cad rnam par sel to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu 
[\[56a.6\]]thams cad du lhan ner byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang /_ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu'i 
[\[56a.7\]]gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad du thams cad nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[56b.2\]]dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byed cing /_gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi 
[\[56b.3\]]sems mod kyi/_'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang /_mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad 'od med par 'gyur mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med 
[\[56b.4\]]par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can 
[\[56b.5\]]thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/_/rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma 
[\[56b.6\]]shar na rmo brko ba'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge ba'i chos las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/_mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' 
[\[56b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang /_skye bo dge ba rnams dang /_mkhas pa rnams dang /_shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur la/_lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang /_mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang /_byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang /_'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas skye bo 
[\[57a.2\]]dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/_mi brtabs 
[\[57a.3\]]pa rnams yin/_mi zlogs pa rnams yin/_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/_mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/_nags tshal dang /_nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba rnams yin/_ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/_len pa med pa rnams yin/_bdag gi brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[57a.4\]]mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rnams yin/_dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 
[\[57a.5\]]'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtabs pa yin no/_/de 
[\[57a.6\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal yang mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang pha rol 
[\[57a.7\]]rgol ba thams cad kyis bskugs na mi zlogs shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni sgra gang gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo thams cad dang wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dang /_gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang /_
[\[57b.2\]]sems can gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog go/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni kun tu lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su 
[\[57b.3\]]dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang /_nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing nags tshal 
[\[57b.4\]]dang /_nags tshal gyi 'dab na spyod pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyi brag ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni mi len par 'gro 
[\[57b.5\]]ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na seng ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag gi brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'joms 
[\[57b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'joms so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na grong gi 'dab gang na seng ge rgyu ba der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[57b.7\]]phra mo dag gis lo thog rnams chud mi gzon to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog chud mi gzon te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[58a.2\]]byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/_byang chub kyi sems byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/_dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/_lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/_khur chen po khyer phod pa rnams yin/_sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/_yang dag pas 
[\[58a.3\]]'tsho ba rnams yin/_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/_drang ba'i rang bzhin can bas drang ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[58a.4\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/_sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa rnams yin/_de bzhin 
[\[58a.5\]]gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/_dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod snyoms 
[\[58a.6\]]blang bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag pas nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/_chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin/_rang gis lam 
[\[58a.7\]]mthong bas gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/_rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]chub sems dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma gos pa rnams yin/_sdig pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/_gtsang ba rnams yin/_bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/_mi 
[\[58b.2\]]rtsub pa rnams yin/_mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/_blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/_blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/_shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa yin pa nas ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i 
[\[58b.3\]]bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[58b.4\]]na/_'di ltar de'i thabs dang /_shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/_de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad 
[\[58b.5\]]ma la ni chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi chags so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go/_/de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 
[\[58b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no/_/de 
[\[58b.7\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims dang /_gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]pa rnams 'du ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni kha bye na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 
[\[59a.2\]]'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 
[\[59a.3\]]'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/_mi brlang zhing mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni rmi lam dang /_ltas dang /_yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/_don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[59a.4\]]sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du'ang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab 
[\[59a.5\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag me tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de na bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/_mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/_mnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/_reg 
[\[59a.6\]]na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/_sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/_mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/_
[\[59a.7\]]tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri mnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/_reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/_yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'di lta ste/_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs 
[\[59b.2\]]su bzung ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[59b.3\]]sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub bo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher 
[\[59b.4\]]skyed do/_/byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 
[\[59b.5\]]'am/_sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/_sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[59b.6\]]gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/mgon med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_rten med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dang /_gnyen med pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnyen bya'o zhes sems rgya cher 
[\[59b.7\]]skyed do/_/lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to/_/sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]kyi rnam par rol bas rnam par rtse'o/_/glang po chen po'i blta bas blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/_dka' bar spyod pas ma yin/_zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/_zhum pa'i 
[\[60a.2\]]spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam 
[\[60a.3\]]pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang /_brtson pa chung 
[\[60a.4\]]ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_sgyu'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_yang 
[\[60a.5\]]dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_'di lta ste/_lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang /_ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_sems kyis smon pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta 
[\[60a.6\]]ci smos te/_byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/_byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/_dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi skyud/_yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/_gzhan du na cung zad byas pa yang tshor zhing de la stod par byed/_gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par dga' bar byed/_rab tu 
[\[60a.7\]]bsngags par byed/_de la yon tan du lta ba yin no/_/ji ltar smra ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi 'thun par sems pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]byed/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis des pa ston cing sems kyis 'khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston 
[\[60b.2\]]cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul mi 'chos/_kha gsag mi byed/_'jungs pa dang phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin/_sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab smyan mi byed/_phan tshun du dpar ba 
[\[60b.3\]]'jug pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo byed pa yin/_ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra ba las su rung ba yang sgrub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[60b.4\]]pa'i bstan pa la skur pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_skra dang kha spu bregs/_gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang 
[\[60b.5\]]dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung /_rkun pos gtse ba med pa dang /_bu lon gyis gtse ba med pa dang /_'jigs pas gtse ba med pa dang /_'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par 
[\[60b.6\]]rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes 'tshol ba yin te/_de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/_sten par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de dag las chos kyang nyan to/_/thos nas kyang nan tan du byed/_nga rgyal 
[\[60b.7\]]gyi zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]pa yin te/_de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/_ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob bo/_/de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid thob bo/_/chos nyid thob pas na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]te/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur 
[\[61a.2\]]med pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_
[\[61a.3\]]byang chub dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang /_theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang /_tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra dbyangs zab mo dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[61a.4\]]bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ji ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs 
[\[61a.5\]]pa'i chos kyi sku dang /_zhi ba'i sku dang /_mi mnyam pa'i sku dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang /_tshad med pa'i sku dang /_phal la med pa'i sku dang /_rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la nem 
[\[61a.6\]]nur med cing the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 
[\[61a.7\]]gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon sum du lung ston pa dang /_gsang ste lung ston pa dang /_ldem po ngag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa'am ca co med de/_de'i phyir de la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i nyes pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/_dri ma thams cad spangs pa/_rdul thams cad spangs pa/_yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_zhi ba/_dang ba/_yongs su dag pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_rnam par gsal ba ste/_
