[\[61b.2\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa'am/_ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la nem nur med/_the tsom med de de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 
[\[61b.3\]]gsang ba la mngon par dad do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/_
[\[61b.4\]]sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de 
[\[61b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/_dpag tu med pa/_rgya che ba/_yangs pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/_rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni 
[\[61b.6\]]yang dag pa'o/_'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la nem nur med the tsom med pa yin te/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la 
[\[61b.7\]]mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi rgyu/_byang chub kyi gzhi/_byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_sems can gyi bya ba dang /_sems can gyi byed pa dang /_yongs su mi skyo 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ba dang /_mi skrag pa dang /_khur chen po khyer ba dang /_mthu brtan pa dang /_rtul ba brtan pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i blo dang /_mtha' 
[\[62a.2\]]yas pa'i blo dang /_mi mnyam pa'i blo dang /_phal la med pa'i blo dang /_brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_go cha brtan pa dang /_dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /_dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang /_dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas 
[\[62a.3\]]pa dang /_yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la de nem nur med/_the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do/_/ji ltar na 
[\[62a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo/_/lha'i rna ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems 
[\[62a.5\]]shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa dang /_dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas shes pa chags pa med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa 'thob po/_/de'i phyir sems can gyi 
[\[62a.6\]]khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/_sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba rnams te/_log par lta ba'i las 
[\[62a.7\]]dang /_chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/_/sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/_yang dag par lta ba rnams te/_yang dag par lta ba'i las dang /_chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar 
[\[62b.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la lta ste/_sems can gyi khams de nyid kyi dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas 
[\[62b.3\]]nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so/_/bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la nem nur med/_
[\[62b.4\]]the tsom med do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas na rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do/_/ji 
[\[62b.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na te/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o/_/
[\[62b.6\]]'di ni de bzhin pa'o/_/ma nor pa'o/_/gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/_'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i 
[\[62b.7\]]gling du 'du'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling la rten to/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o/_/de'i phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/_de ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo /_/de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o/_/de'i phyir theg pa gcig kho na ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la de nem nur med/_the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon 
[\[63a.2\]]par dad do/_/ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[63a.3\]]zhe na/_'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/_gnas 'di la de nem nur med/_the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[63a.4\]]dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[63a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/_bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/_gnas 'di la de nem nur med/_the tsom med de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin 
[\[63a.6\]]gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/_de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal mkhyen te/_sems 
[\[63a.7\]]can mos pa tha dad pa dang /_'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo/_/sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de kho na'o/_/'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/_gnas 'di la de nem nur med/_the tsom med de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa 
[\[63b.2\]]ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[63b.3\]]ste/_rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/_zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/_rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/_bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/_ro gcig pa rnams yin/_chu bo kun 
[\[63b.4\]]zed pa rnams yin/_dus las mi yol ba rnams yin/_'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/_mi zad pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi 
[\[63b.5\]]bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi zad do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/_sems can thams cad kyis yon 
[\[63b.6\]]tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[63b.7\]]bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/_chu tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/_blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bags kyis 'bab/_bags kyis bab bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang 
[\[64a.2\]]lhan cig mi 'dug go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ngo dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[64a.3\]]bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de dag thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_lan tshwa'i ro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de dag thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[64a.4\]]pa'i ro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/_gang bar yang mi mngon no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/_gang bar mi mngon no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[64a.5\]]lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnas so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[64a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang /_chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos 
[\[64a.7\]]ston pa mi zad pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/_chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/_chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams 
[\[64b.2\]]yin/_chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/_las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/_don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[64b.3\]]rtogs pa rnams yin/_de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/_kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 
[\[64b.4\]]'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro/_/rab tu 'bar ro/_/kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ro/_/kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/_zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so/_/kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[64b.5\]]gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/_de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go/_/chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/chos 
[\[64b.6\]]thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad yang dag pa ji 
[\[64b.7\]]lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so/_/de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/_de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]snyam du sems so/_/de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so/_/des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs so/_/don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[65a.2\]]du rab tu rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo /_/de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar bar byed de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas/_de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan 
[\[65a.3\]]na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go/_/chos thams cad sems can med pa dang /_srog 
[\[65a.4\]]med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa dang /_byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang /_shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang /_gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang /_stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang /_rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/_
[\[65a.5\]]rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/_/'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/_/chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/_/'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang /_
[\[65a.6\]]gang zag med pa dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po med pa dang /_shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang /_gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang /_stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang /_rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/_/'di ni 
[\[65a.7\]]chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o/_/gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o/_/gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul ba de ni rigs pa'o/_/gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o/_/gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o/_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/
[\[65b.2\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/_spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/_spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/_spobs pa mi brtabs pa rnams yin/_spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/_spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/_spobs pa phal 
[\[65b.3\]]la med pa rnams yin/_spobs pa zil gyis ma non pa rnams yin/_spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/
[\[65b.4\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/_mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/_mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/_yeng 
[\[65b.5\]]yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/_de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/_tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/_sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/_dus dang bral ba ma yin/_rtsub pa ma yin/_mi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.6\]]rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'dar 'dar po ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.7\]]rnams kyi spobs pa ni zhan pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/_seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngangs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]spobs pa ni yeng yeng po med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yeng yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[66a.2\]]rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/_chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang 
[\[66a.3\]]bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu gtsug lag gi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/_gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[66a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/_sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/byang 
[\[66a.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba'am/_gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin/_tshod shes pa yin/_skabs shes pa yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[66a.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_mi snyan pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/_gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/
[\[66a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/_dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jam par smra ba rnams yin/_bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams 
[\[66b.2\]]yin/_don du smra ba rnams yin/_chos su smra ba rnams yin/_mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/_mi ngoms pa rnams yin/_brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/_'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/_spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[66b.3\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/_'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/_mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni 
[\[66b.4\]]tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/
[\[66b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' mi ngoms pa ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs 
[\[66b.6\]]par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul des pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu 
[\[66b.7\]]bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston te/_zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/_klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/_mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/_ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/_ma dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/_
[\[67a.2\]]g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la ma yin/_'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/_sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston te/_rigs 
[\[67a.3\]]kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/_chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa yang med/_sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi/_sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[67a.4\]]chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/_bcom 
[\[67a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to/_/sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang /_snod du gyur pa rnams dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /_g.yo med pa rnams dang /_
[\[67a.6\]]sgyu med pa rnams dang /_spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang /_tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang /_legs par ston 
[\[67a.7\]]nus pa rnams dang /_dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub 
[\[67b.2\]]pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/_/byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang 
[\[67b.3\]]dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/_/nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba yang mi dmigs so/_/skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa yang mi dmigs so/_/rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[67b.4\]]pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa yang mi dmigs so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs/_phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya 
[\[67b.5\]]ba'i phyir chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston 
[\[67b.6\]]kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs so/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 
[\[67b.7\]]ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/_yi ge rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten/_tha snyad la brten/_brtags pa la brten te/_ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/_ming de yang gsog go/_/gsob bo/_/gang gsog dang gsob de la don dam 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa med do/_/gang la don dam pa med pa de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te slu ba'i chos so/_/gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing slu ba'i chos de ni byis pa skye bo slu ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no//_//'phags pa dkon 
[\[68a.2\]]mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs las kyang 
[\[68a.3\]]mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung /_chos 
[\[68a.4\]]kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'byung /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la/_sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 
[\[68a.5\]]'brang la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang /_chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/_de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[68a.6\]]bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab can rnams yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/_sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_
[\[68a.7\]]shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/_gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/_stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/_de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/_de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnas so/_/de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad 
[\[68b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de shin tu 
[\[68b.3\]]yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no/_/de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no/_/stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go/_/de lam 
[\[68b.4\]]du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig 
[\[68b.5\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[68b.6\]]pa/_de ni de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin te/_'di ni yi ge dag 
[\[68b.7\]]gis gdams par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_spros pa 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]thams cad dang bral ba blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/_phye ba dang /_btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/_rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_
[\[69a.2\]]mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/_mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_rnam par 
[\[69a.3\]]shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_gnas ma yin pa/_mi gnas pa/_zhi ba/_'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/_de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa/_dri ma med pa/_ma gos pa dang /_rnam par dag pa/_gya nom pa/_mchog_/dam pa/_phul/_rtag pa/_
[\[69a.4\]]brtan pa/_ther zug_/mi 'jig pa'i chos can te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung ste/_chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob nas sems can dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do 
[\[69a.5\]]snyam ste/_don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/bsam 
[\[69a.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/_/gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/_ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[69a.7\]]kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o/_/rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/_
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo /_/lus kyis ni mngon du byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[69b.2\]]rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba'am/_bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ma yin te/_thos pa tsam 'am/_bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig 
[\[69b.3\]]pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'brog chen por dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/_mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/_de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/_de yang dpyid 
[\[69b.4\]]kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/_kye skyes bu kho bo dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/_skom gyis nyen na/_gang na mtsho 'am/_lteng ka'am/_rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa/_gsal bas 
[\[69b.5\]]gang ba yod de/_gang du bdag tsha ba dang /_skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/_shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa/_lam mkhas pa/_lam mthong ba/_lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/_des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu 
[\[69b.6\]]sngon chad mthong la/_sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/_des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/_kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/_g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang /_nags tshal de'i dbus na mtsho 'am/_
[\[69b.7\]]lteng ka'am/_rdzing bu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/_der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang /_tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/_skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des chu thos ma thag 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dang /_bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/_skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/_chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas/_des chu der zhugs 
[\[70a.2\]]te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang /_bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig 
[\[70a.3\]]pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/_/de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/mi dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can 
[\[70a.4\]]rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/_chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/_don dam pa'i chos nyid 
[\[70a.5\]]kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/_lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_gya nom pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[70a.6\]]zhim pa dang /_reg na bde ba las brtsams te/_bsngags pa brjod na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[70a.7\]]rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/_bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig gis shing thog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/_des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ro phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dri zhim pa las brtsams te brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_ci mi des shing thog gi ro des rang 
[\[70b.2\]]gis rig par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/_bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[70b.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 
[\[70b.4\]]'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu de dag 
[\[70b.5\]]gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[70b.6\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[70b.7\]]rab tu shes/_shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/_don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/_
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang /_stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis med par yang mi ltung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[71a.2\]]dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/_nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/_spros pa thams cad 
[\[71a.3\]]dang bral ba rnams yin/_rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_rnam par shes 
[\[71a.4\]]pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/_rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[71a.5\]]rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa'ang de 'dra na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam 
[\[71a.6\]]gyis mi khyab bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na/_sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam/_tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/_mi 
[\[71a.7\]]dmigs kyi/_tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa/_rgya che ba nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_rtog ge pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/_dmigs pa can 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/_de ni brtag pa 'am/_bsam pa 'am/_gzhal ba 'am/_tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 
[\[71b.2\]]la skabs phye na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig_/byang chub sems 
[\[71b.3\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bdag bstod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsung na/_de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so 
[\[71b.4\]]legs so/_/khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan 
[\[71b.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang /_rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa 
[\[71b.6\]]dang /_bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dang /_shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'am/_kha gsag byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_
[\[71b.7\]]rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bstan pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/_de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/_dman tshegs la mos pa/_shes 
[\[72a.2\]]rab chung ba/_dad pa chung ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/_de'ang nan tan gyis sgrub bo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[72a.3\]]ste/_dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/_sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/_sa'i phyogs de na 'ang sman pa gcig pur zad de gnyis su med la/_de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang /_de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug 
[\[72a.4\]]bsngal ba/_nad kyis nyen pa/_sman la mi mkhas pa/_gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/_bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/_sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste/_nad la mkhas pa'o nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o/_/sman la mkhas 
[\[72a.5\]]pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang /_sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to/_/de nas sman pa des sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_sman pa de bdag 
[\[72a.6\]]la bstod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/_nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/_nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_nyon 
[\[72a.7\]]mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas pa/_chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin yang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/_nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/_de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang /_bsngags 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa bdag nyid brjod de/_de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas/_yid ches par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to/_/de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po 
[\[72b.2\]]chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/_chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa dang /_byams pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/_bdag 
[\[72b.3\]]la bdag nyid bstod pa mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[72b.4\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_khams gsum pa dang /_byang chub dang /_lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral 
[\[72b.5\]]ba ste/_mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/_/bcu 
[\[72b.6\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyi tse ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_phan 
[\[72b.7\]]pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can sdug 
[\[73a.2\]]bsngal ba dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_rten med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/_byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing rtsol/_brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_dka' bar spyod pa brgya 
[\[73a.3\]]dag kyang byed do/_/de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/_'di lta ste/_sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/_tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/_gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/_le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/_sems 
[\[73a.4\]]'khrugs pa rnams bsam gtan la/_sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed kyang /_sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_rtsub pa/_tsha ba dag gis nyen kyang byang chub la phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang 
[\[73a.5\]]chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag gis 'khor 
[\[73a.6\]]ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal lo zhes rab tu dga' 
[\[73a.7\]]ba skyed do/_/bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis/_da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag nyid ni 'jig rten 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gnas pa/_yun ring po nas gnyid la sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin pa/_gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyis/_da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang /_ngan song dang /_log par ltung ba thams 
[\[73b.2\]]cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis/_da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/_grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang 
[\[73b.3\]]'khyam zhing lam la mi mkhas la/_lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[73b.4\]]dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/_mig gis 
[\[73b.5\]]rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/_gnod par mi 'gyur/_rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_
[\[73b.6\]]lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/_gnod par mi 'gyur/_rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'du byed kyi 
[\[73b.7\]]sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smas par mi 'gyur/_gnod par mi 'gyur/_rma byung 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/_de dag la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar gyur to zhes btang snyoms su 
[\[74a.2\]]gnas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shi 'pho 
[\[74a.3\]]ba'ang ston/_skye ba'ang ston/_btsas pa dang /_byis pa'i spyod pa dang /_slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/_mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston/_dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/_bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/_chos 
[\[74a.4\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam 
[\[74a.5\]]pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[74a.6\]]las khyad zhugs pa/_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba/_mi mnyam pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa shi 'pho bar mthong na/_rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/_mi rtag pa'i 'du 
[\[74a.7\]]shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/_dad pa yod rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dong /_
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]mi rten bsnyen bkur mi byed cing /_de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/_bdag cag kyang 'khod de/_dus kyang ring du yod kyis labs kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ston te/_
[\[74b.2\]]de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing /_de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/_bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang 
[\[74b.3\]]chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa de dag gi mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can 
[\[74b.4\]]gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang /_byis pa'i spyod pa dang /_slas kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang /_byis pa'i spyod pa dang /_
[\[74b.5\]]slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu sems 
[\[74b.6\]]can gang dag lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa/_de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[74b.7\]]sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]ston la/_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /_
[\[75a.2\]]rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas rlom pa yod de/_de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[75a.3\]]'tshang rgya ba ston te/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang /_ca co sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 
[\[75a.4\]]'gyur te/_de dag gis mthu de mthong na/_bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang /_ston par dam bca' 
[\[75a.5\]]la de dag gis 'byung ba dang /_phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang /_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi'i grong rdal du song nas 
[\[75a.6\]]chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/_des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[75a.7\]]dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]par spangs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi dge ba'i chos las phyir ldog pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/_ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/_bsod nams bya ba 
[\[75b.2\]]la brtson pa rnams yin/_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/_smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis 
[\[75b.3\]]sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang tshor ba mi bzad pa/_rtsub pa/_tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/_yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/_byang 
[\[75b.4\]]chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/_de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis byol song gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[75b.5\]]de dag tu skyes nas kyang byol song gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang /_rkyen de dang /_gzhi des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub par myong bar 'gyur ba 
[\[75b.6\]]med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag 
[\[75b.7\]]yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/_de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_yangs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing /_bsnyen pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_
[\[76a.2\]]bsgoms pa dang /_mang du byas pas dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing /_dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun pa/_rmongs pa/_lug 
[\[76a.3\]]ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/_skal ba med pa/_legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/_mar mi shes pa/_phar mi shes pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi skye'i/_
[\[76a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/_dbang po gsal ba/_mkhas pa/_mkhas par bkur ba/_skal ba yod pa/_legs par bshad pa dang /_nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 
[\[76a.5\]]gyur pa/_phar shes pa/_mar shes pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sngon gyi shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu 
[\[76a.6\]]med par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/_lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'i/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni thabs mkhas 
[\[76a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang /_chos mi thos pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'i/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mnga' ba dang /_dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/_
[\[76b.2\]]skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang 
[\[76b.3\]]chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang /_nem nur dang /_the tsom med pa rnams yin/_chos la slob 
[\[76b.4\]]dpon 'chab pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/_ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/_de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang 
[\[76b.5\]]zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/_theg pa chen po la gzhol/_theg pa chen po la 'bab/_theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/_chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa 
[\[76b.6\]]rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/_
[\[76b.7\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/_'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/_sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/_dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/_sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin/_rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/_rnam par 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin te/_de de'i 
[\[77a.2\]]rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang /_srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo /_/klog go/_/kun chub par byed do/_/gzhan la yang rgya cher ston to/_/de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa 
[\[77a.3\]]gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/_de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/_sgrib pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin/_dga' ba mang bas sgom pa 
[\[77a.4\]]mang ba yin/_sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/_/sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/_'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir 
[\[77a.5\]]tshe rabs dran pa yin te tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no/_/gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub 
[\[77a.6\]]sems dpa' tshe rabs rjes su dran pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_chos mnyan pa 
[\[77a.7\]]dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_gdud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_mang du thos pa'i gang 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/_tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams 
[\[77b.2\]]yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa 
[\[77b.3\]]rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o/_/lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa'i 
[\[77b.4\]]gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_khyim pa dang sten 
[\[77b.5\]]pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par spong ba'i tshe/_gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/khong khro ba'i sems dang /_
[\[77b.6\]]brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/_des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor bsten te/_bsten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/_de bas na bdag gis bsten pa yongs su spang bar sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[77b.7\]]bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus mnyam pa rnams yin/_lus yongs su 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]dag pa rnams yin/_lus rma med pa rnams yin/_lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/_chos kyi lus rnams yin/_lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/_lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/_lus zhi ba rnams yin/_lus nam 
[\[78a.2\]]mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/_ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[78a.3\]]ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus mi mnyam pa thams cad dang 
[\[78a.4\]]bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba dang /_gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i 
[\[78a.5\]]phyir lus rma med pa 'thob bo/_/sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa 'thob bo/_/sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob bo/_/sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag 
[\[78a.6\]]dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo/_/sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob bo/_/sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad bral ba dang /_nyon 
[\[78a.7\]]mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo/_/sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo/_/sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba 
[\[78b.2\]]med de/_yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/_yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[78b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_
[\[78b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bas na don gyi dbang 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che 
[\[78b.5\]]dang /_byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/_nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i mthu dang /_yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa de ltar ni byi dor ma byas pas ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang 
[\[78b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do/_/
[\[78b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /_dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/_byang chub sems 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/_zla ba nya ba'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes 
[\[79a.2\]]bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_byang chub 
[\[79a.3\]]sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lam mer mi 'gyur/_lhan ner mi 'gyur/_lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba nya ba'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i 
[\[79a.4\]]mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/_yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_khro 
[\[79a.5\]]ba dang /_gnod sems kyi tha ba dang /_dri ma dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_sems 
[\[79a.6\]]can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_mu stegs can dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis 
[\[79a.7\]]mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bkur ba rnams yin/_mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/_phyin par byed pa rnams yin/_brtan par bya ba rnams yin/_nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/_rgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_
[\[79b.2\]]tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/_mi ngoms pa rnams yin/_thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen 
[\[79b.3\]]pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang /_rgyal po chen po'i blon po dag gis bkur ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[79b.4\]]kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong ba dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_
[\[79b.5\]]gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par lam grogs kyi tshogs 'chan pas gtses 
[\[79b.6\]]pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin te/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs nyon mongs pa'i 'chan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa 
[\[79b.7\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu ba rnams 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[80a.2\]]dpa'i ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te lam grogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/_
[\[80a.3\]]grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can lam grogs mang po dang de 
[\[80a.4\]]'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_
[\[80a.5\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru la sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs su 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs 
[\[80a.6\]]shin tu bsags shing 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta 
[\[80a.7\]]ste/_nor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_dbang yod pa dang /_ngag mnyan pas lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/_yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yongs kyi gtso bo dang /_chos 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]la dbang ba dang /_ma log par smra bas sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad 
[\[80b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded 
[\[80b.3\]]dpon chen po rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/_lam nyam nga ba'ang rab tu shes/_lam bde ba'ang rab tu shes/_'tsham pa'i lam yang rab 
[\[80b.4\]]tu shes/_lam chu che ba dang /_chu med pa yang rab tu shes/_lam gyi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes/_lam gyis tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/_lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes/_lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/_lam 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[80b.5\]]bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/_byang chub sems 
[\[80b.6\]]dpa'i lam ston gyi nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to/_/nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston to/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 
[\[80b.7\]]mi ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang /_chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang /_stong pa 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]nyid kyi lam ston gyi/_bdag dang sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag gi lam mi ston to/_/mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/_mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to/_/
[\[81a.2\]]sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to/_/spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to/_/'khor ba la mngon par dga' 
[\[81a.3\]]ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi 'khor ba'i lam mi ston to/_/lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang /_tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam mi ston to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
