[\[81a.4\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/
[\[81a.5\]]tshor ba rnams dang /_sems dang chos rnams dang /_yul rnams dang /_dgon pa rnams dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_gzhongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa dang /_
[\[81a.6\]]sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_yongs su nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na 
[\[81a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo /_/de 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams te/_
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]yar la klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go/_/lus la bdag med par yang rtog go/_/lus mi brtan pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_chu rgyus kyis glags pa dang /_dri mi zhim pa dang /_dri nga ba dang /_kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/_de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/_gang lus la 
[\[81b.2\]]lus su 'dod pa dang /_lus la 'dod chags pa dang /_lus la dga' ba dang /_lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /_lus la zhen pa de dag mi 'byung ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i 
[\[81b.3\]]chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/_de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[81b.4\]]thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/_byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/_byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gyis 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud do snyam nas de spang ba'i phyir nan tan du byed do/_/
[\[81b.5\]]sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/_de de ltar rtog pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang med/_khong khro ba'ang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab 
[\[81b.6\]]tu zhugs pa yin no/_/gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/_de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems 'di ni mi rtag 
[\[81b.7\]]pa la rtag par mngon par dga' ba'o/_/sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o/_/bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o/_/mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o/_/g.yo zhing mi brtan pa la myur du 'gyur ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o/_/bde 'gro rnams chud son pa'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du gyur pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi 
[\[82a.2\]]thog mar sems 'gro ste/_sems yongs su shes na chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/_sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo /_/dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o/_/sems ni 
[\[82a.3\]]mgal me lta bur 'khor/_/sems ni rta ltar 'khyam pa yin/_sems ni nags kyi me ltar 'tshig_/sems ni chu chen bzhin du skyed/_/de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/_sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro'i sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/_sems de'i 
[\[82a.4\]]dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/_
[\[82a.5\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa dang /_de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing 
[\[82a.6\]]de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/_/chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/_chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shing gnas so/_/gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[82a.7\]]chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/_de ni bdag byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas par 
[\[82b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro/_/zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/rmongs nas dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'i chos rnam par bsgom par mi 'gyur te/_de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs so zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos 
[\[82b.3\]]gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/_de ni bdag gi mi bzod pa dang /_dang du mi len pa dang /_khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/_'phags pa rnams kyis ni smad par 'gyur/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni dpya bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar rtog 
[\[82b.4\]]pas yul rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/_yul rnams kyis mi smas shing rma byung bar mi 'gyur la/_gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang 
[\[82b.5\]]chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/dgon pa la ni lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[82b.6\]]dang /_dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/_de dag bdag gi sems dang /_sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/_bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/_de tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la 
[\[82b.7\]]bya ba thams cad dang bral nas tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]grong rdal dang /_gzhongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_gzhongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_
[\[83a.2\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongs su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'thun pa de dag yongs su spong ngo /_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste chang ma'i khyim 'am/_smad 'tshong gi khyim 'am/_rgyal 
[\[83a.3\]]po'i pho brang ngam/_brgyan po'i gnas sam/_ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/_gar mkhan dang /_glu gar gyi gnas dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/_rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spang zhing /_de dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/_
[\[83a.4\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_gzhongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa 
[\[83a.5\]]dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la sems gtong ste/_ci nas kyang zhen par mi 'gyur/_sred 
[\[83a.6\]]pa mi skyed/_chags pa mi skyed/_bdag gir mi byed/_nor du mi 'dzin/_bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang /_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/_gal te yang de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i 
[\[83a.7\]]gzhis grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur/_nga rgyal mi skye/_rgyags pa mi skye ste/_de 'di snyam du sems so/_/ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang /_gang 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]gis phyung ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur na/_de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa/_yid brtan du mi rung ba dag la dga' ba'i sems 
[\[83b.2\]]skyes pa'am/_khengs par 'gyur ba'am/_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/
[\[83b.3\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/_mngon par 
[\[83b.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[83b.5\]]pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes de de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te/_brtson par byed pa dang /_legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin 
[\[83b.6\]]te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_yongs su nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran 
[\[83b.7\]]pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_yongs su nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag gang las byung ba dang /_rkyen gang gis 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]byung ba'i gzhi yang rab tu shes te/_des de ltar shes nas 'byung ba de dang /_rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_yongs su nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la 
[\[84a.2\]]dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no//_//'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[84a.3\]]bam po drug pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/_sems dma' ba rnams yin/_yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/_de la ma zhen pa 
[\[84a.4\]]rnams yin/_nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/_bdag la mi stod pa rnams yin/_gzhan la mi smod pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_lha 'du ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang 
[\[84a.5\]]chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas/_ji ltar na lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing yid ches pa yin/_de srog gi phyir yang yang dag 
[\[84a.6\]]par blangs pa mi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/_de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_de sems dma' zhing nga rgyal med pa yin/_de nga rgyal med cing sems dma' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor ba skye bo thams cad dang mi 
[\[84a.7\]]'thun pa dag sdud do/_/de dag bsdus nas 'khru bar byed do/_/de 'khru ba dang /_klan pa dang /_btsem pa dang /_btso bar byed pa na kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su mi skyo ste/_yongs su mi skyo ba rkyen du byas nas ji tsam gyis don 'grub par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhigs pa'o/_/kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sbom pa'o/_/kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni shig mang ba ste/_lus la mi bde zhing rngul 'byin to zhes nyes par lta ba ma yin gyi/_phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni drang srong 
[\[84b.2\]]gis bgos pa'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/'phags pa'i rigs dang 'thun pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yin te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i 
[\[84b.3\]]gzhis bdag la mi stod/_gzhan la mi smod do/_/bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/_byang chub 
[\[84b.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba yin/_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gzengs bstod par bya ba yin 
[\[84b.5\]]te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa dman tshegs kyis ci zhig 
[\[84b.6\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor ba yin te/_stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang 'thun par spyod kyi stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' stobs 
[\[84b.7\]]kyi mthu ma thob pas ni nyon mongs pa ma langs pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam/_'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshig mi phyin to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa la smos pa lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[85a.2\]]pa ni chos gzigs pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang la yang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[85a.3\]]dri za mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la spyod pa dman tshegs ston cing de dag gi mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ci'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag de lta bus 
[\[85a.4\]]'dul ba'i slad du ste/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi 
[\[85a.5\]]mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir phyag dar khrod par 'gyur gyi/_dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams 
[\[85a.6\]]yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chog shes pa rnams yin/_'dod pa chung ba rnams yin/_kun tu btsal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_bsags pa chud zos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_bsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang 
[\[85a.7\]]bral ba rnams yin/_yid mi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_'khrug pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_len pa med pa rnams yin/_zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chung ba yin/_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin/_kun tu tshol ba med pas na sogs pa med pa yin/_sogs pa med pas na bsags pa chud za ba med pa yin/_bsags pa chud za ba med pas na/_bsags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin/_sdug 
[\[85b.2\]]bsngal med pas na yid mi bde ba med pa yin/_yid mi bde ba med pas na 'khrug pa med pa yin/_'khrug pa med pas na len pa med pa yin/_len pa med pas na zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[85b.3\]]chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying pa can rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi bsam pas mi 'gro ste/_de'i phyir phying pa can zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsam pas mi 'gro/_gti 
[\[85b.4\]]mug gi bsam pas mi 'gro/_khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas mi 'gro/_phrag dog dang ser sna'i bsam pas mi 'gro/_nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/_grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/_shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i 
[\[85b.5\]]bsam pas mi 'gro zhing bdud la mi 'dud/_dga' bar bya bas snyems pa ma yin te/_de'i phyir phying pa can zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying pa can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms 
[\[85b.6\]]pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin/_mthar gyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/_yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/_chog shes pa rnams yin/_bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang 
[\[85b.7\]]tshul can rnams yin/_ma chags pa rnams yin/_bsod snyoms bza' ba la tshod shes pa rnams yin/_dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin/_ril po'i 'du shes med pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa yin pa nas/_ji ltar na ril po'i 'du shes med pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan 
[\[86a.2\]]pa sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na/_sems can de dag la phan par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa'i yi dam 'dzin te/_de nam grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong 'dab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag pa dang /_spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po mi g.yo 
[\[86a.3\]]ba dang /_dbang po mi rgod pa dang /_dbang po dul ba dang /_gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba dang /_dge ba'i chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o/_/de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na bsod snyoms mthar gyis len pa yin te/_mgo 'phang 
[\[86a.4\]]bstod cing bram ze'i rigs shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong ngam/_rgyal rigs shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong ngam/_khyim bdag shing sa la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong 'byor pa dag tu mi 'jug gi mtha' gcig nas bzung ste/_nam de'i don grub par gyur gyi bar du bsod snyoms 
[\[86a.5\]]la spyod de/_gzhan du na gnas gang na khyi za ba'am/_ba drus ma'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul ngan pa'i srog chags sam/_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo kyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod pa'am/_smad pa'i 
[\[86a.6\]]gnas thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/_de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la 'gro na yongs su yi mi 'chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med la/_sems can de dag la chags pa yang mi skyed/_khong khro ba yang mi skyed de/_yongs su yi 'chad pa med pas so so ci rigs pa'i bsod 
[\[86a.7\]]snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog shes pa yin te/_des bsod snyoms de blangs nas bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bzhag_/rkang lag bkrus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti dang /_rim 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]gro byas te/_gnas su song nas/_bsod snyoms de las cha gcig ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir gzhag go/_/gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyir gzhag go/_/gsum pa ni sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi phyir gzhag go/_/cha bzhi pa ni bdag za ste/_
[\[86b.2\]]de za ba na 'dod chags med par za ste/_chags par ma yin/_brkam par ma yin/_zhen par ma yin gyi/_gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/_ji ltar ha cang yang nyams dma' ba dang /_ha cang yang lus lci bar mi 'gyur ba de 
[\[86b.3\]]ltar za ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ha cang yang nyams dmas na ni dge ba'i phyogs la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/lus ha kyang lcis na ni gnyid kyis non par 'gyur ro/_/des bsod snyoms de zos nas dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa 
[\[86b.4\]]dang /_le lo med pa dang /_snyom pa med pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su 'dus pas bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa yin/_bdag tu 'dzin pa med pas bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la phan 
[\[86b.5\]]'dogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bdud thams cad kyis bsdigs kyang byang 
[\[86b.6\]]chub kyi snying po'i stan gcig las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_stong pa nyid 
[\[86b.7\]]las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_lam las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_thams cad 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no/_/rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/_'di ni chos kyi stan no/_/stan de las byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[87a.2\]]de dag mi g.yo ste/_de bas na stan gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_
[\[87a.3\]]mi brkam pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/_mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/_de dag gis nam tshod bzung bar gyur pa de'i tshe nyi tshod yod dam med kyang rung ste/_de dag gi lus rton pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/_mar ram/_'bru mar ram/_sbrang rtsi'am/_bu ram 'am/_
[\[87a.4\]]rtsa ba'i khu ba'am/_sdong po'i khu ba'am/_'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag bzar mi rung ngo /_/gzhan za ba mthong na yang khong khro ba'i sems dang /_'jungs pa'i sems kyang mi skyed do/_/yang gal te zas phyis mi len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog 
[\[87a.5\]]gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'am/_dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te/_nad tshabs che na des 'gyod pa med cing the tsom med par byas la/_sman yin par sems nye bar gzhag pas spyad par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[87a.6\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/_'dul 
[\[87a.7\]]ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/_dbang po ma nyams pa rnams yin/_mang du thos pa rnams yin/_nus pa rnams yin/_bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang 'dra ba rnams yin/_lus kyi thag bsrings pa rnams yin/_dben pa la mngon du 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]phyogs pa rnams yin/_mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin pa nas/_ji ltar na mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[87b.2\]]dpa' legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_chos nyid la mkhas shing cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_'gro ba dang /_phyir 'ong ba la mkhas pas gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rgan rabs 
[\[87b.3\]]dang /_bar ma dang gsar bu rnams kyi bslab pa'i lam bstan pa de la 'di lta ste/_don dang /_tshig dang /_'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis mi bkri ba yin no/_/de ltung ba byung na ltung ba las 'byung ba rab tu shes shing gnas de dag kyang 
[\[87b.4\]]yongs su spong ngo /_/gnas de dag la gus pa byed cing 'chags pa mang ba yin no/_/sdig pa de la smod cing 'gyod de mthol bar byed do/_/gnas gang dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/_gang dag tu mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/_gang dag tu chen 
[\[87b.5\]]por 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag tu 'bring dang /_gang dag tu chung ngur 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/_gang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i yun ji srid pa de dag yang rab tu shes te/_de yang nan tan gyis sgrub bo/_/de mig gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang /_rna ba'i dbang po ma nyams 
[\[87b.6\]]shing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon pa na gnas te/_gnas gang na 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas so/_/gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms blangs pa'i spyod yul dang /_ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /_gnas gang dag na chu dang 
[\[87b.7\]]zhing rnyog pa med pa/_gtsang zhing dri ma med pa/_tshegs chung ba yod pa dang /_gnas gang dag na shing phun sum tshogs pa/_me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/_gcan gzan khro bo med pa/_phug dang ldan pa/_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]sman gshong dang ldan pa/_thag thug med pa/_'gro na bde ba/_zhi ba gnyis su med pa'i gnas de 'dra ba dag na gnas so/_/de gnas de dag na gnas shing gang des sngon blags pa dang /_sngon thos pa de nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sgra ha cang 
[\[88a.2\]]yang mi che ha cang yang mi chung ba dang /_dbang po mi rgod cing phyi rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyi dad pas nye bar 'tsho zhing tshig nye bar bzung ste/_mtshan ma 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma log par kha thon byed do/_/gal te dge slong dgon pa pa'i drung du rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po 
[\[88a.3\]]'am/_de ma yin pa gzhan bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_grong pa'am/_yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na/_des de dag la gus par legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya ste/_des rgyal po chen po ji ltar gdan bting pa la bzhugs shig ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug na 
[\[88a.4\]]gnyi ga yang 'dug par bya'o/_/de ste mi 'dug na gnyi ga yang mi 'dug par bya'o/_/gal te dbang po rgod par gyur na rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis phyogs na dge slong dang /_bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_mang du thos pa dag mi rgod dang /_
[\[88a.5\]]spre'u rnams kyis ma gtses par gnas pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bstod par bya'o/_/de ste brtan zhing dul la dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te/_chos bstan par rung na de la chos sna tshogs bstan par bya'o/_/de ste chos sna tshogs bstan pa la mi dga' na de la skyo ba 
[\[88a.6\]]dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o/_/de ste skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa la mi dga' na de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rgya che ba/_rgya che ba dag bstan par bya'o/_/bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na yang ci rigs par bya 
[\[88a.7\]]ba dag bya'o/_/de de ltar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/_sems can de dag kyang de la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_nyon mongs pa kun nas langs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yang nus pa yin no/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]mang du thos pa'i stobs bskyed pas bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no/_/de bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bas dgon pa de na mi 'jigs/_mi skrag_/mi dngang bag tsha ba med cing /_rab tu dben pa la mngon tu phyogs par gyur te gnas so/_/de dgon pa 
[\[88b.2\]]de na dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing 'du 'dzi med par gnas pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang 'dra ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ltar rtag tu 'jigs pa ma yin te/_de la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nyes pa yang med mod kyi/_ji ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bdag 'di'i lan bon gyis 
[\[88b.3\]]srog gi bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yul dang yul gyi phyogs ring po bas kyang ring por spong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdag 'di'i lan bon gyis yi dam gyi bar chad dam/_sems g.yengs par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo 
[\[88b.4\]]rnams dang 'du 'dzi mi byed cing 'du 'dzi dag thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo /_/de de ltar thag bsrings te gnas pas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/_de rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs pas dgon pa de la yon tan du lta ba dang /_zhi bar lta ba yin/_
[\[88b.5\]]de yon tan du lta zhing zhi bar lta bas na mi dga' ba dang mi 'dre'o/_/mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pas na dgon pa'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs nas spyod de/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa nas mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin 
[\[88b.6\]]no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shing drung pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong dang ha cang nye ba'i shing drung du mi rten/_grong dang ha cang ring ba'i shing 
[\[88b.7\]]drung du mi rten/_ldam ldum tsher ma can gyis gang ba'i shing drung du mi rten/_shing ma lu ta dang /_ka bya ka tsu'i 'khri shing gis gang ba'i shing drung du mi rten/_shing lo ma skams pa'i shing drung du mi rten/_spre'u gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/_bya gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/_gcan gzan 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]khro bo gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/_'dron po gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/_mi g.yon can gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten gyi/_gang na lus bag yangs shing sems dga' bar 'gyur ba'i shing drung de lta bur rten to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang 
[\[89a.2\]]chub sems dpa' shing drung ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgun nam/_dpyid dam/_dbyar ram/_ston yang rung ste/_rtsig drung na mi gnas/_shing drung na ma 
[\[89a.3\]]yin/_sog ma spungs par ma yin/_ri'i sman gshong du ma yin/_chu lkog tu ma yin/_grang ba skyob par yang mi byed/_rlung skyob par ma yin/_char pa skyob pa ma yin/_nyi ma skyob pa ma yin/_ba mo'i skyabs kyang mi byed kyi/_gzhan du na gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla 
[\[89a.4\]]gab med pa pa na ma lus kyis mi nus par gyur na/_des gtsug lag khang du gnas te nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcas te/_ci nas kyang bdag gtsug lag khang na gnas bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar 'bad pa de ltar bya'o 
[\[89a.5\]]zhes de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang de la yang chags pa mi skyed de zhen par yang ma yin no/_/de yang 'di ltar sems te/_sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams la phan gdags par bya'i/_bdag cag gis bdag nyid gso bar mi bya'o snyam ste/_de rtag tu rgyun mi chad 
[\[89a.6\]]par bla gab med pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas gang 
[\[89a.7\]]na gnas kyang rung /_skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/_de dag shi ba'i 'du shes rtag tu rgyun mi chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin/_de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par rul par 'du shes 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa dang /_rnam par bam par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang /_keng rus su 'du shes pa rtag tu rgyun mi chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas ni byams pa'i sems 
[\[89b.2\]]su bya'o/_/phan pa'i sems dang /_sems can la snying brtse ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_gtsang sbra'i cho ga dang ldan zhing sha dang 'bags pa med par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dur khrod gam yo na ni byang chub sems dpa' sha za ba mthong na ma dad pa skye zhing 
[\[89b.3\]]gtse bar sems pa'i mi ma yin pa dag gnas pa yod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag byas dge slong rgan rabs rnams la phyag byas te/_gsar bu rnams kyang dga' bar 
[\[89b.4\]]byas la 'greng ste 'dug par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyar bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten dang mi 'thun gyi/_'phags 
[\[89b.5\]]pa dang ni mi 'thun pa med do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa gang zag gi mal stan la bdar na des ci nas kyang 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/_gzhan gyis kyang dpya bar mi 'gyur bar shin tu rtogs par byas la/_dge slong de'i bsam pa yang shes nas gdod stan de la gdol bu dang 
[\[89b.6\]]'dra bar dma' ba'i sems kyis stan de la 'dug par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus yongs su 
[\[89b.7\]]gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/_sems yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/_gnyid kyis non te 'dug pa ma yin/_lus dub pas 'dug pa ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa 'dug pa ni byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su bkang ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/sems rtse gcig 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]tu bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/lam mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dug go/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[90a.2\]]dpa' cog pu pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mal stan la ma chags pa rnams yin/_bdag nyid kyang mal stan mi 'ding /_gzhan dag kyang 'ding du mi 'jug_/gding 
[\[90a.3\]]ba'i phyir brda mi byed cing /_gzhan du na lo mas gang ba'am/_rtswas gang ba'i gnas kyang rung ste/_gnas de dag tu nyal bar byed cing sa gang gi phyogs na sbrul gyis gang ba'am/_sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang gis gang ba'am/_khung mang ba de dag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo /_/
[\[90a.4\]]de dag nyal ba na glo g.yas pas nyal bar byed de/_rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas/_lus chos gos dag gis shin tu g.yogs shing dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldang ba'i 'du shes su nyal bar byed de/_gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par mi byed/_snyes pa'i 
[\[90a.5\]]bde ba la yang ma yin te/_gzhan du na de dag ci tsam du 'byung ba chen po rnams gnas shing 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed la/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yang dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji 
[\[90a.6\]]bzhin pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_byams pa bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa mang 
[\[90a.7\]]ba rnams yin/_skyon la mkhas pa mang ba rnams yin/_stong pa nyid bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_mtshan ma med pa bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_rnal 'byor bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_rgyun du bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/_'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims phun 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par song ste/_nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing shin tu skyo ba'i 
[\[90b.2\]]sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang /_lus bags kyis glod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/_phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis de 'di snyam du sems so/_/ji snyed du mi'i nang na kha zas dang /_zas skom gtsang ma yang rung /_bzang po yang rung /_ngan pa 
[\[90b.3\]]yang rung /_ro phun sum tshogs pa yang rung /_ro chung ba yang rung ste/_de thams cad lus kyi mes reg pa dang /_btsog par 'gyur te/_rul cing dri nga ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'phrod pa yin na/_de la byis pa 'di dag ni shin tu zhen cing rab tu chags so/_/bdag cag 
[\[90b.4\]]ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnas te/_yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/_'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma chags par bya'o/_/de'i phyir skyo ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba 
[\[90b.5\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs te/_shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang /_lus 
[\[90b.6\]]bags kyis glod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/_phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so/_/sems can gang dag khro ba dang /_gnod sems mang ba/_mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang /_gang rnams bdag la rgol ba dang /_dgra bo gcugs 
[\[90b.7\]]med par shar gnyer ba rnams byung ba'am/_'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rung ste/_bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang /_gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byas te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'god par bya'o/_/de yang ngag tsam gyis ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas sems te/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes pa dang /_khro ba skyes pa dang /_gnod sems kyi sems skyes na 'di snyam du 
[\[91a.2\]]sems so/_/chos 'di su la skye ba de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/chos gang skye ba de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/rkyen gang dag gis skye ba de dag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gsog de dag la mkhas pa'i rang 
[\[91a.3\]]bzhin can su zhig bdag la rma 'byin snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i phyir 
[\[91a.4\]]nan tan du byed gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa mi nus pa'i rang bzhin de dag la yang btang snyoms su gnas so/_/skyon de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas la ri mo mi byed pa dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_bslab pa dang /_'phags pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[91a.5\]]mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la ri mo mi byed pa ni skyon no/_/bdag la ri mo byed pa dang /_gzhan la brnyas pa dang /_yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems 
[\[91a.6\]]can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_mi rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la mnyes par mi byed pa dang /_byis pa'i skye bo dang sten 
[\[91a.7\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su spong ba dang /_sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang /_mdo sde zab mo spong ba dang /_mdo sde zab mos skrag pa dang /_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]snyom las dang /_le lo dang /_bdag la brnyas pa dang /_gzi brjid chung ba dang /_spobs pa med pa dang /_gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang /_mi 'gyod pa la 'gyod pa dang /_'gyod pa la mi 'gyod pa dang /_sgrib pa kun nas ldang bas glags pa dang /_g.yo sgyus bcings 
[\[91b.2\]]pa dang /_rmugs shing gnyid kyis non pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa dang /_rus la 'dod chags pa dang /_rigs la 'dod chags pa dang /_lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang /_yul la 'dod chags pa dang /_'khor la 'dod chags pa dang /_'jig rten rgyang 
[\[91b.3\]]pan gyi gsang tshig la sten pa dang /_dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang /_yi dam 'dor ba dang /_mi dge ba dang ldan pa dag la rtsol ba dang /_dge ba dang ldan pa dag la mi rtsol ba dang /_rab tu byung ba dang sde ba dang /_skyes pa dang sde ba dang /_bud med dang sde ba dang /_khye'u 
[\[91b.4\]]dang bu mo dang sde ba dang /_mu stegs can dang sde ba dang /_dgon pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_zas kyi tshod mi shes pa dang /_bla ma'i drung du mi 'gro ba dang /_kha ton gyi dus mi shes pa dang /_spyod yul gyi gnas mi shes pa dang /_bslab pa phra mo dag la gus par mi byed pa dang /_
[\[91b.5\]]sdig pa chung ngu rnams la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /_dbang po gti mug gis bsgribs pa dang ldan pa dang /_g.yeng ba la dbang po grims pa dang /_rgod par spyod pa dang /_bcos dka' ba dang /_bka' blo mi bde ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan 
[\[91b.6\]]ma dang /_mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang /_khro ba rnams la sems mi byams pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying mi brtse ba dang /_na bas skyo bar mi byed pa dang /_shi bas mi skrag pa dang /_kun nas 'bar ba las mi 'byung ba dang /_lus la so sor mi rtog pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[91b.7\]]la sor mi rtog pa dang /_ci byas ci byed ci bya zhes so sor mi rtog pa dang /_mi bsam pa la sems pa dang /_mi brtag pa la rtog pa dang /_mi smon pa la smon pa dang /_mi 'byung ba la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /_mi dga' ba la dga' bar 'du shes pa dang /_lam ma yin pa la 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]lam du 'du shes pa dang /_ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang /_'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang /_byed pa ngan pas g.yengs pa dang /_dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par spong ba dang /_theg pa chen po la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[92a.2\]]pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_rtsod pa lhur len pa dang /_'thab pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_
[\[92a.3\]]brlang ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_pho theg can dang /_spyi rtol che ba dang /_gtum pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_ngag mi snyan pa dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_mi gtsigs par smra ba dang /_ngan du smra bas smra ba dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba dang /_spros pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_
[\[92a.4\]]spros pa la gzhol ba ni skyon no/_/de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid sgom pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang de dag 
[\[92a.5\]]la ngo bo nyid yongs su btsal na stong par rtogs so/_/sems de gang yin pa de yang yongs su brtags na stong pa'o/_/gang gis brtags pa de yang stong par rtogs so/_/de de ltar rtogs pas mtshan ma med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de la nang gi mtshan ma gang dang gang snang bar 
[\[92a.6\]]gyur pa de dang de dag mtshan ma med par byed do/_/ci nas kyang lus mi dmigs pa dang /_lus la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang /_lus la sems mi gtong ba dang /_phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams mi dmigs pa dang /_phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang /_
[\[92a.7\]]sems mi gtong ba de ltar mtshan ma med par byed do/_/de phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral ba dang /_lus kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral bas nang gi mtshan ma rnams spang ba'i phyir zhugs te/_sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba skyed do/_/de sgom pa mang bas rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa yin/_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]rgyun mi chad par zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong la gnas pas gnas pa yin/_de la zhi gnas ni sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/lhag mthong ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa'o/_/de sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'gyod pa med cing rab tu dga' ba yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[92b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yin te/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni rnal 'byor yang dag par 'grub bo/_/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams 
[\[92b.3\]]ni rnal 'byor la spyod de/_de bas na rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[92b.4\]]'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi zang zing gi phyir ma yin no/_/bstan pa kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no/_/theg pa chen po la yang 
[\[92b.5\]]dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/_/sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos 
[\[92b.6\]]pa 'dzin to/_/shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes rab kyi mig 'thob par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/_/theg pa chen po la yang 
[\[92b.7\]]dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/_/bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi theg pa chung ngu la ni mi smon to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'dzin pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dul ba yang rab tu shes/_'dul ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes/_'dul ba zab pa yang rab tu shes/_
[\[93a.2\]]'dul ba zhib pa yang rab tu shes/_rung ba dang mi rung ba yang rab tu shes/_rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yang rab tu shes/_bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yang rab tu shes/_so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i gleng gzhi dang 'byung ba yang rab tu shes/_nyan thos kyi 'dul ba yang rab tu shes/_
[\[93a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod yul phun sum 
[\[93a.4\]]tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/_de dag shin 
[\[93a.5\]]tu bslabs pas na cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa'i spyod yul rnams yongs su spong ngo /_/de dag de'i phyir gnas ma yin par mi spyod/_yul ma yin pa dang /_dus ma yin par 
[\[93a.6\]]mi spyod/_de dag dge sbyong gi spyod yul la spyod pas spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram zes 'di lta ste/_don dang mi ldan pa de dang /_des mtshang 'drur med la gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de snyed la 'jog par byed do/_/de dag spyod pa phun sum 
[\[93a.7\]]tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_spyod lam rab tu zhi bas spyod lam bcos pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par 'dzud/_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yin/_gzhan 
[\[93b.2\]]dag gis byin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/_sbyin pa'i bdag po gzhan dag la yang gzengs stod cing rab tu dga' bar byed/_gzhan dag la byin na yang 'di snyam du bdag cag la byin cig gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/bdag cag gir gyur la/_gzhan dag gir ma gyur cig ces sems mi 
[\[93b.3\]]skyed/_'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad 'tsho ba'i yo byad de dang de dag thob par gyur cig ces 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang ldan te bde bar gyur cig_/bdag cag gis kyang de nyid kyi don du 'bad par bya/_btsal bar bya'i/_bdag cag gis der ser 
[\[93b.4\]]sna dang /_phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes sems skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams 
[\[93b.5\]]yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba rnams yin/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad la gnod sems med pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad kyi don kho nar sbyin pa dag 
[\[93b.6\]]sbyin/_tshul khrims srung /_bzod pa sgom/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/_shes rab sgom/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par sgrub mod kyi/_gnyis la gnas pa'i sems kyis sgrub pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad la thun 
[\[93b.7\]]mong gi sems dang /_sems can thams cad la dmigs pas sgrub ste/_ci nas kyang chos nyid myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub bo/_/de dag 'khor ba rab tu 'bar ba nas bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/_de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar bzhag cing 'byin 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gyi sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin te/_khong khro bas ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag la bu sdug pa phangs pa byams pa yid du 'ong ba drug cig yod la/_bu de dag la tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de mtshungs par byams 
[\[94a.2\]]shing /_mtshungs par sbyor bar gyur pa las de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/_gog pa mi shes pa mi mkhas pa dag cig yod la/_de nas tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de'i khyim me thar te/_de'i bu de dag kyang so so na 'khod par gyur na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[94a.3\]]tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de 'di ni sngar je dbyung ngo /_/de nas phyis 'di dbyung ngo snyam du de ltar sems sam/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon nam 
[\[94a.4\]]khyim bdag de bu rnams la sems snyoms pas de gang dang gang dag ji ltar mjal ba de dang de nyid de bzhin du 'byin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang 'dra ste/_'phags 
[\[94a.5\]]pa rnams ni ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' de byis pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa/_'gro ba drug so so na gnas pa de dag 'khor ba'i khyim me thar ba nas gang dang gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid de ltar 'byin to/_/phyung nas kyang mya ngan las 'das 
[\[94a.6\]]pa'i dbyings zhi bar rab tu gzhog go/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la 
[\[94a.7\]]mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi zang zing gi mchod pas ni ma yin no/_/nan tan gyis mchod pa dang /_sems can rnams la phan zhing bde 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bar bya ba dang /_sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi don la zhugs pa dang /_yi dam mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i las mi gtong ba dang /_ji ltar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang /_yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[94b.2\]]sems mi gtong bas rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/_zang zing gi mchod pas ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi sku ste/_chos la mchod na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[94b.3\]]la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nan tan gyis yang dag par grub pa yin te/_sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gyi 
[\[94b.4\]]don de yang yi dam btang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i las la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_smras pa las nyams pa dang /_dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang /_yid yongs su skyo ba dang byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas yang dag par 'thob par mi nus so/_/rigs 
[\[94b.5\]]kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni sems can gyi don la rag las pa ste/_gal te sems can rnams med na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu chos la 
[\[94b.6\]]mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa yin gyi zang zing gi mchod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[94b.7\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste rab tu byung nas bdag ni grogs po dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]snag gi gnyen mtshams la shi ba dang 'dra'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag gis gzugs mi sdug par khas blangs shing bdag gis gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgos te/_tshul gzhan du bsgyur to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sprang ba'i rgyu sprang ba'i phyir mgo bregs 
[\[95a.2\]]shing lag na lhung bzed thogs te grong nas grong du 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_gdol bu dang 'dra bar dman pa dman pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag ni bsod snyoms pa ste/_bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag lus so zhes 
[\[95a.3\]]nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag gis slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_
[\[95a.4\]]cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_kun spyod pa de dang des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams 'thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sems can khros pa dang /_gnod sems can rnams kyi nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom 
[\[95a.5\]]pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa'i rgyu phun sum 
[\[95a.6\]]tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/_gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog_/gzhan gyis mi bkri/_ston pa gzhan med pas yang dag par lta ba rnams yin/_g.yo dang sgyus spyod pa dang bral bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_gya gyu med pa'i rang bzhin can pas 
[\[95a.7\]]drang ba rnams yin/_dbang po rno bas shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_rgyud dang bas sgrib pa dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa rnams yin/_legs par bshad pa tshol bas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]rnams yin/_chos bstan pa la log par mi 'dzin pa rnams yin/_rgya chen po la mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[95b.2\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig nyan par gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' 
[\[95b.3\]]zhig ngas bstan gyis legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[95b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la thun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la'ang khyab ste/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyab nas 
[\[95b.5\]]nam mkha'i dbyings la khyab kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang mu shes pa yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan te/_
[\[95b.6\]]des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la snying rje ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la snying rje zhing de la phan par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos ston pa mi zad pa dang ldan te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa du ma nas bskal 
[\[95b.7\]]pa brgya stong tshad med/_grangs med pa du ma'i bar du rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sems can thams cad la dus gcig tu chos ston kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa ni dri ba la lung bstan pa shin tu ston pa tshad med pa dang ldan te/_rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ji snyed sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dus gcig tu tshig dang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan dag gis dri ba tha dad du dris 
[\[96a.2\]]kyang /_de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung bstan pa'i ston pa bstan kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ba la lung bstan pa'i ston pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod 
[\[96a.3\]]yul pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas par gyur la/_de dag thams cad dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin du snyoms par zhugs nas/_bskal pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin 
[\[96a.4\]]gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang /_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am mu mi rnyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med pa'i gzugs kyi sku mngon par grub pa dang 
[\[96a.5\]]ldan te/_rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur na/_de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston to/_/gal te gzugs 
[\[96a.6\]]gzhan dang gzhan la mos par gyur na/_de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis sems can re re'i mdun du gzugs gzhan dang gzhan nye bar ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi spyan gyi yul tshad med de/_rigs kyi bu 'phrul 
[\[96a.7\]]gyi spyan gyis gzigs kyi mi'i mig gis ma yin pa'i sems can yod pa gal te rigs kyi bu grangs dang bsam pa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gi mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu ltar yang dag pa 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi snyan gyi yul tshad med de/_rigs kyi bu gal te de lta bu nyid kyi sems can gyis mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de dag thams cad kyis skad cig thang cig yud 
[\[96b.2\]]tsam cig la sgra dbyangs brjod pa'i sgra lhan cig tu phyung ste/_brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bdag bdag gi sgra rnams kyang so sor gsan to/_/so sor rab tu mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes tshad med pa/_mi zad pa/_mu med pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[96b.3\]]'dra ba dang ldan te/_rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gyi khams ma lus pa so sor rnam par rtog pa rjes su rnam par rtog cing /_bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la/_so so na las sna tshogs byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems 
[\[96b.4\]]can 'di ni 'di la rnam par rtog go/_/sems can 'di ni 'di la sems so/_/sems can 'di ni las 'di byed do/_/de'i 'bras bu ni 'dir 'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen te/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum char la yang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis skad cig thang 
[\[96b.5\]]cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/_rgyun mi chad par mnyam par gzhag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ngas pa med/_dbang po bslad pa med/_sems 'khrug 
[\[96b.6\]]pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad spangs pa ste zhi ba/_rab tu zhi ba/_nye bar zhi ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang la nyon mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni bslad par 'gyur te/_sems bslad pas mnyam 
[\[96b.7\]]par 'jog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa/_rdul med pa/_zag pa med pa/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa/_chos thams cad la dbang ba/_mnyam pa nyid thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod yul 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]thams cad las byung ba yin te/_gal te rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa spyod lam re re la yang ting nge 'dzin re res spyod pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du spyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyi tshe'i bar du spyod na gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par 
[\[97a.2\]]gzhag pa lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa du mas yang dag par grub pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_brtag par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel 
[\[97a.3\]]bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par 'grub pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas de bzhin 
[\[97a.4\]]gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par mi nus kyi/_nam byang chub sems dpa' chos mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'i/_thog ma'i sems nas 
[\[97a.5\]]brtsams te de ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa rnyed pa'i sems can de dag ni skyid de ba/_legs par bgyid pa'i las 
[\[97a.6\]]bgyid pa/_las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/_dad pa dang /_mos pa mang zhing byang chub tu nye ba lags na/_su dag thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa rnams lta ci smos te/_bcom ldan 'das sems 
[\[97a.7\]]can de dag ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di 'dra bdag nyid kyi snod du gyur par mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu su de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis the tsom dang /_yid gnyis dang /_ner nur mi bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[97b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang gis nub bdun du yid la bya ba gzhan med cing sems ma 'khrugs par bsam pa drag po dang /_dad pa drag pos zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di rjes su sems la zhag bdun 'das pa dang des mchod pa'i cho ga nye bar gzhag nas/_gtsang bas gos gtsang 
[\[97b.3\]]ma bgos te/_dad pa mngon du byas la 'dug par byas te/_des de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ste mi byed dam cho ga ma tshang bar byed na/_de sems rtse gcig par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[97b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/_sems can gang la la ma dad par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[97b.5\]]pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/_sems can gang mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba'i bsam pas gnod sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_chos smra ba de la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod do/_/de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 
[\[97b.6\]]rigs kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bshad pa 'di la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_chos smra ba de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang /_ston par 'du shes skyed na/_rigs kyi bu sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di tshe rabs de dang 
[\[97b.7\]]de dag gzhan la yang rigs kyi bu de dag gis thos par nges par rig par bya'o/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i sems can kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lta ci zhig snyam mo 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab bo/_/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab nas/_dbu mngon par bkab bo/_/dbu mngon par bkab nas/_sku mngon par bkab bo/_/sku mngon 
[\[98a.2\]]par bkab nas/_seng ge'i khri mngon par bkab bo/_/seng ge'i khri mngon par bkab nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo/_/de nas nyan thos kyi 'khor de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/_
[\[98a.3\]]de nas thams cad yod pa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyir bsdus te/_thams cad yod pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i 
[\[98a.4\]]ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu khyod rnams dad par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams mngon par dad par gyis shig_/de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[98a.5\]]bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo/_/srog chags brgya stong du ma ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/_/sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can du mas ni byang 
[\[98a.6\]]chub tu sems bskyed do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu 
[\[98a.7\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs su'ang 'dogs la don dam par na gzugs su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]par shes par yang 'dogs la/_don dam par na rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/sa'i khams su yang 'dogs la/_don dam par na sa'i khams su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams 
[\[98b.2\]]dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams su yang 'dogs la/_don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i khams su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/mig gi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na mig gi skye mched 
[\[98b.3\]]du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na yid kyi skye mched du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/
[\[98b.4\]]bdag tu'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na bdag tu'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/sems can du'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na sems can du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed 
[\[98b.5\]]las skyes pa dang /_shed bur yang 'dogs la/_don dam par na srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bur yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/'jig rten du'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na 'jig rten du'ang 
[\[98b.6\]]mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/'jig rten gyi chos rnams su'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[98b.7\]]su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/_/byang chub tu'ang 'dogs la/_don dam par na byang chub dang byang chub par byed pa yang mi dmigs shing de la yang mngon par mi chags so/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang ming dang /_'dogs pa dang /_tha snyad de ni kun rdzob ces bya ste/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ni don dam pa med mod kyi kun rdzob kyi chos rnams med par yang don dam pa bstan par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas de dag la kun rdzob tu mkhas shing don dam pa ma yin pa de ni kun rdzob la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[99a.2\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[99a.3\]]yin/_mi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang /_mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang /_mi len mi 'dor ba'i chos nyid dang /_tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang /_smrar med pa'i chos nyid dang /_spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_brjod du med pa'i chos nyid dang /_zhi ba'i 
[\[99a.4\]]chos nyid dang /_'phags pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam pa ni mi skye'o/_/mi 'gag go/_/mi 'jig go/_/mi len to/_/mi 'dor ro/_/yi ge dag gis smra bar bya ba ma yin no/_/yi ge rnams kyis mi brjod do/_/spros pas 
[\[99a.5\]]mi rtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu don dam par ni brjod du med pa ste zhi ba'o/_/'phags pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung ma skyes kyang rung mi 'jig pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang 
[\[99a.6\]]kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig gyon la yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang chos 'di kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te don dam pa med du zin na tshangs 
[\[99a.7\]]par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba yang don med par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir don dam pa yod pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rnams gsog nyid du rab tu shes/_gso ba nyid dang /_snying po med pa nyid dang /_mig yor 
[\[99b.2\]]lta bu nyid dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu nyid dang /_sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /_mi gnas pa nyid dang /_g.yo ba nyid dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar gsog_/'di ltar 
[\[99b.3\]]gso ba/_'di ltar snying po med pa/_'di ltar mig yor lta bu/_'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu/_'di ltar sgra brnyan lta bu/_'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu/_'di ltar mi gnas pa/_'di ltar g.yo ba/_'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin yang 'di dag skye bar snang ngo /_/gnas 
[\[99b.4\]]pa dang 'jig par yang snang ngo snyam mo/_/de dag 'di ltar sems te/_yang chos 'di rnams skye ba'i rkyen ni gang rnams yin/_chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen ni gang rnams yin snyam mo/_/de dag 'di ltar sems te/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis chos 'di dag skyes te/_ma rig pa las 
[\[99b.5\]]byung ba'o/_/ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/ma rig pa la rten pa'o/_/ma rig pa la brten nas 'du byed rnams 'byung ba yin/_'du byed la brten nas rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs su 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/ming dang gzugs 
[\[99b.6\]]su btags na skye mched drug rnams su 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/skye mched rnams yod na reg par 'gyur ro/_/reg pa yod na tshor ba snang bar 'gyur te/_tshor ba'i rgyus byis pa rnams sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro/_/sred pas nyen na len pa 'dzin to/_/len pa bzung na srid pa'i mtshams 
[\[99b.7\]]sbyor bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa yod na skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba yod na rga bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu gang zag rga ba'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/shi ba la gnas pa'i mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_yi mug pa dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_'di ltar sdug 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na/_mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o/_/ma rig pa gzhig pa dang /_ma rig pa rtsa ba nas dbyung ba dang /_ma rig pa dgag pa'i phyir nan tan bya'o/_/
[\[100a.2\]]ma rig pa 'gags pas ma rig pa'i rkyen las skyes pa/_ma rig pa las byung ba/_ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba/_ma rig pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na/_dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang 'gag par 
[\[100a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags na mi shes pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/mi shes pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/'gro ba rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/'khor ba'i rgyun rnams kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'das 
[\[100a.4\]]pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_'di 
[\[100a.5\]]la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci bdag bram ze'i rigs sam/_'on te rgyal rigs sam/_'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/_ci mtho zhing phyug po'am/_'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sam/_gang du skyes snyam du yongs su rtog ste/_de gal te rigs mtho zhing phyug 
[\[100a.6\]]par skyes na yang /_de la rigs kyis dregs par mi byed do/_/'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur na yang /_bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las bdag gis sngon las 'dren mar byas so zhes de snyam du sems skyed cing /_de de'i rgyus skyo ba mang ba yin te/_skyo ba mang bar 
[\[100a.7\]]gyur nas rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang bdag ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/_bdag ni rang rgal nas gzhan dag kyang bsgral bar bya/_rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol bar bya'o zhes rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/_de de'i phyir le lo la mi rten cing snyom las mi byed de/_de 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bdag rab tu byung nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dang gang nub cing yongs su zad de kun byang bar gyur ces de snyam du yongs su rtog ste/_de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos shig spangs par gyur na/_de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do/_/gang ma spangs pa de dag ni spong ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 
[\[100b.2\]]'bad do/_/de bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang dang gang 'phel ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_rgya cher gyur ces de snyam du yongs su rtog ste/_de'i dge ba'i chos gang dag 'phel ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_rgya cher gyur pa de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do/_/gang de 
[\[100b.3\]]ltar ma gyur pa de dag 'phel ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do/_/de bla ma la brten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis mkhan po nyung du thos pa'am/_
[\[100b.4\]]mang du thos pa 'am/_shes pa 'am/_mi shes pa 'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa can yang rung ste/_de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do/_/de ji ltar ston pa la dga' zhing dad pa nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la yang byed do/_/de slob dpon rnams 
[\[100b.5\]]la rim gro yod cing rje sa yod pa yin te/_de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brten na bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa rnams ni spangs par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/_de de dag la mkhan por 'du 
[\[100b.6\]]shes skyed cing /_dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa 'thob pa dang /_dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang 'thun par spyod pa yin/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi 'thun par spyod pa yin te/_de 'di snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongs su rtog cing /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[100b.7\]]gi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad thugs su chud pa/_'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o snyam ste/_de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das de yin pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gi phyir yang 'da' 
[\[101a.2\]]bar mi bya ste/_de ltar na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang /_rjes su 'brang bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod ces sems shing de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi 
[\[101a.3\]]mi rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis/_bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang /_don che ba dang /_mthu che ba dang /_bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su spyod pa de lta bur bya'o snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du bram ze 
[\[101a.4\]]dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms ster snyam zhing /_de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/_dge 
[\[101a.5\]]slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis/_ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang /_dge slong gi yon tan dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag 
[\[101a.6\]]par blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyod do snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur tam zhes sems shing /_des 'di snyam du bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o/_/bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 
[\[101a.7\]]'di ni rgal ba gnyis pa'o/_/bdag le lo med cing chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[101b\]]
