[\[101b.1\]]ni bdag shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khengs pa dag la dma' 
[\[101b.2\]]ba rnams yin/_nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/_gya gyu can dag la drang bo rnams yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams yin/_kha mi mkhas pa dag la snyan par smra ba rnams yin/_rtsub pa dag la 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/_khro ba dag la 
[\[101b.3\]]bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/_gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/_sdug bsngal ba dag la snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/_ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[101b.4\]]dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skyon med pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_ma 'bags pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas 
[\[101b.5\]]tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/_sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/_gos pa med pas rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa dang /_
[\[101b.6\]]sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/_nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa rnams yin/_sems le lo med pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/_sems mi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[101b.7\]]rnams yin/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/_shes rab rno bas dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/_gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/_'on te la la ma tshang yang skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang la chos tshogs pa de dag las chos gcig kyang skyon med pa/_ma 'dres pa/_
[\[102a.2\]]ma 'bags pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'i/_ma tshogs pas ni ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan 
[\[102a.3\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang /_mchod rten zhig 
[\[102a.4\]]pa 'chos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa 'bul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang /_skyong nul bya ba 'bul ba dang /_pha ma dag 
[\[102a.5\]]la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed cing /_de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/_zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar 
[\[102a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo zhing /_de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o/_/rigs 
[\[102a.7\]]kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/_'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/_yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/_yul la sred pa dang bral 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ba rnams yin/_yul gyi nyes pas mi tshugs pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa dang /_shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha ngan ngon dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad ngan ngon dag 
[\[102b.2\]]gis chog pa rnams yin/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_yo byad sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skyo ba rnams yin/_dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag 
[\[102b.3\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_
[\[102b.4\]]brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_gzhogs slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams 
[\[102b.5\]]yin/_rnyed pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/_yongs su yi 'chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/_chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi 
[\[102b.6\]]bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed/_ngag gis tshul 'chos pa mi byed/_sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag 
[\[102b.7\]]po mthong na/_spyod lam mi 'chos so/_/ji ltar na spyod lam mi 'chos zhe na/_gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang /_skyo bar lta ba dang /_sgrib pa med par lta bas gom pa bags kyis dal dal nas 'dor zhing 'deg pa ma yin/_de ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom bskyungs shing smra ba ma yin/_'jam por smra ba ma yin/_dga' bar smra ba ma yin/_rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/_de ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa 
[\[103a.2\]]mi byed do/_/ji ltar na sems kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/_sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs na/_tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_tshig gis 'dod pa 
[\[103a.3\]]chung la/_sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/_de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub 
[\[103a.4\]]sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/_sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos kyis phongs so/_/bdag lhung bzed kyis phongs so/_/bdag nad kyi rkyen rtsis phongs so zhes brda mi byed cing /_sbyin pa byed pa'am/_sbyin bdag la mi slong zhing tshig tu mi brjod de/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[103a.5\]]sems dpa' brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na gzhogs slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag mthong na bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/_de la bdag gis kyang phan 
[\[103a.6\]]pa che ge mo zhig byas so/_/des kyang bdag la tshul khrims dang ldan par rig ste/_mang du thos pa'o/_/'dod pa chung ba'o zhes 'di dang 'di byin no/_/bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar gzhag ste blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod de/_de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[103a.7\]]dpa' gzhogs slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang /_sems la rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin te/_de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa'i 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang /_kun tu rgyug pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal bar spyod pa'o/_/sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa la smon pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs pa btsal 
[\[103b.2\]]ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang /_gzhal ba la sgyu med pa dang /_yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang /_g.yos rnyed pa mi 
[\[103b.3\]]sgrub pa ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa'am/_chos kyi dang 'dres pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[103b.4\]]dang 'dres pa'am/_ma byin pa'am/_ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/_chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/_
[\[103b.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang bdag gir mi byed nor du mi rtsi tshogs su mi byed cing /_dus dus su dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_pha ma dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing /_dus dus 
[\[103b.6\]]su bdag kyang yongs su spyod la/_yongs su spyod pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang /_zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do/_/rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi 'chad de/_sbyin pa byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad par mi 'dzin pa yin pa ste/_de chos dang 'thun 
[\[103b.7\]]pa'i rnyed pa/_dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/_byang chub sems dpas ma smad pa/_lhas bstod pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dpya bas chog shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]su dag pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su mi skyo'o/_/sems can gyi rgyu sems can 
[\[104a.2\]]gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo'o/_/sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/_/sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/_/sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/_/gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam ston pas yongs 
[\[104a.3\]]su mi skyo'o/_/de dag la ma dad par yang mi byed do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su bsdu bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o/_/byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o/_/bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon 
[\[104a.4\]]par mi lta'i/_byang chub la gzhol/_byang chub la 'bab/_byang chub la bab pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[104a.5\]]rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/_lus kyis shin tu bsdams shing lus kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/_ngag gis shin tu bsdams shing ngag gi ngan du spyad pa mi 
[\[104a.6\]]spyod pa rnams yin/_yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/_'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs shing mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/_rigs par smra zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos smra zhing chos ma yin 
[\[104a.7\]]pa la smod pa rnams yin/_smad pa'i las rnam par spangs shing dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun mi 'byin cing nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su skyong zhing sdig pa mi dge 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ba'i chos rnams la srung ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[104b.2\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/_dbang po yongs su dag pa rnams yin/_dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/_dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/_dbang po yongs su byang ba rnams yin/_gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/_bag la nyal ba dang bral 
[\[104b.3\]]ba rnams yin/_kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/_tha ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[104b.4\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na khro gnyer ma mchis pa 
[\[104b.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa yin/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na khro gnyer med pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na 
[\[104b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang gi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug 
[\[104b.7\]]gi mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dus byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang dag 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o 
[\[105a.2\]]zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de yang thos pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_bsgom pas shes kyi sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/_de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i 
[\[105a.3\]]sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste/_sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos 
[\[105a.4\]]yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cing bstan pa 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang /_ye shes kyi sgron ma mya ngan las 'das te/_ston 
[\[105a.5\]]pa med pa'i tshe/_mdo sde rgya chen po/_rgya chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/_dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rjod cing ston la yang dag par ston cing gsal bar byed pa dang /_de la zhugs 
[\[105a.6\]]pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa dang /_rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang /_btsal nas kyang nan gyis sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin/_lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/_dbang po rnam pa thams 
[\[105b.2\]]cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su sten pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i 
[\[105b.3\]]gnas khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/_'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyong ba rnams yin/_'phags pa'i tshul la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/_tshangs pa'i gnas rnams la shin tu mthar phyin pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad 
[\[105b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong bas bstsu 
[\[105b.5\]]ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/_bdud thams cad kyis mi sgul ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/_chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/_chos thams 
[\[105b.6\]]cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/_shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/_'jig rten thams 
[\[105b.7\]]cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong bas bstsu ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang /_/gti 
[\[106a.2\]]mug gi bsam pa can dang /_dma' ba'i bsam pa can dang /_bar ma'i bsam pa can dang /_zhen pa'i bsam pa can dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa can dang /_brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang /_yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang /_sems can gtum pa'i bsam pa can dag kyang 
[\[106a.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing /_de yang sems can gcig la ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal shes 
[\[106a.4\]]pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston to/_/
[\[106a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/_nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi 
[\[106a.6\]]gzugs/_brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi gzugs/_bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs/_tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i gzugs/_bram ze'i gzugs 
[\[106a.7\]]kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bram ze'i gzugs/_rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/_khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar ston to/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu 
[\[106b.2\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang ba rnams yin/_'jam pa rnams yin/_gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/_gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/_dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[106b.3\]]pa rnams yin/_rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/_mi brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/_rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/_bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/_des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang 
[\[106b.4\]]chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams 
[\[106b.5\]]yin/_cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yin/_tshul dang 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/_khong yangs pa rnams yin/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa rnams yin/_skal ba mnyam pa rnams 
[\[106b.6\]]yin/_lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/_ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams 
[\[106b.7\]]yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/bde ba'i sbyin pa dang /_mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang /_phan pa smra ba dang /_don du smra ba dang /_chos su smra ba dang /_rigs par smra ba dang /_don bya ba dang /_zang zing gis don 'thun 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o/_/bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zang zing sbyin pa'o/_/mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o/_/phan par smra ba ni gang 
[\[107a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa'o/_/don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o/_/chos su smra ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par chos bstan pa'o/_/rigs par smra ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi gson pa'o/_/don bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas 
[\[107a.3\]]bslangs te dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o/_/zang zing gis don 'thun pa ni gang bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldags pa dang /_btung ba dang /_gzhib pa dang /_gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa ni gang 
[\[107a.4\]]gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_bzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[107a.5\]]bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shis pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/_spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin/_spyod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yin/_
[\[107a.6\]]blta na dga' ba rnams yin/_blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/_blta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/_blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/_blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/_blta na sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/_
[\[107a.7\]]blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shis pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba rnams yin/_'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/_mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/_nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par 
[\[107b.2\]]gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin/_rten med pa dag la rten pa rnams yin/_gnas med pa dag la gnas pa rnams yin/_skyabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/_gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/_dpung gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen rnams yin te/_
[\[107b.3\]]rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po 
[\[107b.4\]]blta na bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o/_/sdong po dang /_yal ga rnams dang /_lo ma rnams dang /_me tog rnams dang /_'bras bu rnams dang /_mthong ba dang /_mnams pa dang /_myangs pa dang /_reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_rigs 
[\[107b.5\]]kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_mthong 
[\[107b.6\]]ba dang /_thos pa dang /_yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod 
[\[107b.7\]]nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang /_sems can nad pa rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang /_sems can bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa dang /_rlung dang lhags pa dang nyi mas nyen 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams la dgab pa sbyin pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra/_phyag 'tshal/_ldang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par byed pa dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_gtsug lag 
[\[108a.2\]]khang dang /_skyed mos tshal bya ba dang /_dus dus su nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba gtong ba dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las mi dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo bshas yongs su skyong ba dang /_dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la 
[\[108a.3\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[108a.4\]]gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_
[\[108a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_
[\[108a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gro byed/_bkur sti byed/_bsti stang byed/_mchod pa byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[108a.7\]]kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ji snyed pa la de snyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed kyang de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/_rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no/_/
[\[108b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[108b.3\]]dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhir snang bar byed cing sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang /_nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o/_/bdag cag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 
[\[108b.4\]]'du byed pas zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_bsgrim pa'am/_mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sngon gyi las rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya 
[\[108b.5\]]ba rnams mngon par grub pa'i phyir te/_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab/_de lta de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs 
[\[108b.6\]]kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[108b.7\]]sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_tshul khrims shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_ma 'bags pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba dang 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ldan pas tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[109a.2\]]rnams dang /_thabs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/_sa dang 
[\[109a.3\]]po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad/_sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[109a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/_rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[109a.5\]]khams 'di na ri rab ri'i rgyal po chen po dag gam/_ri btang bzung ngam/_ri btang bzung chen po dag gam/_khor yug gi ri'am/_khor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/_de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang /_ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang yul ga ya gang na ba dang /_ga ya mgo'i ri gang 
[\[109a.6\]]na ba de logs su bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to/_/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/_'bras bu'i shing ngam/_spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i 
[\[109a.7\]]phyir ga ya mgo'i ri gang na ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang /_rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te 'dud cing /_bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas te/_gos g.yob cing ca co dang /_ga zha brgya 
[\[109b.2\]]stong du ma byed par gyur te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing /_kye ma'o deng ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par gyur te/_kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to/_/sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 
[\[109b.3\]]gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa yin na/_gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de skad ces ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma yang 
[\[109b.4\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'brug ltar sgra 'u ru ru 'byin/_sgrogs par byed shin tu sgrogs par byed cing /_spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_ga ya mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang 
[\[109b.5\]]sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo /_/klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/dri za dang mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma yang snyan cing zab pa'i dbyangs kyis glu len cing ga ya mgo'i ri dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[109b.6\]]la skor ba byed par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang pad ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/_/bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma yang me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[109b.7\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir so so'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dag nas 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur te/_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/_gzugs sna tshogs/_snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag ste/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog ste/_de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[110a.2\]]gyi khams 'di la skor ba byed cing mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te/_'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[110a.3\]]'di bshad pa dang /_mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di byung ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang chos rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/srog 
[\[110a.4\]]chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngon chad ma bskyed pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las de stan las langs nas bdag gi 
[\[110a.5\]]gnas su song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/_phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas/_btsun pa byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas/_bsti stang byas/_rim gro byas so/_/bkur sti dang /_btsun pa dang /_ri mo dang /_mchod pa dang /_
[\[110a.6\]]bsti stang dang /_rim gro byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga ya mgo'i ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis don 'di nyid dag dang /_tshul 'di nyid dag dang /_tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid 
[\[110a.7\]]dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi 'chi ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/_/de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang /_'dis bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/_lha'i bu de dag gi sems 
[\[110b.2\]]kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dis bud 
[\[110b.3\]]med kyi lus las ma bsgyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o/_/sems can gyi don ni rkyen to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba ste/_
[\[110b.4\]]rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi bas gang yang dag par len du btsud pa dang /_gzengs bstod pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba ste/_
[\[110b.5\]]rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[110b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/_mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig_/de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/_
[\[110b.7\]]lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing bai dUr+ya'i gzhir snang bar gyur te/_ri nag po med cing shing tha mal pa med la/_gnas gnas dag 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]na yang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to/_/gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to/_/mi phal pa med par snang bar gyur to/_/de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par gyur to/_/
[\[111a.2\]]gnas dang gnas dag na pad ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur te/_pad ma de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de yang 
[\[111a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du bdar te/_'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho na brtsams nas chos ston par 
[\[111a.4\]]snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[111a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid dam/_kha ton bgyid dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na/_de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[111a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhug par byin te/_de ltar sbyin pas bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 
[\[111a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris legs par zhus te/_sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na/_de bas kyang 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zang zing gi sbyin pa ni phran tshegs te/_chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gi_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/_'jig rten pa ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod 
[\[111b.2\]]pa bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/_de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo /_/rigs 
[\[111b.3\]]kyi bu gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_
[\[111b.4\]]klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/_de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di nyid la brten na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/chos 'di nyid la brten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[111b.5\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/chos 'di nyid la brten na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_spel ba dang /_kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad gzung ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_spel ba dang /_kha ton byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[111b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/_rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te bla 
[\[111b.7\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di thos pas skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang /_ston pa'i sa'i phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por 
[\[112a.2\]]gzung bar bya'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o/_/mchod rten chen por gzung bar bya'o/_/bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs so bar gzung bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyid 'di ni byang chub bo/_/chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 
[\[112a.3\]]bskor ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/_rigs kyi bu dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de gnas pa de la yang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/_chos smra ba de la yang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par 
[\[112a.4\]]bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rangs pa bskyed par bya'o/_/rim gror byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o/_/chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/_/legs so zhes brjod pa 
[\[112a.5\]]mang bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod kyang chos smra ba de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_bkur stir bya ba dang /_btsun par bya ba dang /_bsngags pa brjod pa ni gyi na cung zad du 
[\[112a.6\]]zad do/_/rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'di 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam bdag gi khrag gis chag chag byas kyang chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul gzung 
[\[112a.7\]]ba 'di ni dka' ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/_'jigs pa med par bya'o/_/ma zhum pa dang /_spa ma gong ba dang /_zhe ma 'gras pa'i sems dang /_gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gi bsngags 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang /_nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya ste/_bdag mi stod/_gzhan mi smod cing /_des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos bstan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dog sa'i 
[\[112b.2\]]phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am/_bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /_chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka legs so 
[\[112b.3\]]legs so/_/khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig_/kau shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_
[\[112b.4\]]'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog sprin ces bya bar zung shig_/yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/sgrib pa thams 
[\[112b.5\]]cad rnam par sel bas kun dris pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba yid dga' zhing byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[112b.6\]]'jig rten skyong ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa/_lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112b.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//lo ts+tsha ba ban de rin chen 'tsho dang /_chos nyid tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]{D232}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[113a.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang /_dgra 
[\[113a.3\]]bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_yang dag 
[\[113a.4\]]pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mngon par shes pa/_mkhas par mngon par shes pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam 
[\[113a.5\]]gtan pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum po de dag phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[113a.6\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la sogs pa dge slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum yang 
[\[113a.7\]]phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe sprin chen snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo chen po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen 'od srung zhes 
[\[113b.2\]]bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen glog gi 'od ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen 'brug bsgrags dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen brtson 'grus srung zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dga' byed can zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen 
[\[113b.3\]]rab dga' zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen nges par sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen grags zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen glog gi 'od kyi dra ba can zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen glog sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen 
[\[113b.4\]]dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rtsal gyis 'gro zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen seng ge sgra sgrogs rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen chu rgyas blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen brtson 'grus lto zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen lta ba'i dus tshod rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin 
[\[113b.5\]]chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen yang dag par lta ba zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen mu stegs su gyur pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen bsod nams zhing zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen 
[\[113b.6\]]bsil bar gyur ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen zla ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen rin thang med pa'i bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rtag tu lta ba zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rtag pa'i rang bzhin la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen blo gros 
[\[113b.7\]]rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen 'od rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rnam par rgyal ba'i klus byin zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dga' bas 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen ded dpon mig ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen cod 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pan gyis spungs skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen ston par gyur pa zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen sa bon srung zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rnam par rgyal ba'i pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen me lta bu'i ye shes kyi pad ma zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen bsgo bas bsgos 
[\[114a.2\]]pa'i ud pa la'i dri ldan zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen stag ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen 'dren spyod ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen mi 'jigs sgra zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen ta ma la'i lo ma bsil ba zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rin chen tsan dan bsil ba'i lus zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dam pa zhes bya ba dang 
[\[114a.3\]]sprin chen ya mtshan la mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dga' ba sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen snyan dngags mkhan gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba dang /_sprin chen snying po phra ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dam pa'i chos mchog pad ma dkar po rgyas pa'i gdong zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[114a.4\]]sprin chen dam pa'i gdong zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dam pa'i chos kyi rgyun rtogs zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen grags pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen sman kun sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sprin 
[\[114a.5\]]chen lus chen zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen mkha' la mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen sgra ldan zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen dri ma sel zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen sgron ma pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rnam par sgrogs pa len pa med pa'i rtog pa ma 'dres pa zhes 
[\[114a.6\]]bya ba dang /_sprin chen mun sel zhes bya ba dang /_sprin chen rim pa'i thog tog sel ba zhes bya ba dang /_de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya phrag drug dang /_brgyad 'bum yang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas 
[\[114a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe seng ge sgron ma la sogs pa lid tsha bI gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_lid tsha bI gzhon nu chos byin zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu klu mgo zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu chos sde zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu dbang pos byin zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu dbang po'i tog ces bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu dbang po'i 
[\[114b.2\]]rgyal mtshan 'od ces bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu seng ge'i sgra sgrogs blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu rin chen mgrin dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu rangs byed dpal zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu klu dpal zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu rdo rje phreng ldan 
[\[114b.3\]]zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu sangs rgyas 'bangs zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu rgyal ba'i 'bangs zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu lag chen zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu dpal chen zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI 
[\[114b.4\]]gzhon nu gang gAs byin zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu 'jam dpal snying po zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu klu dga' stobs zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu klus skyong zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu chos skyong zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu 'od grags zhes bya ba dang /_lid 
[\[114b.5\]]tsha bI gzhon nu nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu gang gAs skyong zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu srin phyis kyis rna cha gdub 'khor can zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu glog phreng can zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu khyad par dga' zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu 
[\[114b.6\]]khyad par can gyi rigs zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu dri med 'od grags zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu gling bu can gyis byin zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu sa steng phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang /_lid tsha bI gzhon nu mtshungs pa med 
[\[114b.7\]]pa'i rdo rje'i bran zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa lid tsha bI gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang brgyad 'bum ste/_lid tsha bI gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa chen po la sems rab tu dga' ba sha stag ste/_phye ma red 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 
[\[115a.2\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba'i dri za'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu sa ya phrag bzhi dang bzhi 'bum la 'di lta ste/_lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba'i dri za'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dga' zhing dang ba'i grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu zla ba'i gtsug 
[\[115a.3\]]phud can zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu rna 'phyang rna cha gdub kor can zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu rangs byed kyi rol mo'i sa 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dpal chen zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu zab mo tshul chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu nag po chen po 
[\[115a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dpa' ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu nam mkha' ltar mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dga' ba la rnam par mos pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dga' phreng rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dga' bar grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu bzhin 
[\[115a.5\]]dga' zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu yid 'phrog ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu bai dUr+ya ltar 'od snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu 'phral ba zla gam ltar 'dug pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu nges par sgra sgrogs zab mo zhes 
[\[115a.6\]]bya ba dang /_lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu brgya byin dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu gzhon nu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu man dAr ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mgo la 'khri shing thogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu bur ma sel ba'i 
[\[115a.7\]]blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu dam pa'i chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu sa ya phrag bzhi dang bzhi 'bum ste/_lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la sems dad cing rab tu dga' ba/_dam pa'i chos bsrung bar dga' ba/_dam pa'i chos rgyas par dga' 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]ba ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzung bar dga' ba sha stag ste/_sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[115b.2\]]ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po pad ma zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[115b.3\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal 'byor gnas zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po mche ba 
[\[115b.4\]]mchog tu rno zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po mang khyer zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po yan lag 'char [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mig ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po phur bu sgra rig zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po gser mdog gdong zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po stang zil gtsug phud ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[115b.5\]]po chu'i shugs 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po ti se'i gangs thub ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po byi ru bzang zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po phreng sgra snyan ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po lug gdong zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po gnas sgrogs mkhas zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[115b.6\]]gzi can ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum ste/_klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/_thos nas kyang gzhan dag la rgyas par ston par 'dod pa/_dam 
[\[115b.7\]]pa'i chos 'chad par 'dod pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can/_dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i khur khyer ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams thos kyi bu la sogs 
[\[116a.2\]]pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang drug 'bum la 'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ma la 'bod ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ma 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ma la dpal du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba 
[\[116a.3\]]dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag sgeg ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po khro gnyer mig zur can zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa sgul zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyi ma rengs byed zhes 
[\[116a.4\]]bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po shes ldan ngang tshul can zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor bu bzang zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 'od chags pad ma mdzod ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po shing rta gtong ba'i pad ma'i snying po dpal zhes bya ba dang /_gnod 
[\[116a.5\]]sbyin gyi rgyal po thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba'i g.yul gyi dpal zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor bu spyod ces bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang drug 'bum ste/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po de 
[\[116a.6\]]dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob par 'dod pa/_dam pa'i chos bsrung ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[116a.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sa ya phrag bzhi dang dgu 'bum la 'di 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]lta ste/_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che rlung gi stobs dang mnyam pa'i shugs can zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'ur 'ur zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rnga bo che dang cang te'u yi sgra ltar dir dir zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po klu'i 
[\[116b.2\]]stobs dang dregs pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sang sang zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'od chen zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gshog zegs bkram zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bud rgyal gdong zhes bya ba dang /_nam 
[\[116b.3\]]mkha' lding gi rgyal po rig sngags kyi nor bu sil sil 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i rigs gzhig par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i rigs rab tu 'joms par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal 
[\[116b.4\]]po yang dag par mthong ba zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po byams pa chen po'i tshig snyan par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po chos dga' zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser gyi gshog pa sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa nam mkha' 
[\[116b.5\]]lding gi rgyal po sa ya phrag bzhi dang dgu 'bum ste/_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang bral ba dang /_theg pa chen po la dad pa'i sems thob pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu srung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang 
[\[116b.6\]]rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe dri za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_dri za'i rgyal po dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 
[\[116b.7\]]dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gdangs snyan ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i rgyal po sta gon la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i rgyal po khyu mchog lha zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i rgyal po shugs kyis 'khyig par len pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i rgyal po shang shang te'u yi skad 'byin ces bya ba dang /_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]de dag la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum ste/_dri za'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang bral ba/_theg pa chen po la dad pa'i sems thob pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu srung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red 
[\[117a.2\]]kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal 
[\[117a.3\]]po chen po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po legs mthong yid 'phrog ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po klu khyer zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bud med sems 'phrog ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bud med kyi snying du sdug pa zhes bya ba 
[\[117a.4\]]dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po lha'i bu mo la 'bod pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po nyon mongs pa rku ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dgra rig dregs 'joms gsod ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bdud kyi bu mo dga' ba zhes bya ba 
[\[117a.5\]]dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bdud kyi sde 'joms zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ye shes snying po zhes bya ba dang /_mi'am rgyal po zab mo'i tshul bsgos zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dri ma med par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dbang po bsrungs zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i 
[\[117a.6\]]rgyal po rgyang ring mthong zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum ste/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang bral ba/_theg pa chen po la dad pa'i sems thob pa/_dam pa'i 
[\[117a.7\]]chos kun tu srung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe srin po'i rgyal po sa 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ya dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po rtsib ma sreg ces bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po drang srong zas len skra ser zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po so rad rod can zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po rna bcas thod 
[\[117b.2\]]pa can zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po ser po sbrang rtsi'i mdog ces bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po mgul ngar zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po sgra bo che zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po mgo zed ces bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po gyad la skul zhes bya ba dang /_srin po'i rgyal po 
[\[117b.3\]]skrag byed gzugs can zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po sa ya dang brgyad 'bum ste/_srin po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang srin po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/_theg pa chen pos sems dul bar gyur pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu srung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi 
[\[117b.4\]]dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_grul bum gyi rgyal po 
[\[117b.5\]]glang po che'i rna ba can zhes bya ba dang /_grul bum gyi rgyal po stag ltar dregs pa zhes bya ba dang /_grul bum gyi rgyal po shin tu che ba zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang brgyad 'bum ste/_grul bum gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang grul bum 
[\[117b.6\]]gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_dam pa'i chos kun tu srung bar gyur pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang 
[\[117b.7\]]de'i tshe 'byung po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_'byung po'i rgyal po glang po che'i gdong can zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po myu gu zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po khyim 'bigs rkun po zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po bod skad can zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]'byung po'i rgyal po me tog gi rna cha can zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po sbal phreng sor rdub can zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po byi so mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po byi la 'gros mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po sre mo 'gram zhes 
[\[118a.2\]]bya ba dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po spra bzhin zla ba gdong zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang brgyad 'bum ste/_'byung po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la sems dad cing rab tu dga' ba sha stag ste/_gar byed cing rol mo'i sgra 
[\[118a.3\]]sgrogs la sil snyan rnams rdob cing phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag 
[\[118a.4\]]brgyad la 'di lta ste/_gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po glog zhi byed btsun zhes bya ba dang /_gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sna tshogs sngo btsun zhes bya ba dang /_gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po bya mchu can zhes bya ba dang /_gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khrug byed ces bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa gcod byed 
[\[118a.5\]]kyi bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad de/_gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon par rtse ba/_theg pa chen po la sems mngon par rab tu dga' ba/_theg pa chen po mngon par 'dod pa/_theg pa chen pos mngon par skom pa/_theg pa chen po la mngon 
[\[118a.6\]]par sred pa/_theg pa chen po la dad pa/_theg pa chen pos bkres pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu srung bar dam bcas pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[118a.7\]]ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po bye ba phrag brgyad dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag zangs ris kyi mdun na sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]yin gyi rgyal po yul gyis g.yon spyo ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gang gA dri ma med par 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sa steng zhi byed ces bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po bya mgrin ces bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po mdung rtse gsum pa 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[118b.2\]]lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thal ba'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtum po drag tu khro ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po me'i gzi brjid kyi shugs can zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad dang brgyad 'bum ste/_lha ma yin 
[\[118b.3\]]gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang lha ma yin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_sems dul ba/_yid rab tu brtan pa sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[118b.4\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum la 'di lta ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rin chen 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po longs spyod mi zad 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa rig 
[\[118b.5\]]sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum ste/_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po 'chang ba/_ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa/_ting nge 'dzin tshol bar 'dod pa/_theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa/_bdag gi yid gnyis 
[\[118b.6\]]bsal bar 'dod pa/_dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs can sha stag ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[118b.7\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/_sa ya phrag dgu dang dgu 'bum la 'di lta ste/_drang srong mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong te ma bu ka zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong shing shun can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong dka' 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]thub can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong kun tu rgyal zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong ngan spong shes ldan zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong ri byi rangs byed gzhu can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong ma ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong sha med zas sbyin 
[\[119a.2\]]zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong gnas 'jog sel brtson zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong sgra mi snyan lnga len ril pa can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong 'dod pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong dus dang po la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong brgya byin lhar 'dzin yun ring gnas zhes 
[\[119a.3\]]bya ba dang /_drang srong mdzod ldan sgra mi snyan ces bya ba dang /_drang srong b+ha ra dwa dza shing shun can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong klu'i ril pa can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong 'dam bus byin zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa sa ya phrag dgu dang dgu 'bum 
[\[119a.4\]]ste/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs 
[\[119a.5\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[119a.6\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas mdun gyis bltas te yongs su bskor nas phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom 
[\[119a.7\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe yul mnyan yod nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi blon po chen po theg pa chen po la mngon par rtse ba de dang de dag rang rang gi 'khor dang 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe rab sbyin la sogs 
[\[119b.2\]]pa khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_de dag thams cad chos 'dod pa dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsdu 
[\[119b.3\]]ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba de dag_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe yul ban tsa nas rgyal phran zla ba skyongazhes bya ba rang gi blon po chen po dang /_grong khyer gyi dpon po stong bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 
[\[119b.4\]]blangs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_de dag thams cad chos 'dod pa dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba 
[\[119b.5\]]de dag_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe yul chen po bcu drug gi grong khyer dang /_tshong rdal dang /_lung pa'i mdo dang /_grong dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyi mi rnams 
[\[119b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir lhags te/_de dag thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos kun tu srung ba/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos don du gnyer ba 
[\[119b.7\]]dang /_'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba/_byams pa'i sems sgom pa de dag phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe btsun mo phreng ldan ma la sogs pa chung ma'i 'khor dang /_btsun mo khri drug stong dang /_gzhan yang rang gi blon po chen po'i btsun mo 'bum dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang 
[\[120a.2\]]gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe dge bsnyen ma sa ga dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas 
[\[120a.3\]]nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul dang snang ba chen 
[\[120a.4\]]po dang ldan pa 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_me tog 
[\[120a.5\]]gi phur ma ri rab tsam dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas bdug pa dag gis yongs su bdugs te/_tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis yongs su gtor nas sil snyan dag brdungs te/_gzhan yang shing rta'i 'phang 
[\[120a.6\]]lo tsam gyi pad ma'i sil ma dag gis khebs par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe tshangs pa rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_tshangs pa thor tshugs 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_tshangs pa gzhon nu 
[\[120a.7\]]'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rdzu 'phrul chen pos rgyal po'i khab dang bcas/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang bcas/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dang bcas pa thams cad mdzes par byas te/_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_khor yug khebs pa tsam gyi me tog sil ma dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor te sil snyan rnams brdungs nas/_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_byug pa dag gis gtor te/_
[\[120b.2\]]rgyal po'i khab dang bcas/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang bcas/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dang bcas pa/_bsod nams chen po'i zhing du gyur pa/_dkyil 'khor chen po mu stegs kyi gnas su gyur pa/_/kho ra khor yug tu la ba dang /_ras dang /_zab dar dang /_
[\[120b.3\]]zar ma'i ras 'jam po dang /_lha'i gos lha'i phye mas bsgos shing tsan dan gyis zhen par byas nas lha'i bdug pas bdugs pa dag bting ste/_mngon par sprul pa bzhin du byas nas me tog gi char mngon par phab nas lha'i rin po che du mas yongs su mdzes par byas nas/_bcom ldan
