[\[203a.3\]]btsal kyang sems can du 'du shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po zhig rang gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]btsun mo'i 'khor nas byung ste/_gnas gzhan zhig tu song bar mthong ba la rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug go zhes bya ba de ni gnas med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[203a.4\]]du ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa bdag dang /_sems can dang ldan pa srid pa thams cad spangs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi don la srid pa'i nyes pa dang rnam par 'dres shing 'dug go zhes bya ba de ni gnas med do/_/de bas na bcom 
[\[203a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis srid pa thams cad na yang rtag par gnas pa'i chos yungs 'bru tsam yang med do zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang sems can dang srog dang /_gang zag med do zhes bstan pa yin te shin tu yun ring du gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/ting nge 
[\[203a.6\]]'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chags pa yang ma yin/_ma chags pa yang ma yin/_nye bar len pa'i chos la gnas pa yang ma yin te/_rtag pa dang /_ther zug pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[203a.7\]]pa med pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag nyid yin te/_sprin chen snying po de bas na rtag pa dang /_ther zug pa dang /_brtan pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/sprin chen snying po ngas nyan thos kyi theg par dge slong dag yongs su gzung bar bya ba gang yin pa de yongs su 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]gzung bar gyis shig_/yongs su gzung bar bya ba rtag pa dang /_ther zug pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_bdag blang bar bya ba blang bar gyis shig_/lta ba'i rten du gyur pa rtag pa dang /_ther zug pa dang /_brtan pa de la rten cig ces bstan te/_gsal ba'i don mi mngon par byas nas 
[\[203b.2\]]gsal bar ngas bstan pa de 'jig rten gyis khong du mi chud de/_sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag ni thar pa la zad par sems shing de bzhin gshegs pa yod bzhin du yongs su mya ngan 'das so zhes yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes la 'jug ste/_srog chags phye ma leb mar 
[\[203b.3\]]me'i nang du ltung ba bzhin no/_/'di lta ste dper na tshong pa'i bu thams cad dpyid kyi dus tshigs su ga zhig tu 'dus nas rdzing bu chu chen po'i nang du khrus byed la/_de'i nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba bor nas/_nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid kyi mthus kyang rdzing 
[\[203b.4\]]bu'i chu'i phung po dang /_rus pa dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_rdo yod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rnam par mdzes par gyur te/_der zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od kyang lhan ne/_lhang nger mi 'dug go/_/de nas skye bo mang pos nor bu de btsal ba'i phyir brko ba dag gis rko bar byed de/_/
[\[203b.5\]]de'i nang nas ci yang rung ba zhig blangs nas nor bu de rnyed do snyam du sems te/_yid rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/de nas sems can de dag rdzing bu'i 'gram du 'khod nas so sor rlom sems su gyur na/_'di ji snyam du sems bdag cag gis ma rnyed do snyam du sems par 'gyur ram/_de nas sems can 
[\[203b.6\]]de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che ma rnyed kyang kye ma nor bu rin po che ma rnyed do zhes nor bu med pa'i 'du shes 'jug cing rtog par byed dam/_de'i nang na thabs la mkhas shing yid gzhungs pa gcig gis ni nor bu rin po che de btsal te rnyed do/_/de bzhin du mdo dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ldem po dag 
[\[203b.7\]]gi tshig mi shes pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni thams cad mi rtag pa dang /_stong pa'i 'du shes dang /_sems can med pa sgom par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid ma thob pas sems can thams cad 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor gyi/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag nor bu bzhin du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sprin chen snying po de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu lhag pa yang dag par mthong bar 'dod pas ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[204a.2\]]dpa' la rtag pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing thar pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//_//'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[204a.3\]]dpa' ni shing gi grib ma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shing yod na grib ma 'byung la/_grib ma yod na lam du zhugs par gyur te/_ngal bar gyur pa'i sems can der 'dug pa rnams dbugs phyin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa'i 
[\[204a.4\]]sems can rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba'i sems can de dag la ni skyabs su 'gro ba tsam yang med do zhes nga smra'o/_/gang dag de ltar yang dag par mthong ba de dag ni bstan pa 'di la 'phro bar mi byed do/_/
[\[204a.5\]]gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes su lta ba'i sems can de dag ni mya ngan du bya ba yin no zhes yang dang yang du nga smra'o/_/de nas de'i tshe nub phyogs nas gser gyi 'od chen po zhig snang bar gyur te/_gser gyi 'od chen po des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[204a.6\]]thams cad nor bu rin po che'i me'i 'od snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/_de'i skabs su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gcig pu ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa zla ba dang /_nyi ma rnams kyi 'od dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams kyi 'od thams cad mog mog por gyur te/_rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_tshal gyi nang dang /_lhun po dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams de dag thams cad 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]'od des snang bar byas so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog pa de dag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du yang pad ma bkra zhing blta na sdug la kha dog bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 
[\[204b.2\]]'dab ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa/_steng rin po che'i dra ba dri bsung dang ldan zhing 'jam la ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/_bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag gis kun tu khebs pa bye ba phrag drug cu sa gzhi brtol te mngon par 'thon par gyur to/_/pad ma de dag re re las dri 
[\[204b.3\]]ngad byung ba gang yin pa des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris khyab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi rnams kyi spos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i dri des khyab 
[\[204b.4\]]par gyur to/_/lha dang /_mi rnams dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag gis snar pad ma'i dri de song ba de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i rgyu dang ldan par 
[\[204b.5\]]gyur te bdag nyid nyon mongs pa dang bral ba snyam du shes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying pos chos kyi 'od kyi bkod pa de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phyogs bcur 'od gda' ba 'di dang pad ma'i 
[\[204b.6\]]bkod pa byung ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_de nas lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa sprin chen snying po ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i snga ltas lags zhes smra/_mtshan ma med pa'i chos rmi lam lta bu yin yang 'dri bar byed dam khyod la ni da 
[\[204b.7\]]dung yang phyin ci log yod pa 'dra'o/_/smras pa/_lha mo legs so/_/legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_lha mo khyod legs so/_/kho bo ni rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la mtshan mar lta ba 'dzin pa'i 'du shes bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar byed do/_/smras pa/_'phags pa sprin chen snying po su'i don 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gyi phyir mtshan mar lta ba 'dzin pa'i 'du shes smra bar byed/_smras pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_gang bdag gi lta ba bsal bar mi nus pa des gzhan gyi lta ba sel bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[205a.2\]]pa/_sprin chen snying po de ni lha mos ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes yang dag par mthong ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[205a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i 'du shes yang dag par blta bar 'tshal bas ji ltar yang dag par blta bar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_sprin chen snying po ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 
[\[205a.4\]]bdag nyid rnam pa du mar ston par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag nyid rnam pa du mar ji ltar ston par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sprin chen 
[\[205a.5\]]snying po 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma nan tan du sbyangs pa mkhas pas rol mo'i nang du bdag nyid ror gyur par ston par byed/_bud med kyi lus rnam pa sna tshogs su yang ston par byed/_gcan gzan gyis zin pa dang /_lus zhu ba dang /_lus mi snang ba 
[\[205a.6\]]dang /_tshig pa dang /_bcad pa dang /_gtub pa'i rnam pas pha rol 'drid pa lta bur gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du bdag nyid ston pa dag kyang mthong na/_der rgyus shes pa'i mis 'jigs par mi bya/_mya ngan du mi bya bar de la rig sngags kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[205a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa nyid kyi lam la nan tan du sbyangs pas sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du ston par byed de/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du ston pa mthong na/_bstan pa'i rgyus shes shing mkhas pas skrag par mi bya/_kun tu skrag par mi bya/_dngang bar mi bya/_'jigs par mi bya/_mya ngan du mi bya bar de la sems can rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/sprin 
[\[205b.2\]]chen snying po gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i bya ba rnam pa grangs med/_dpag tu med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bdag nyid ston to/_/'dzam bu'i gling bye 
[\[205b.3\]]ba phrag sum khri dag tu yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de lta bu'i tshul du bye ba phrag brgyar bsgre bar bya ste/_gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[205b.4\]]khams su 'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug par bya ba'i rnam pa'i grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bdag nyid ji ltar ston par bgyid/_bka' stsal pa/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'dzam bu'i gling la lar bdag nyid mngal nas skye ba lta 
[\[205b.5\]]bur ston te/_sems can rnams kyis bu btsas par shes kyang 'khrig pa la brten nas byung ba yang ma yin zhing bu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar mngon par 'byung ba yang ston te/_sems can rnams kyis mngon par 'byung bar shes kyang de la mngon par 'byung ba'i 
[\[205b.6\]]'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las lta bur ston te/_sems can rnams kyis gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las byed par shes kyang de la de'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni mkhan po'i khyim du 'gro ba lta bur 
[\[205b.7\]]ston te/_bslab par bya ba'i yi ge slob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bya ba shin tu tshar phyin par byas shing /_bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma nas bzo'i bya ba thams cad kyang mthar phyin to/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni mi'i seng ge dang ngang pa'i 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]stabs su 'gro ba lta bur ston te/_sems can rnams kyis mi'i seng ge dang /_ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro bar shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas ngang pa'i stabs kyi 'du shes de yang spangs so/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bu dang chung ma yang ston par 
[\[206a.2\]]byed de/_sems can rnams kyis 'dod pa la yongs su spyod par shes kyang de'ang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la yongs su spyod kyi nyon mongs pa dang 'dod pa la gnas pa ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bshang ba dang /_gci ba lta bur ston par byed de/_sems can rnams kyis bshang ba dang /_
[\[206a.3\]]gci ba byed par shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas bshang ba dang gci ba'i 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te 'du shes de yang 'jug pa med do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni sa shing spyod pa lta bur ston te/_so shing 'cha' bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba 
[\[206a.4\]]grangs med pa nas nyon mongs pa'i so shing rnam par spangs te kha yang ud pa la'i dri dang ldan no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni gdugs dang /_lham 'chang ba lta bur ston te/_gdugs dang lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba du ma nas nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[206a.5\]]gdugs dang lham gyi 'du shes de yang rnam par spangs te/_lus dag cing rtag tu chos kyi bde ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi gdugs 'chang zhing rin po che'i gdugs du ma dang pad ma'i lham thams cad ston par byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khrus byed pa lta bur ston te/_khrus byed 
[\[206a.6\]]par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas khrus kyi 'du shes de rnam par spangs te/_mdo du ma nas byung ba'i chus rtag tu khrus byed cing sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs su gyur pa yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni nad kyi rang bzhin lta bur ston te/_sman la sten 
[\[206a.7\]]par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing nad rnams bsal ba ste/_sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dag las kyang gso bar byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni grang ba dang tsha ba la sten pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]lta bur ston te/_grang ba dang tsha ba la sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas grang ba dang tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rnam par spangs so/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bkres pa dang skom pas sred cing zhen pa dang ldan par ston te/_bkres shing skom 
[\[206b.2\]]pas gdungs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'du shes kyis 'jigs pa'i klung gi rgyun las kyang rgal nas rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas sred par gyur pa'i 'byung po thams cad kyi kha zas su gyur cig ces zer ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling la 
[\[206b.3\]]lar ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la rtsom pa lta bur ston te/_kye ma sbyin pa la brtson pa'i sems can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa du ma rtag tu spyad pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams la sems can rnams sdud pa'i rgyur gyur to/_/
[\[206b.4\]]'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi tshul ston te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por sems can rnams kyis shes kyang de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po phal gyi spyad pa yang mi spyod de/_rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed cing sems can 
[\[206b.5\]]thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni de lta bu'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rtswa bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang mtshan ma ston par byed de/_la lar ni rab tu byung ba lta bu/_la lar ni rab tu ma byung ba lta bur sems can rnams 
[\[206b.6\]]kyis shes so/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni ya mtshan can thams cad kyi rab tu byung ba lta bur lta ba ngan pa rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ya mtshan can thams cad 'thun par rab tu byung ba yang ma yin te de dag nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ngo /_/'dzam 
[\[206b.7\]]bu'i gling la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung bar rtsom pa lta bur ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung bas rab tu 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i bya ba yang mthar phyin par 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]byas so/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum yang dag par 'dzin pa lta bur ston te/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsnyungs pa yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs shing rtag tu mnyam par 
[\[207a.2\]]bzhag pa yang yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub kyi snying por rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa lta bur ston te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_rtag tu byang chub kyi bya ba mthar phyin par byas pa yang yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bsam gtan dang 
[\[207a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur ston te/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod pa du ma la spyod pa yang yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[207a.4\]]la lar ni yan lag dgu pa'i mdo 'chad pa lta bur ston te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag dgu pa'i mdo gsungs pa 'chad par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu mdo du ma la sogs pa yang 'chad do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bslab pa'i gzhi'i tshad nges par byed pa lta bur ston 
[\[207a.5\]]te/_bslab pa'i gzhi'i tshad nges par 'cha' bar byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo dag kyang rtag tu byed cing /_bslab pa'i gzhi du ma dag kyang rtag tu 'cha' bar byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 
[\[207a.6\]]'dul ba lta bur ston te/_bdud kyi sde pham par byas par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bdud kyi 'du shes gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bye ba phrag du ma dag kyang rtag tu zad par byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni 
[\[207a.7\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi thob pa lta bur ston te/_'bras bu bzhi thob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ste/_'bras bu'i bya ba du ma dag la yang spyod cing phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma yin la/_sems can 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rtag tu srid pa'i yan lag rnams su yang 'ong ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni yon gnas lta bur ston te/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_yon gnas kyi nga rgyal la yang mi spyod de nam sems can thams cad bla na med 
[\[207b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yon gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag yon gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyam nas ma gos pa'i spyad pa la spyod de/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa lta bur ston te/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems can rnams kyis shes 
[\[207b.3\]]kyang /_sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas dge 'dun gyi dbye na sngon cad kyang ma byas te dge 'dun la phan par bsgrub par spyod pa yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gud du 'dor bar byed pa lta bur ston te/_kye ma ngur smrig tsam 
[\[207b.4\]]'chang zhing mi bzad pa'i las byed pa zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ngur smrig tsam 'chang ba yang ma yin te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba ston pa yang yin no/_/de la sogs pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chos mnyan pa thos na/_kye 
[\[207b.5\]]ma dge sbyong gau ta ma ni brda phrad dka' ba sha stag zer ro zhes 'phya ba lta bur ston te/_kye ma g.yengs pa shes rab rtul ba'i dge sbyong zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phan pa dang /_bde ba byed pa yang yin no/_/'dzam 
[\[207b.6\]]bu'i gling la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zas dug can 'bul zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dang /_pham pa'i 'gal ba byed pa lta bur ston te/_pham pa can du sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa skyed par byed pa yang yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la 
[\[207b.7\]]lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa mang po ston pa lta bur ston te/_yang dag par ston pa po yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang yang dag par ston pa po yang ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan byed pa yang yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad lta bur bdag nyid ston te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad yin par sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur bdag nyid ston te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par sems can rnams kyis 
[\[208a.2\]]shes kyang sngan chad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas ni nams kyang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das so/_/lan cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin te/_lan mang du yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/lan 
[\[208a.3\]]grangs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du 'dod chags las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_'dod chags las brten te yongs su mya ngan 
[\[208a.4\]]las 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du zhe sdang las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du gti mug las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du cha mnyam pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[208a.5\]]'da' bar byed de/_rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta bus yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_cha mnyam pa la yang mi rten to/_/de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bzhi po dag gis 
[\[208a.6\]]bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bya ba mthar phyin te 'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur ston te/_mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed yod par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de snyed de/_rtag tu skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de 
[\[208a.7\]]bas na rnam pa mang po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ming yang med pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bdud kyi las byed par bdag nyid ston te/_bdud sdig can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]kyang bdud kyi las kyang mi byed do/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud kyi las rtag tu byed la/_shin tu gcod par byed pa'i bdud kyi las la rten pa yang ma yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bdag nyid mngal 
[\[208b.2\]]nas skyes pa lta bur ston te/_sems can rnams kyis bu btsas par shes kyang 'khrig pa la brten nas byung ba yang ma yin zhing bu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni mngon par 'byung ba yang ston te/_sems can rnams kyis mngon par 'byung bar shes kyang /_de la mngon par 
[\[208b.3\]]'byung ba'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni gtsug phud breg pa'i las lta bur ston te/_sems can rnams kyis gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las byed par shes kyang de la de'i 'du shes 'jug pa yang med do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni mkhan po'i khyim du 'gro ba lta bur ston te/_
[\[208b.4\]]bslab par bya ba'i yi ge slob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bya ba shin tu tshar phyin par byas shing bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma nas bzo'i bya ba thams cad kyang mthar phyin to/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni mi'i seng ge dang /_ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro ba lta bur ston te/_
[\[208b.5\]]sems can rnams kyis mi'i seng ge dang /_ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro bar shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas ngang pa'i stabs kyi 'du shes de yang spangs so/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bu dang chung ma yang ston par byed de/_sems can rnams kyis 'dod pa la yongs su spyod par 
[\[208b.6\]]shes kyang /_de'ang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la yongs su spyod kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_'dod pa la gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bshang ba dang /_gci ba lta bur ston par byed de/_sems can rnams kyis bshang ba dang /_gci ba byed par shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa 
[\[208b.7\]]nas bshang ba dang /_gci ba'i 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te 'du shes de yang 'jug pa med do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni so shing spyod pa lta bur ston te/_so shing 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas nyon mongs pa'i so shing rnam par spangs te/_kha yang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]ud pa la'i dri dang ldan no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni gdugs dang /_lham 'chang ba lta bur ston te/_gdugs dang /_lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs pa'i gdugs dang /_lham gyi 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te lus 
[\[209a.2\]]dag cing rtag tu chos kyi bde ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi gdugs 'chang zhing rin po che'i gdugs dang /_pad ma'i lham thams cad sten par byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni khrus byed pa lta bur ston te/_khrus byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas khrus kyi 'du 
[\[209a.3\]]shes de rnam par spangs te/_mdo du ma nas byung ba'i chus rtag tu khrus byed cing sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs su gyur pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni nad kyi rang bzhin lta bur ston te/_sman la sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon 
[\[209a.4\]]mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing nad rnams bsal ba ste/_sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang /_'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dag las kyang gso bar byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni grang ba dang /_tsha ba la sten pa lta bur ston te/_grang ba dang /_tsha ba la sten par sems can rnams 
[\[209a.5\]]kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rnam par spangs so/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bkres pa dang /_skom pas sred cing zhen pa dang ldan par ston te/_bkres shing skom pa la skom pas gdungs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_
[\[209a.6\]]bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i 'du shes kyi 'jigs pa'i klung gi rgyun las kyang rgal nas rtag tu bkres pa dang /_skom pas sred par gyur pa'i 'byung po thams cad kyi kha zas su gyur cig ces zer ro/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la 
[\[209a.7\]]rtsom pa lta bur ston te/_kye ma sbyin pa la brtson pa'i sems can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa du ma rtag tu spyad pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams la sems can rnams sdud pa'i rgyur gyur to/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni 'khor 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi tshul ston te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por sems can rnams kyis shes kyang de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po phal gyi spyad pa yang mi spyod de rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i rgyal po byed cing sems can thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go/_/byang 
[\[209b.2\]]gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni de lta bu'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rtswa bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang /_mtshan ma ston par byed de/_la lar ni rab tu byung ba lta bu/_la lar ni rab tu ma byung ba lta bur sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni 
[\[209b.3\]]ya mtshan can thams cad kyi rab tu byung ba lta bur lta ba ngan pa rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_ya mtshan can thams cad dang 'thun par rab tu byung ba yang ma yin te/_de dag nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ngo /_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni de bzhin 
[\[209b.4\]]gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rtsom pa lta bur ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bas rab tu 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i bya ba yang mthar phyin par byas so/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni sbyangs 
[\[209b.5\]]pa'i yon tan bcu gsum yang dag par 'dzin pa lta bur ston te/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsnyungs pa yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs shing rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni byang chub 
[\[209b.6\]]kyi snying por rtswa bting ba lta bur ston te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu byang chub kyi bya ba mthar phyin par byas pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur ston 
[\[209b.7\]]te/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod pa du ma spyod pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni yan lag dgu'i mdo 'chad pa lta bur ston te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yan 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]lag dgu'i mdo gsungs pa 'chad par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_rtag tu mdo du ma la sogs pa yang 'chad do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni bslab pa'i gzhi tshad nges par byed pa lta bur ston te/_bslab pa'i gzhi tshad nges par 'cha' bar byed par sems can rnams kyis 
[\[210a.2\]]shes kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo dag kyang rtag tu byed cing bslab pa'i gzhi du ma dag kyang rtag tu 'cha' bar byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba lta bur ston te/_bdud kyi sde pham par byas par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bdud kyi 
[\[210a.3\]]'du shes gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bye ba du ma dag kyang rtag tu zad par byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi thob pa lta bur ston te/_'bras bu bzhi thob par sems can 
[\[210a.4\]]rnams kyis shes kyang 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ste/_'bras bu'i bya ba du ma dag la yang spyod cing phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma yin la sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rtag tu srid pa'i yan lag rnams su yang 'ong ngo /_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni yon gnas lta bur ston te/_
[\[210a.5\]]'jig rten na yon gnas yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang yon gnas kyi nga rgyal la yang mi spyod de/_nam sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yon gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag yon gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyam nas ma gos pa'i spyad pa 
[\[210a.6\]]la spyod do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa lta bur ston te/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_sngon gyi bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge 'dun gyi dbyen sngon chad kyang ma byas te dge 'dun la phan par sgrub pa spyod pa yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi 
[\[210a.7\]]snyan la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gud du 'dor bar byed pa lta bur ston te/_kye ma ngur smrig tsam 'chang zhing mi zad pa'i las byed pa zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_ngur smrig tsam 'chang ba yang ma yin te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bde ba ston pa yang yin no/_/de la sogs pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chos nyan pa thos pa nas/_kye ma dge sbyong gau ta ma ni brda phrad dka' ba sha stag zer ro zhes bya ba lta bur ston te/_kye ma g.yengs pa shes rab rtul ba'i dge slong zhig yin par sems can rnams 
[\[210b.2\]]kyis shes kyang /_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba byed pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zas dug can 'bul zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dang /_pham pa'i 'gal ba byed pa lta bur ston te/_
[\[210b.3\]]pham pa can du sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa skyed par byed pa yang yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa mang po ston pa lta bur ston te/_yang dag par ston pa po yin par sems can rnams kyis 
[\[210b.4\]]shes kyang yang dag par ston pa po yang ma yin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan byed pa yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta bur bdag nyid ston te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad yin par sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/byang gi sgra mi 
[\[210b.5\]]snyan la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur bdag nyid ston te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sngon chad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas ni nams kyang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das so/_/lan cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs 
[\[210b.6\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin te/_lan mang du yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/lan grangs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du 'dod chags las 
[\[210b.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la 'dod chags las brten te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ma yin no/_/lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du zhe sdang las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du gti mug las yongs su mya ngan 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]las 'da'o/_/lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du cha mnyam pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta bus yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[211a.2\]]gti mug dang /_cha mnyam pa la yang mi brten no/_/de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bzhi po dag gis bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bya ba mthar phyin te/_'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur ston to/_/mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed yod par yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[211a.3\]]pa yang de snyed de/_rtag tu skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de bas na rnam pa mang po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ming yang med pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan 
[\[211a.4\]]la lar ni bdud kyi las byed pa ltar bdag nyid ston te/_bdud sdig can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang /_bdud kyi las kyang mi byed do/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud kyi las rtag tu byed la/_
[\[211a.5\]]shin tu gcod par byed pa'i bdud kyi las la rten pa yang ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan ji lta ba de bzhin du gling thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rgyal chen bzhi la la dag tu 'am/_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i nang du lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[211a.6\]]lta bur bdag nyid ston te/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yin par sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis shes so/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/srid pa thams cad du yang srid pa thams cad kyi tshul du mngal du skye ba rnam par ston te/_srid pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams rang rang gi 
[\[211a.7\]]gzugs dang 'dra bar sems so/_/de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin thams cad du yang bdag nyid ston cing sems can thams cad kyang khams kyi 'du shes la 'jug par byed la/_sems can gyi khams la yang mi gnas shing chos kyi dbyings yin la/_rtag tu chos kyi gtam byed 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]par yang sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/sprin chen snying po de bas na zab mo brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus tshod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni 'jug pa'i gnas kyi gzhi gcig tu chad pa med de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu ba la rgyu bar mi byed do/_/'jig rten 
[\[211b.2\]]dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i bya ba du ma dang /_sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir ni rgyu bar yang byed de/_rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par 'jug cing gang dang gang du gdul bar bya ba rnams snang ba de dang der yang bdag nyid ston te/_de bas na mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes la spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[211b.3\]]gang gis mtshan ma'i dngos po ngan pa'i 'du shes mthong ba des ni yang dag par mthong ngo zhes nga smra'o/_/lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes ston pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ston par mdzad do/_/de nas sprin chen snying 
[\[211b.4\]]pos gsol pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di ni shin tu mkhas te phra ba shes pa dang ldan zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sgom par bgyid de/_shin tu legs par yang dag par mthong ba lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[211b.5\]]cad mkhyen cing thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'od 'phro ba sngon po dang ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_leb rgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog can bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par gyur 
[\[211b.6\]]nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar du song ste slar yang log nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu dper na/_byang gi sgra mi snyan 
[\[211b.7\]]gyi gling rtag tu shin tu brgyan cing kho ra khor yug nas yongs su mdzes par byas pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di legs par brgyan par mthong ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni don ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_ci'i slad du ni 
[\[212a.2\]]'od zer rnams byung bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni snga ma'i tshe nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur pa'i 'od chen po byung ba mthong nas khyod kyi yid la ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i snga ltas lags zhes zer ba de nyid kyi don dang /_
[\[212a.3\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nga 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog de mchi shig par bka' stsal du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nub phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[212a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de na da ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes te chos kyang ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na da 
[\[212a.5\]]ltar 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bsod nams chung ngu rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_yid dang ba skye bar bya ba'i phyir sprin chen po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gyi chos chen po ston gyis song la ting nge 'dzin 'di yang zung shig ces gsungs so/_/sprin chen snying po khyod kyis 'di'i rang bzhin gyi 
[\[212a.6\]]lus mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi ngo bo la dpag tshad sa ya phrag dgu dang dgu 'bum mchis te/_lus che zhing snang ba chen por gda' ba mthong lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' lus che ba 'di'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/_gal te tha mal 
[\[212a.7\]]pa'i lus 'di 'dra ba lags na bsgyur ba'i lus ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_ji ltar sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du mchis pa/_sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]thabs la mkhas pa 'di ni lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di lung bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yid dang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba dang /_nges par bsgral ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'ongs so/_/gsol pa/_lha mo dri 
[\[212b.2\]]ma med pa'i 'od gang du bud med kyi lus las ldog par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tu gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_sprin chen snying po bud med kyi lus las gang du ldog par 'gyur zhes de ltar ma lta shig gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[212b.3\]]'di ni bud med ma yin te/_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di ni bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba byed pa yin te/_sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis bud med kyi lus 'dzin pas na 'di ni thabs kyi lus yin par blta'o/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[212b.4\]]chen po ni rtag tu thabs thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir sems kyi smon lam gyis smon par byed de 'dod bzhin du bud med kyi lus kyi 'du shes la 'jug go/_/de ltar bud med kyi lus bsgrub pa'i bsam pa las 'jug kyang 'dod pa'i sems kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing 'dres par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[212b.5\]]gsol pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od lung bstan pa rigs dang /_grong dang bcas par cho ga bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di ni nga thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[212b.6\]]'og tu lo bdun brgya lon pa na lho phyogs kyi rgyud du yul 'khor mun pa can zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_yul 'khor chen po de na chu klung nag po bzang zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na grong khyer dpal yon can nges pa zhes bya bar khams kyi rgyal po bde spyod ces bya ba'i rigs 
[\[212b.7\]]su 'byung bar 'gyur te/_khams kyi rgyal po de'i rigs rabs gsum lon pa na rgyal po dpal 'phel zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po de'i bu mo snying du sdug cing byams la yid du 'ong ba dang /_gnang ba dang mchog tu mdzes shing gzugs bzang la rigs kyi spyod pa'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa skyong 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]ba'i rang bzhin can du skye bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo de ji tsam du skyes pa de tsam du bdag nyid kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'phel bar byed de/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de 'byor cing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mun pa can gyi yul 'khor yang de'i tshe 'byor cing rgyas par 'gyur te skye bo mang pos kyang gang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[213a.2\]]'bru rnams kyi lo tog kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams kyang bden par smra bar 'gyur ro/_/nad med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_bde bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo'i pha rgyal po dpal 'phel gyis bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor 'byor cing rgyas la yul gyi mi rnams shin 
[\[213a.3\]]tu legs par 'khod pa dang /_'bru shin tu tshogs par mthong nas bdag nyid kyi bu mo'i ming lo tog 'byor ma zhes yon tan dang 'thun pa'i ming 'dogs so/_/de nas rim gyis rgyal po dpal 'phel rang gi bsod nams zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul gyi mi rnams 'dus te/_
[\[213a.4\]]gzhon nu rgyal po nus pa 'ga' yang med kyis lha mo lo tog 'byor ma 'di nyid rgyal por dbang bskur la rgyal po'i pho brang du de 'dra ba'i gzhon nu 'ga' zhig ming khyer tsam du bzhag ste/_de ltar byas na legs so snyam mo/_/de nas lha mo de dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu de rgyal po byed du bcug ste/_pho 'ud ti mo 'ud ti bzhin du snyad 
[\[213a.5\]]btags nas bdag nyid kyi yul du bdag nyid kyis bud med kyi gzugs kyis rgyal srid chen po yongs su spyad de/_mu stegs can ngan pa'i sde mngon par 'dul bar byed cing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa gzhi thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mngon mtshan can du byas nas bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod 
[\[213a.6\]]par byed de/_rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs chen po dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyis bsgos pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_spos dang /_me tog thams cad dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_khar rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_pi bang dang /_gling 
[\[213a.7\]]bu dang /_sil snyan brgya phrag thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad bskor te/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang ldan par byas te/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyad pa spyod cing rtag tu 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung nas dbul po la sogs pa khyim bkol gyi sems can thams cad gang dang gang la ci dang cis don du 'gyur ba de dang de la de dang de byin nas 'du shes bcu'i bsdu bas bsdus te spyod par byed cing /_sems can bye ba phrag mang po dag rim bzhin du btul te sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par 
[\[213b.2\]]shes nas/_sprin chen snying po'i mdo 'di la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo rin po che'i dam pa'i chos bstan pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ci'i thabs kyis kyang mtshungs pa med pa'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /_mtshungs pa med pa'i glegs bam bris pa'i snod sangs rgyas kyis gang dang 
[\[213b.3\]]gang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas rnams su 'jog par byed de/_de ltar mtshungs pa med pa'i sa bon bskyed nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe lha mo lo tog 'byor ma shes rab chen mo thabs mkhas pa zab mo shes pa dang ldan pa'i lha mos bud med kyi lus las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sprin chen snying 
[\[213b.4\]]pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lha mo 'di sems can thams cad kyi dad pa bskyed pa'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po bgyis nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_sprin chen snying po ci lha mo 'di cho 'phrul chen po byed mi nus zhes khyod smra'am/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[213b.5\]]sprin chen snying po lha mo 'di cho 'phrul chen po ston mi nus so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/'on kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gis ni mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di na lha mo 'di la sogs pa dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can 
[\[213b.6\]]de gang yang med de de ni gnas med do/_/sprin chen snying po de bas na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bsod nams chung ngu thams cad kyi dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir mdo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan par byed do zhes nga smra'o/_/sprin chen snying po de'i tshe lha mo 'di bud med kyi lus las bzlog nas de bzhin 
[\[213b.7\]]gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba len par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams der bde ba nyams su myong nas rim gyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i lha mo 'di yun ji srid cig na sangs rgyas su 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]'gyur 'di'i ming yang ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_lha mo 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa phrag lnga brgya 'das pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[214a.2\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsang zhing bden 
[\[214a.3\]]pa'i mtshams 'phel bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di yang 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa ni gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba de 'byor par 'gyur/_rgyas par 'gyur/_bde ba dang /_
[\[214a.4\]]nyams dga' ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ro/_/'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer gtsang ma bsung ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_grong khyer gtsang ma bsung ldan du mi bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dpe 
[\[214a.5\]]med pa'i grong khyer der ra ba dang /_yang tog dang /_bla 'tshogs dang /_'obs dpe med pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dag cing nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i chu'i klung nag po bzang zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe gtsang ma bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'gram pha rol tshu rol dpe med pa'i shing ljon pa'i kun dga' ra ba nyams 
[\[214a.6\]]dga' ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba de yang 'di lta ste dper na dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa bzhin te/_ri dang /_rdo dang /_bong ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma la sogs pa med par 'gyur zhing mu stegs can gyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[214a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa dang bud med dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas shes pa'i gtam gyi ming yang med de/_theg pa chen po'i mdo'i gtam rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro/_/bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'i 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]sems can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dag cing bzod pa chen po'i rnyed pa thob pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sa gzhi yang nor bu rin po che thams cad las grub par 'gyur te/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi me tog dang /_pad ma thams cad kyis spros par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshe dpag tu 
[\[214b.2\]]med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni grong khyer gtsang ma bsung ldan du bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa 
[\[214b.3\]]tsam gyis rang gi lus las shi 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba der grong khyer gtsang ma bsung ldan du skye bar 'gyur zhes nga smra'o/_/ngan song bzhi yang de dag gi spyod yul gyi sar mi 'gyur ro/_/sprin chen snying po de bas na nga ni bcom ldan 'das de'i 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyong ba dang /_
[\[214b.4\]]bskal pa gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams 'phel bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yon tan gzung ba smra'o/_/de nas 'khor chen po'i nang nas lha dang mi'i tshogs tshad med pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i las byas te gar byas/_glu blangs 
[\[214b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sems bskyed do/_/'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bye ma snyed dag lung ston pa sprin chen po'i mdo tsheg bar brgyad par sbyar ba'i le'u 'bum pa las lung bstan pa'i rgyud yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_sprin chen 
[\[214b.6\]]snying po la sogs pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sprin 
[\[214b.7\]]chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]{D233}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha sU trA da da sha dig bo d+hi sa twa sa mu dra san ni ba ti ma hot+sa ba bi krI Di ta nA ma pa ri brta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u/_sangs 
[\[215a.2\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po sa ya phrag brgyad dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 
[\[215a.3\]]sogs pa dge slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya phrag drug dang /_brgyad 'bum dang /_seng ge la sogs pa lid tsa bI gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang /_brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/
[\[215a.4\]]de'i tshe rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med/_grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu de dag thams cad 
[\[215a.5\]]kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med grangs 
[\[215a.6\]]med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub 
[\[215a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go_/_yang de'i tshe 'phrul dga'i lha'i ris nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs 
[\[215b.2\]]pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[215b.3\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe na klu'i rgyal po pad ma can la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la klu'i rgyal po re re la yang 'khor klu 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom 
[\[215b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa thob pa sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 
[\[215b.5\]]sa ya phrag gsum dang drug 'bum la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po re re yang 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po de dag 
[\[215b.6\]]thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe dri za'i rgyal po dga' ba la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la dri za'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor dri za 'bum phrag grangs med pa 
[\[215b.7\]]dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/dri za'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]stag go/_/yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad dang /_brgyad 'bum la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po re re yang 'khor lha ma yin 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[216a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha ma yin gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dri za'i 
[\[216a.3\]]glang po la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sa ya phrag bzhi dang dgu 'bum la nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po re re la yang 'khor nam mkha' lding 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[216a.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 
[\[216a.5\]]'bum la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor mi 'am ci 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po de dag thams cad 
[\[216a.6\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po yon tan zla ba la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag mang po la lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag grangs 
[\[216a.7\]]med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe srin po'i rgyal po 'brog gnas la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad dang brgyad 'bum la srin po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor srin po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[216b.2\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/srin po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe grul bum gyi rgyal po drod ldan la sogs pa grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang 
[\[216b.3\]]brgyad 'bum la grul bum gyi rgyal po re re yang 'khor grul bum 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/grul bum gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub 
[\[216b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po glog legs btsun la sogs pa gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad la gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor gcod byed kyi bu 'bum phrag grangs 
[\[216b.5\]]med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam 
[\[216b.6\]]par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rin chen 'dzin la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug la rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_
[\[216b.7\]]lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i rgyal po glang po'i snying po la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gsum dang /_brgyad 'bum la 'byung po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor 'byung po 'bum phrag 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe drang srong mes sbyin la sogs pa drang srong sa ya phrag dgu la drang srong de dag thams cad kyang mngon 
[\[217a.2\]]par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor 'bum phrag du ma 
[\[217a.3\]]dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams dngar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe yul tsam 
[\[217a.4\]]pa nas khyim bdag legs sbyin khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal 
[\[217a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad nas yul bcu drug gi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[217a.6\]]chen po sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas btsun mo ma li ka la sogs pa btsun mo khri drug stong dang /_dge bsnyen ma sa ga la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[217a.7\]]bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/tshangs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]pa rin chen skyong la sogs pa tshangs pa 'bum phrag du ma yang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo chu shing lta bu la sogs pa lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma yang 'khor 
[\[217b.2\]]de nyid kyi nang du 'dus te/_gar byed cing glu len la lha'i bu mo re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dpe med pa dngar cing mngon par dngar to/_/dngar cing mngon par dngar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs 
[\[217b.3\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/_/lha'i ris re re nas kyang lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma gar byed cing glu len te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_de bzhin 
[\[217b.4\]]gshegs pa la lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /_ba dan gyi sprin dag dngar cing mngon par dngar te mngon par rab tu dang ra to/_/dngar cing mngon par dngar te mngon par rab tu dngar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[217b.5\]]lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na dge slong gnas pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[217b.6\]]bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/_rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba dang /_rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang /_rlung gi rgyal po chen po shugs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 
[\[217b.7\]]dang /_rlung gi rgyal po chen po rjes su cher chags zhes bya ba me tog dang /_spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldang zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do/_/sprin gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag du ma yang 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]glu dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags te/_seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do/_/yang de'i tshe seng ge dpa' bo la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa 
[\[218a.2\]]dag la ngang pa'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ngang pa 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa'i skad dpe med pa dag gis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/ngang pa'i 
[\[218a.3\]]rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe rma bya'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa rma bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la rma bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor rma bya 'bum phrag grangs 
[\[218a.4\]]med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rma bya'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde la sogs pa khu byug gi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la khu byug gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor khu byug 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong 
[\[218a.6\]]ste lhags nas khu byug gi skad snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/khu byug gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe ka la ping ka'i rgyal po pad 
[\[218a.7\]]ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs pa ka la ping ka'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la ka la ping ka'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la ping ka 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag ka la ping ka'i sgra skad snyan pa 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]yang dag pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/ka la ping ka'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe shang shang te'u yi rgyal po rgyal ba la 
[\[218b.2\]]sogs pa shang shang te'u yi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la shang shang te'u yi rgyal po re re yang 'khor shang shang te'u 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyan pas bstod de/_bcom 
[\[218b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/shang shang te'u yi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sogs pa tha dad pa 
[\[218b.4\]]grangs med pa las bya'i rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa yod de/_bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_so so'i bya skad kyi rol mo'i sgra dpe med pa'i gdangs kyis sangs 
[\[218b.5\]]rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa'i bstod pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad 
[\[218b.6\]]pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe seng ge'i rgyal po rin po che pad ma la sogs pa seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la seng ge'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_seng ge'i sgra 
[\[218b.7\]]skad kyi rol mo'i sgra snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/seng ge'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po ri ka'i na bun lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor spos kyi glang po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_bcom 
[\[219a.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/spos kyi glang po de dag thams cad kyang byang 
[\[219a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe sbrul dang /_stag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rigs tha dad pa 'dres pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[219a.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/sbrul dang /_stag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/
[\[219a.5\]]yang de'i tshe sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sbrang ma dang /_bi shu ka dang /_nya dang /_ru sbal dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_se sa ra dang /_'ug pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_srin gyi rigs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa dag dang /_sdig sbrul tha dad pa 'dres pa gnas pa 
[\[219a.6\]]thams cad dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[219a.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe sbrul dang /_myur du gdug pa dang /_sbrul gzi gu dang /_sbrul mi bzad pa'i gdug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]'das la bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lhun po dang lhun po chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dag dang /_ri gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang 
[\[219b.2\]]rang gi khang par zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha de dag thams cad kyang byang chub 
[\[219b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe sman dang nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khang par zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis 
[\[219b.4\]]bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying po 'khor rnams dang /_
[\[219b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi skad cig gcig la bskal pa rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_tshad med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug 
[\[219b.6\]]par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung /_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba phrag ni ji snyed/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu ni thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[219b.7\]]spyod pa rnams dang /_ye shes dang /_gzigs pa dang /_khams dang /_rgyu dang /_dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_gdags pa dang /_rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad cig gu snyam mo/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/_mi 'jigs pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi 
[\[220a.2\]]yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor 
[\[220a.3\]]ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin 
[\[220a.4\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi 
[\[220a.5\]]stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen 
[\[220a.6\]]po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du sku bltams pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal na bzhugs pa 
[\[220a.7\]]rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[220b.2\]]kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal nas grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang phyug chen po rim gro byed du 'ong ba 
[\[220b.3\]]rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin 
[\[220b.4\]]chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i rtse mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin 
[\[220b.5\]]gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge dang /_bstan bcos dang /_lag rtsis dang /_brtsi ba dang /_shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor 
[\[220b.6\]]ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dam bcas pa thob par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying 
[\[220b.7\]]po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar gshegs 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba dang /_rab tu byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin

[\[221a.3\]]snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza' ngur smrig ba zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[221a.4\]]dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes 
[\[221a.5\]]bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[221a.6\]]zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya 
[\[221a.7\]]ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
