[\[221b.3\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba rnam par 
[\[221b.4\]]gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me'i 'od dang /_glog gi 'od dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_nor bu'i 'od dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[221b.5\]]skyong gi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen 
[\[221b.6\]]snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi long ba dang /_'phye bo dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on 
[\[221b.7\]]pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/
[\[222a.2\]]sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos

[\[222a.7\]]bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs

[\[222b.7\]]bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin

[\[223b.5\]]ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin

[\[223b.7\]]ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya 
[\[224a.2\]]ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[224a.3\]]yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying 
[\[224a.4\]]po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs 
[\[224a.5\]]la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[224a.6\]]rnams kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/_/

[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i rigs zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dag byung ste/_des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang ba chen

[\[228b.1\]]pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis brag 'phen pa dang 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag 
[\[228b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che nor gyis 'jug kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de 
[\[228b.3\]]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[228b.4\]]bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa 
[\[228b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gsod pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang 
[\[228b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[228b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lus la las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa ni gcig pur bas te/_gnyis sam gsum ma mchis la/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang bgrod pa gcig pur bas te/_gnyis 
[\[229a.2\]]dang gsum du ma mchis pa 'di ni chos nyid lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[229a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/_'jig pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jig pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad 
[\[229a.4\]]du ste/_'jig pa'i rang bzhin las 'jig pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags te/_'jig pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/_'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[229a.5\]]kyis 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_
[\[229a.6\]]lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid lags te/_lta bar gyur pa'i rang 
[\[229a.7\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des chos thams cad stong pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis lta bar gyur pa/_rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa ma mchis pa ste/_sgro btags pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_sgro btags pa'i 
[\[229b.2\]]rang bzhin las sgro btags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin nyid sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags te/_sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgro btags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags na 
[\[229b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa gang lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[229b.4\]]'das chos thams cad ni las su bsko ba ma mchis pa ste/_las su bsko ba rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin las las su bsko ba ma mchis pa gzhan 
[\[229b.5\]]ma lags kyi/_las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin nyid las su bsko ba ma mchis pa lags te/_las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin gyis las su bsko ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad las su bsko ba ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bsko ba rnam par gzhag 
[\[229b.6\]]pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa ste/_blang ba 
[\[229b.7\]]dang dor ba rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid blang ba dang dor ba 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]ma mchis pa lags te/_blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas 
[\[230a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/_'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par dag 
[\[230a.3\]]pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'deg pa 
[\[230a.4\]]dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags te/_'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[230a.5\]]kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_'dus byas rnam par dag pa lags so/_/
[\[230a.6\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma lags kyi/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dus ma byas lags te/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma byas shes pa des 
[\[230a.7\]]chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/_dngos gzhi rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las dngos gzhi ma mchis pa 
[\[230b.2\]]gzhan ma lags kyi/_dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/_dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis dngos gzhi ma mchis par shes pa des chos thams cad dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[230b.3\]]kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa ste/_gnas rnam par dag pa lags so/_/
[\[230b.4\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_gnas kyi rang bzhin nyid gnas ma mchis pa lags te/_gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis gnas ma mchis pa shes pa des 
[\[230b.5\]]chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar 
[\[230b.6\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/_dngos po rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_dngos po'i rang bzhin las dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags 
[\[230b.7\]]kyi/_dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/_dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/_gnyis rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de 
[\[231a.2\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis gnyis su ma mchis pa shes 
[\[231a.3\]]pa des chos thams cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 
[\[231a.4\]]'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/_mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan 
[\[231a.5\]]nyid ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/_mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i 
[\[231a.6\]]byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/_dmigs pa rnam 
[\[231a.7\]]par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las dmigs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/_dmigs pa'i rang 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bzhin gyis/_dmigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[231b.2\]]tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dbu ma'i lam lags te/_mtha' rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_mtha'i rang 
[\[231b.3\]]bzhin las dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi/_mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/_mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor 
[\[231b.4\]]bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/_lus rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[231b.5\]]lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_lus kyi rang bzhin las lus ma mchis pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/_lus kyi rang bzhin nyid lus ma mchis pa nyid lags te/_lus kyi rang bzhin gyis lus ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad lus ma mchis pa 
[\[231b.6\]]lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 
[\[231b.7\]]'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/_'khor ba rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'khor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_'khor ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyid 'khor ba ma mchis 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa lags te/_'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang 
[\[232a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/_brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[232a.3\]]las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las brjod du med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/_brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams 
[\[232a.4\]]cad brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar 
[\[232a.5\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[232a.6\]]pa'i rang bzhin las kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad kun nas 
[\[232a.7\]]nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/_chags pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_chags pa'i rang bzhin las chags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_
[\[232b.2\]]chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/_chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis chags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub 
[\[232b.3\]]sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/_rlom sems rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[232b.4\]]du zhe na/_rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las rlom sems ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/_rlom sems kyi rang bzhin gyis rlom sems ma 
[\[232b.5\]]mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[232b.6\]]kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/_yod pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yod pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_yod pa'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa 
[\[232b.7\]]gzhan ma lags kyi/_yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/_yod pa'i rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa lags te/_ming rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[233a.2\]]du zhe na/_ming gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_ming gi rang bzhin las ming ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi ming gi rang bzhin nyid ming ma mchis pa lags te/_ming gi rang bzhin gyis ming ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad ming ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 
[\[233a.3\]]'das kyis ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa 
[\[233a.4\]]lags te/_bdag rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_bdag gi rang bzhin las bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/_bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchis pa lags te/_bdag 
[\[233a.5\]]gi rang bzhin gyis bdag ma mchis pa shes pa des/_chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag 
[\[233a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_
[\[233a.7\]]rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ba ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_
[\[233b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/_'dres pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'dres pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_'dres pa'i rang bzhin las 'dres pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_'dres pa'i 
[\[233b.3\]]rang bzhin nyid 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/_'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 
[\[233b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/_yi ge rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yi ge'i rang bzhin 
[\[233b.5\]]las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_yi ge'i rang bzhin las yi ge ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/_yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis yi ge ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na bcom 
[\[233b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nga rgyal 
[\[233b.7\]]med pa ma mchis pa lags te/_nga rgyal med pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin las nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_nga rgyal med pa'i rang 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bzhin nyid nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags te/_nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la 
[\[234a.2\]]sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam 
[\[234a.3\]]par dag pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[234a.4\]]pa'i rang bzhin nyid yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags te/_yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[234a.5\]]gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_
[\[234a.6\]]de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sgor 'jug pa grangs med pa dag la phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa 'dres pa'i tshul dag gis 'jug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[234a.7\]]mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang /_ye shes dang /_gzigs pa dang /_khams dang /_rgyu dang /_dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_gdags pa dang /_rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed bla na med pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/_phyogs 
[\[234b.2\]]bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir zhabs gnyis kyi mthil nas 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[234b.3\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed phyung ngo /_/de bzhin du zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo'i tshigs re re dang /_de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang /_de bzhin du pus mo'i lha nga gnyis dang /_de bzhin du brla gnyis dang /_de bzhin du sta zur gnyis dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[234b.4\]]rtsib logs gnyis dang /_de bzhin du lte ba khung dang /_de bzhin du phrag pa gnyis dang /_de bzhin du dpung mgo gnyis dang /_de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang /_de bzhin du lag mthil gnyis dang /_de bzhin du phyag sor gyi tshigs re re dang /_de bzhin du gtsug tor dang /_de bzhin 
[\[234b.5\]]du mdzod spu dang /_de bzhin du dbu'i skra nyag ma re re dang /_de bzhin du mtshan re re dang /_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang /_de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba 
[\[234b.6\]]khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed phyung ste/_shar phyogs su 'phros so/_/de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen 
[\[234b.7\]]pos khyab par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do/_/shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang /_de 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du steng dang 'og gi phyogs su yang 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag thams cad 'phros so/_/de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 
[\[235a.2\]]phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/_gang gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do/_/yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas 
[\[235a.3\]]pa gang yin pa de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang byang chub 
[\[235a.4\]]sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags na/_'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum 
[\[235a.5\]]phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/_'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/_'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag 
[\[235a.6\]]khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten 
[\[235a.7\]]gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]gang gA'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gcig 
[\[235b.2\]]gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i brgyad cha snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bcu drug cha snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i cha nyi shu snyed lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/_
[\[235b.3\]]'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/_'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams 
[\[235b.4\]]cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres 
[\[235b.5\]]pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[235b.6\]]pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to/_/gtor cing mngon par gtor nas bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra'o/_/shar lho'i mtshams su yang de dang 
[\[235b.7\]]'dra'o/_/lho nub kyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o/_/nub byang gi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang shar gyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o/_/steng du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/'og gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub 
[\[236a.2\]]sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyis bskor nas/_'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 
[\[236a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci 
[\[236a.4\]]smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/_'khor gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/_
[\[236a.5\]]'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/_'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/_'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/_byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya 
[\[236a.6\]]mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin sa rgya 
[\[236a.7\]]mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to/_/gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas phyogs 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho las/_'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul 
[\[236b.2\]]phra rab kyi rdul re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/_'on kyang sems can su la yang gnod pa'am sgrib pa med do/_/'jig rten 
[\[236b.3\]]gyi khams rnams dang /_gling rnams dang /_lhun po dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_gangs dang /_gangs chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po rnams dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang /_lha'i gnas rnams dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]klu dang /_mtsho bran dang /_mtshe'u rnams dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang gnod pa'am sgrib pa med de/_sngon ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[236b.5\]]rnams kyis kyang bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs par mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang /_byang chub 
[\[236b.6\]]sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang /_ye shes dang /_gzigs pa dang /_
[\[236b.7\]]khams dang /_rgyu dang /_dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_gdags pa dang /_rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]'dus sam/_'on te gzhan yang gang dag ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[237a.2\]]po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa la rnam par rtse ba/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed 
[\[237a.3\]]yod par gyur la/_nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang se gol gtogs pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyed de/_nyan thos chen po re res kyang sems 
[\[237a.4\]]bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed song la/_gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[237a.5\]]rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed de/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba der gnyis mi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[237a.6\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/_shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du byang 
[\[237a.7\]]shar gyi mtshams phyogs su song zhing /_nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der gnyis mi 'gro la de nas mi la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/_srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas kun nas bskor te/_lag mthil bzhin du mnyam 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]par gyur cing rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas nas/_bye mas bkang ste/_byur bur byas la/_de nas mi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas bye ma 'bru re re nas blangs la/_grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses te/_rtsi ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 
[\[237b.2\]]'bru de dag thams cad char gses la/_de nas mi de bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad shar phyogs su khyer te/_bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing /_bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa gcig bor te/_rtsis 
[\[237b.3\]]pa'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad bor te/_shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_de bzhin du nub dang /_de bzhin du byang dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang /_
[\[237b.4\]]de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams su bor la/_de nas mi des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag bor ba dang /_gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/_srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas 
[\[237b.5\]]kun nas bskor te/_lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing /_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas nas bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/_nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i grong khyer de las bye ma'i 'bru gcig tsam du zad do/_/nga'i byang 
[\[237b.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo/_/de'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang ming 'thun la rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/_ming tha dad pa dang rus tha dad pa lta ci smos/_byang chub

[\[238a.1\]]mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang /_sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'

[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprin dang /_lha'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/gtor cing 
[\[242a.2\]]mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor nas lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/_rang rang gi pad ma'i stan la 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig 
[\[242a.3\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa sha stag go/_/de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[242a.4\]]rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer 
[\[242a.5\]]grangs med pa dag byung ste/_des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/_bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad kyang bstan te/_sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par byas nas/_yang phyir log 
[\[242a.6\]]ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la phog par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la 'od zer des phog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 
[\[242a.7\]]'das kyi mdzod spu dang /_gtsug tor dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po re re dang /_spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi_/de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na mes 'jig pa dang /_chus 'jig pa dang /_rlung gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/_dper na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas bskor te/_rdo 
[\[242b.2\]]dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med cing /_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang ba la 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu me'i 'jig pa dang /_chu'i 'jig pa dang /_rlung gi 'jig par mthong ba de dag ni ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bur blta bar bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 
[\[242b.3\]]dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa ni rdul phra rab kyi rdul lhag ma ji snyed yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[242b.4\]]rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che ze ba 
[\[242b.5\]]can las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rdo rje'i rtse mo las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig 
[\[242b.6\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che pad ma rA ga las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu 
[\[242b.7\]]rin po che chu 'dang las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che an da rnyil las grub pa yin no/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[243a.2\]]khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mu tig dkar po las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mu tig nam mkha' mdog las 
[\[243a.3\]]grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin 
[\[243a.4\]]no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po ches rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la 
[\[243a.5\]]ni nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che so so yang 
[\[243a.6\]]dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya 
[\[243a.7\]]mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che dbugs 'byin thob pa rgya mtsho 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[243b.2\]]'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin 
[\[243b.3\]]po che 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 
[\[243b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa dag snang ngo /_/zhing re re na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang bar gyur te/_zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha dog tu gnas pa dag snang ngo /_/sangs 
[\[243b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[243b.6\]]'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo /_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan kyang sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig 
[\[243b.7\]]tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan par mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu med grangs med pa dag snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snang ngo /_/de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so/_/
[\[244a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag kyang snang ngo /_/de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang 
[\[244a.3\]]zhing thos so/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sku dang ye shes chags pa med 
[\[244a.4\]]pa brnyes pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed cing 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'don du 'jug pa dang /_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug 
[\[244a.5\]]pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_'jam 
[\[244a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/_de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya 
[\[244a.7\]]mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan chang gcig tsam yongs su btang bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger 'dug 
[\[244b.2\]]go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_che bas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba rnams zil gyis gnon 
[\[244b.3\]]te/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger 'dug go/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbyug pas bsnun tam/_mtshon gyis btab ste/_bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_'jam dpal 
[\[244b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_khro ba'i sems bskyed de brnyas pa'i sems kyang bskyed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang /_
[\[244b.5\]]tha ba dang /_khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/_chos ma yin pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams ma byung na 
[\[244b.6\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang /_bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[244b.7\]]'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba dang /_stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las 'byung la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na sangs rgyas 
[\[245a.2\]]thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur sti byas na sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[245a.3\]]lha'i na bza' phul te/_sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bdug pa las dmigs pa 'am/_mar 
[\[245a.4\]]me las dmigs pa 'am/_me tog las dmigs pa 'am/_spos las dmigs pa 'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las dmigs te/_byang chub tu sems bskyed na 'di ni de bas ches grangs med pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas bsod nams 
[\[245a.5\]]ches grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/snga ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod stong gi char yang mi phod/_'bum gyi char yang mi phod bye ba'i char yang mi phod/_bye ba brgya'i char yang mi phod/_bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/_bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod 
[\[245a.6\]]do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni stong pa nyid la mos par gyur na 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na gzhan mos pa skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/_
[\[245a.7\]]'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/_stong gi char yang mi phod/_'bum gyi char yang mi phod/_bye ba'i char yang mi phod/_bye ba brgya'i char yang mi phod/_bye ba 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]stong gi char yang mi phod/_bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las byang chub sems dpa'i zan bcad dam/_khros te tha na byang chub sems dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig 
[\[245b.2\]]bcad la/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_don gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[245b.3\]]cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/_khros nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos med par byas la/_sems can thams cad long bar byas na mi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i mi dge ba de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/_dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[245b.4\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa 
[\[245b.5\]]rnams dang /_phyogs tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/_tshad med pa rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la/_chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye 
[\[245b.6\]]ma snyed yang dag par 'du bya ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa 'jig rten grangs med pa dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing /_
[\[245b.7\]]phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]{D234}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA yu maN+Da la pa ri brta sarba nA ga hr-i da ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[246a.2\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na/_klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i tshogs chen po klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing klu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan 
[\[246a.3\]]pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po yang dag sgul dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog phreng can dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /_klu'i rgyal po dung dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[246a.4\]]po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po stobs kyis rgyu dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[246a.5\]]'brug sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po skar mda' stong dang /_klu'i rgyal po dus min sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtong dang /_klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs 
[\[246a.6\]]mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam lam dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /_klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang /_klu'i 
[\[246a.7\]]rgyal po rnga sgra dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrogs pa'i skad dang /_klu'i rgyal po la ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen dang /_klu'i rgyal po [{]ding [,]deng [}{]ding [,]deng [}]sgra dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang /_klu'i rgyal po smad dkris bzang dang /_klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang /_klu'i 
[\[246b.2\]]rgyal po sprin rgyas dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od 
[\[246b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu 'byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang /_klu'i 
[\[246b.4\]]rgyal po rlung 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung 'khrug par byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[246b.5\]]chen pos nam mkha' la di ri rir sgrogs shing /_rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/_bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/kye klu chen po dang klu dag tshur sheg_/mu lu mu lu tsa ta tsa ta/_pa Ta pa Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_hA hA/_glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung 
[\[246b.6\]]zhing rdzi char chen po'i rgyun thong la char phob shig_/kye kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig_/kye klu chen po dag tshur tshur/_tshur sheg tshur sheg_/'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig_/gu Du gu Du/_mu 
[\[246b.7\]]Du mu Du/_hi hi hi hi/_tsu Da tsu Da/_ma hA nA gA hr-i da ya/_sarba nA gA na/_A ka D+D+h+ya/_san tso da ya/_shi grA nad ra swA hA/_sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag gser snam gyi mtha' rin po che thams cad tshon gyi lda ldis mdzes pa/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba/_rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing lha'i ras bcos bu mang 
[\[247a.2\]]po dang mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag 
[\[247a.3\]]par ston pa'i rin po che bkod pa chen po rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla re dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_
[\[247a.4\]]bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rgya mtsho sprin chen pos sgra cher sgrogs shing lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/_mu tig gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba/_rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_gser skud kyis 
[\[247a.5\]]brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_snang ba dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho 
[\[247a.6\]]chen po'i sgras kun tu khebs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig_/klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad tshur shog_/sa'i steng 'dir 'brug sgra sgrogs shig_/char phob shig_/char rab tu phob shig_/char kun tu rab tu phob shig di ri rir 
[\[247a.7\]]sgrog shig_/glog chen po snang ba rab tu phyung shig_/'du zhing kun tu 'du la tog yar dir dir zhing 'dug ste/_klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig_/g+ha Da g+ha Da g+hi Di g+hi Di/_hu Du hu Du/_gu Du gu Du//_ga Da 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]ga Da/_gi Di gi Di/_ma Ta ma Ta/_tsa Ta tsa Ta/_pa Ta pa Ta/_kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag tshur tshur/_tshur sheg tshur sheg_/ng+hu ng+hu ng+hu ng+hu/_hA hA hA hA/_hI hI/_hU hU/_hUM hUM/_'brug sgra chen po sgrogs shing rlung chen po rab tu gtong bdag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

[\[247b.3\]]tsi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_di ri di ri/_ki li ki li/_zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig_/'bru dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang /_sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig_/byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_
[\[247b.4\]]chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang /_lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang /_klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu chen po dag tshur sheg_/tshur sheg_/klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob

[\[248a\]]

[\[248b.1\]]rnga sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal

[\[249a.1\]]bi ni/_ka li a ka le/_gardzi te/_sarba me g+ha bi kurba Ni/_saM tso da na/_sarba k+She tra a pUr Ni/_tsakri/_tsakra brte/_he ru he ru/_bi gi ba bi/_sma ra sma ra/_ka li ka li/_ma hA kA li/_hr-i da ya/_pra ba tha/_ad te/_mad te/_sarba na ga_/a kaR+Sha Ni/_pUr ya pU ra ya/_

[\[249b.1\]]cing sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byin par 'gyur te/_le'u 'di la the tsom dang brnyas par mi bya'o/_/gal te rgya mtsho dus tshod las yol na 'di yang char las yol bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying

[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
