[\[250a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad la bde legs su gyur cig_/'byung po 
[\[250a.5\]]thams cad la byams par gyur cig_/dud 'gror gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa med par gyur cig_/ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar gyur cig_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[250a.6\]]cad kyis gzigs pa'i cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_spu ta spu ta/_spu Ta spu Ta spu Ta swA hA/_char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis mgo bkrus te/_gos gtsang ma bgos la byams pa'i 
[\[250a.7\]]sems dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/_pog phor bdun gyis nam mkha' la gyen du bdug cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te/_zhag bdun gyi bar du 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rgyun ma chad par byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+deye shes sdes zhus 
[\[250b.2\]]te gtan la phab pa//[ {D235}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[250b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo'i gnas na nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[250b.4\]]dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_ma dros pa dang /_gzi can dang /_chu lha dang /_'jog po dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /_
[\[250b.5\]]sa srung gi bu dang /_mdongs bu dang /_dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_glog gi phreng ba dang /_gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang /_gtsug na nor bu thogs dang /_snang ldan gtsug phud can dang /_gtsug phud 'ja' can dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[250b.6\]]dbang po'i mchod sdong dang /_'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_bkra shis ldan dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po can dang /_lag gis 'gro chen po dang /_skar mdog dang /_zla ba'i gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyi blo gros dang /_zla mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /_shin 
[\[250b.7\]]tu brtan dang /_mgul na nor bu dang /_sprin byung dang /_char rgyun dang /_rab 'joms dang /_rnam par 'joms dang /_mthu bsgyings dang /_gdengs ka chen po dang /_dbyangs zab dang /_klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /_rnam par sgra 'byin dang /_ud pal dang /_rtsal chen dang /_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]gshol mda' 'dzin dang /_sna tshogs sde dang /_zhags pa chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_kun tu snang dang /_rna rtsub dang /_dung dang /_da ra da ra dang /_klu'i rgyal po u pa da ra da ra dang /_bde byed dang /_lag 'gro dang /_lag 'gro chen po dang /_dri 
[\[251a.2\]]ma chen po dang /_'phur lding dang /_sog ma med dang /_'phyang ba dang /_srin bu gnas dang /_nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang /_'dam bu dang /_nye ba'i 'dam bu dang /_dung thogs dang /_'gro lding dang /_rab mdzes dang /_glang chen sna dang /_rnon po dang /_ser skya dang /_
[\[251a.3\]]glog 'bar dang /_glog 'od chen po dang /_stobs lha dang /_chu stobs dang /_klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang /_bdud rtsi can dang /_mu stegs can dang /_bai dUr+ya'i 'od can dang /_gser mdog sgra dang /_gser 'od dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang /_nyi 'od dang /_
[\[251a.4\]]'char 'od dang /_bal glang mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_gshin rje dang /_dge tshul dang /_sbal pa dang /_ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang /_mu khyud 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_mgo stong can dang /_gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong 
[\[251a.5\]]dang /_sprin chen dang /_sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_sa skyong dang /_mis byin dang /_rnam par dul dang /_rga ba 'byung dang /_chu srin kun b+hi ra dang /_chu srin kun b+ha ra'i gdong dang /_dug 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang /_pad ma ka dang /_'jug ma dang /_rab 'phyang dang /_'jigs 
[\[251a.6\]]byed dang /_gzi brjid mdzes dang /_mgo lnga pa dang /_bal li ra dang /_shing rtas rgyal dang /_klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_mgo bo che dang /_bim pi ka dang /_bi ta ra dang /_mgyogs 'gro dang /_klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum dang /_klu sde dang /_
[\[251a.7\]]gzi chen dang /_'dam bu byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang /_'od 'bar dang /_mgo bdun pa dang /_sdong chen dang /_mthong dga' dang /_rab tu cher gtums dang /_dri med gzi brjid dang /_mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_drag po chen po dang /_'od 'phro phung po dang /_klu'i 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rgyal po gtum po dang /_khro bo drag shul can dang /_rin chen chu sbyin dang /_chu sbyin sprin chen dang /_dbang po'i 'od dang /_rkang pas 'thung dang /_sprin zla dang /_rgya mtsho'i sprin dang /_me tog dri chen dang /_ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang /_klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang /_tog chen po'i rgyal 
[\[251b.2\]]mtshan dang /_sprin chen snying po dang /_kha ba can dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_sprin mthu can dang /_mtshan mo 'dzin dang /_chu sbyin dang /_chu sbyin chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang /_sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_khro med dang /_sa'i bum pa dang /_klu 
[\[251b.3\]]dpa' dang /_chu 'dzin dang /_sprin gdugs dang /_ing gi ra'i gdong dang /_gzi brjid can dang /_sprin las mngon byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang /_cha byad mdzes dang /_lus chen dang /_spyang lto dang /_zhi ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_gser ngad can dang /_
[\[251b.4\]]mchog tu brtson dang /_dug drag dang /_dbyangs snyan dang /_klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i snying po dang /_rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang /_rnam par g.yo dang /_'khrug sgra dang /_rnga sgra dang /_bdud rtsi rgyun dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_'brug sgrogs dang /_dpa' sde dang /_
[\[251b.5\]]sred med kyi bu dang /_rgya mtsho'i glong dang /_klu'i rgyal po yon po dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla 
[\[251b.6\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang /_phu dud chen po byed pas me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[251b.7\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rin po che'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i lda ldi dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_klu'i me tog dang /_mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]pa sna tshogs dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/_lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[252a.2\]]kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang /_gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi 
[\[252a.3\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin/_rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa grangs med/_dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das 
[\[252a.4\]]pa dag dang /_lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[252a.5\]]pa/_ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/_kun du spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa dag gis nam 
[\[252a.6\]]mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang /_'od zer stug po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[252a.7\]]dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang /_me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /_phye ma dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]thams cad kyi gzugs kun du ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin 
[\[252b.2\]]rgya mtsho dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa/_ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/yul thams cad du 
[\[252b.3\]]bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[252b.4\]]thams cad kun du snang ba'i rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun du sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[252b.5\]]chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po 
[\[252b.6\]]rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 
[\[252b.7\]]sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che dang /_spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu 
[\[253a.2\]]brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma dang /_spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho 
[\[253a.3\]]sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/_phyogs bcu kun du 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can/_bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 
[\[253a.4\]]'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun du ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya 
[\[253a.5\]]mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgo kun du me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par 
[\[253a.6\]]bya'o/_/gser dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi tsong tsong dang /_phreng ba dang /_rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an da rnyil dang /_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i 
[\[253a.7\]]gser gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]po ches brgyan pa pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi 
[\[253b.2\]]seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 
[\[253b.3\]]'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par 
[\[253b.4\]]bya'o/_/spos dang /_nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun du ston pa'i shing ljon 
[\[253b.5\]]pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed 
[\[253b.6\]]pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad 
[\[253b.7\]]kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun du gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]dang /_kun du mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i 
[\[254a.2\]]phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang me tog dang /_pad ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[254a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun du ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[254a.4\]]dang /_nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang /_phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[254a.5\]]kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya 
[\[254a.6\]]mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 
[\[254a.7\]]'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_pad ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re 
[\[254b.2\]]rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho 
[\[254b.3\]]thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs la rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya 
[\[254b.4\]]mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng 
[\[254b.5\]]ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i rdul kun du snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po'i yal ga'i rgyan can gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 
[\[254b.6\]]'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun du bkod pas rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[254b.7\]]pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[255a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_rin po che'i rigs dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[255a.3\]]thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun du ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 
[\[255a.4\]]'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du 
[\[255a.5\]]bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams 
[\[255a.6\]]cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad 
[\[255a.7\]]kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor 
[\[255b.2\]]bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos 
[\[255b.3\]]thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_gos thams cad kyi 'od 
[\[255b.4\]]'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen 
[\[255b.5\]]mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/spos dang me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[255b.6\]]nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che dang /_spos dang /_tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad 
[\[255b.7\]]kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_thams cad kun tu bzang 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas klu'i rgyal po 
[\[256a.2\]]de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas 
[\[256a.3\]]rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/_/de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i 
[\[256a.4\]]sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[256a.5\]]gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag 
[\[256a.6\]]po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po ci dang /_ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces 
[\[256a.7\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'beb par 'gyur/_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/_'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/_bcud thams cad yang dag par 
[\[256b.2\]]skye bar 'gyur/_gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[256b.3\]]klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so/_/legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/klu'i bdag 
[\[256b.4\]]po chos gcig dang ldan na/_klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang /_mi rnams ni mes mi tshig_/mtshon gyis mi 
[\[256b.5\]]tshugs/_chus mi khyer/_dug gis mi tshugs/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/_bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/_bde bar sad par 'gyur/_rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/_bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 
[\[256b.6\]]'gyur/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur/_mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/_sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_mi'i chos 
[\[256b.7\]]bla ma rtogs nas/_lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/_/klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]las kyis gnas par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/_des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/_bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus 
[\[257a.2\]]dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo thog thams cad skye bar byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_ng+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/_ud+d+hA ra Ni/_sam pra tiSh+Thi te/_bi dza ya bar+Na/_sa t+ya pra 
[\[257a.3\]]ti dz+nyA sa ra dA/_dz+nyA na ba ti/_u ta pa da ni bi nA ma ni/_a b+hi She tsa ni/_a b+hi byA hA ra/_shu b+ha ba ti/_dzI ma tu/_e hi ku ma bA lan/_ba ha ha ra/_kle shA na d+hu na pA ba ma/_sho d+ha ya mArga na/_ni rA hi ka d+harmA tA shud d+hA/_lo ka bi ti mi ra rA dza sa du kha/_sha man sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka na a d+hi Sh+Thi 
[\[257a.4\]]te/_pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na b+he swA hA/_klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/_brjod par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 
[\[257a.5\]]'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/_ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[257a.6\]]kyi mtshan bzung bar bya/_yid la bya'o/_/de dag gis klu thams cad dang /_klu'i rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i rus thams cad dang /_klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang /_klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_klu'i bu mo 
[\[257a.7\]]thams cad dang /_klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[257b.2\]]ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[257b.3\]]gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[257b.4\]]gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od 
[\[257b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[257b.6\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[257b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bdal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyis sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[258a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 
[\[258a.3\]]'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la 
[\[258a.4\]]gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[258a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ud pa la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[258a.6\]]gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen

[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mthong nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 
[\[258b.2\]]'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyoms pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan 
[\[258b.3\]]pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin 
[\[258b.4\]]gyis kun du 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa/_
[\[258b.5\]]'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang /_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_'dzam 
[\[258b.6\]]bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab pa dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo thog thams cad skyed par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod 
[\[258b.7\]]pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang /_mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_gnod pa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe/_yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_gnod 
[\[259a.2\]]pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsol/_gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha thams cad rab tu dga' 
[\[259a.3\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bgyid pa dang /_rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis 
[\[259a.4\]]pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 
[\[259a.5\]]'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog 
[\[259a.6\]]mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[259a.7\]]klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]byin gyis brlabs pa/_rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/_de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/_char ches na gcod 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/_klu thams cad skul bar byed/_lha thams cad sim par byed/_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/_
[\[259b.2\]]sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/_/tad+ya thA/_ma hA dz+nyA na a ba b+hA sA ni/_shrI te dzo lak+Sh+mi br-iSh+Ti pikra ma/_badzra sing ha ta ne/_pa ra ma bi rA dza/_nirma la gu Na ke tu sUr+ya pra b+he/_bi ma lAng ga yaSh+Ti/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sam b+ha ra sam b+ha ra/_du dum bu/_
[\[259b.3\]]ha na ha na/_ma ha pra b+he/_bi b+hU ta ma hA ma ho an d+ha kA re/_pradz+nyA gra shud d+he/_pa ri pU r+N+Na mai tre/_mai tra bi ra Na skan d+ha/_mai trA ma bud+d+ha re/_dza la dza la/_dza la dza la/_dza lam bud+d+ha re/_bo d+h+yad ga ku su me/_da sha ba le/_tsa tur be shwa ra d+he/_a sh+TA da sha/_a pa ni ga bud d+ha d+ha rme/_shu b+ha ma 
[\[259b.4\]]di/_pu N+ya rA shi/_shu kla d+har ma sa ma n+wi te/_gam b+hI re/_bi ra dza se/_bi ma le bi shi Sha prA p+te/_ni rA sra pa d+harme/_sarba lo kadz+yaiSh+Tha/_dzeSh+Tha par pra ba re/_a nut+ta re/_a sang ge_/d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ra shAn+ta ma te/_shAn ta be ge_/tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa ra tsa 
[\[259b.5\]]ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pa ra ma bud d+hA nu ma te/_ma ha pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 
[\[259b.6\]]char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/_/sad+yA the dan/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru nA gA nAn/_dza ba dza ba/_dzi bi dzi bi/_dzu bu dzu bu/_
[\[259b.7\]]klu chen po dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig_/tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg_/kye klu chen po dag_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig_/ba ra ba ra/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]bi ri bi ri/_bu ru bu ru/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/_/byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[260a.2\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_bden pa dang /_byams pa chen pos klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig_/b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_chu chen po'i 
[\[260a.3\]]chu dang /_sprin gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg_/ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig_/g+ha Da g+ha Da/_g+hi Di g+hi Di/_g+hu Du g+hu Du/_drag shul can khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/_dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa 
[\[260a.4\]]rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par tshur sheg_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig_/swA hA/_ta Ta ta Ta/_ti Ti ti Ti/_tu Tu tu Tu/_nor bu chen po'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon 
[\[260a.5\]]mchog gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs dran par gyis la/_rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig_/swA hA/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams 
[\[260a.6\]]tshur sheg_/byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/_ra la ra la/_ri li ri li/_ru lu ru lu/_lag gis 'gro ba thams cad khyed rnams 
[\[260a.7\]]gnyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/_g+ha ma g+ha ma/_g+hi mi g+hi mi/_g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/_klu thams cad dgug go/_/byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/_na ra na ra/_ni ri ni ri/_nu ru nu ru/_swA hA/_yon po sna tshogs 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]su gyur mgo stong pa/_mgo dang mig dmar ba/_stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o/_/kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/_bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[260b.2\]]rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs dran par gyis shig_/ga Ta ga Ta/_gi Ti gi Ti/_gu Tu gu Tu/_swA hA/_stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang /_gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob shig_/sha ra sha ra/_shi ri shi ri/_shu ru shu 
[\[260b.3\]]ru/_swA hA/_kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang /_cho rigs dran par gyis la ma shol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob shig swA hA/_tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu 
[\[260b.4\]]phob shig swA hA/_brgya byin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag brgyad po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po 
[\[260b.5\]]dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_
[\[260b.6\]]klu chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 
[\[260b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_lha thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/_klu thams cad 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]kyi bden pas sa chen po 'dir rab tu char phob shig swA hA/_gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srungs shig swA hA/_dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/_lha ma yin 
[\[261a.2\]]thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog cig swA hA/_nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po'i rgyun phob shig swA hA/_mi 'am ci thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 
[\[261a.3\]]gyis shig swA hA/_sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig swA hA/_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun phob shig swA hA/_'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung shig swA hA/_mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad la 
[\[261a.4\]]yongs su srungs shig swA hA/_ka raka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_da ra da ra/_di ri di ri/_du ru du ru/_na Ta na Ta/_ni Ti ni Ti/_nu Tu nu Tu/_shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/_sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/_sprin ldan ma/_sprin chen ldan ma/_sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/_sprin 
[\[261a.5\]]gsal ma/_sprin 'byung ma/_dus sprin ma/_sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/_sprin sgrogs ma/_sprin bzhugs ma/_sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/_sprin gyi phreng ba mnga' ma/_sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/_sprin bcibs ma/_sprin la gnas bcas ma/_sprin gyi snying po/_sprin gyi 
[\[261a.6\]]ral pa can/_sprin 'od ma/_sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/_rgya chen sprin bzhugs ma/_mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/_lo thog 'ongs sgrub ma/_ri sul na bzhugs ma/_klu'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma/_sprin chen dpal ldan skar mdog can/_bsil reg ma/_tshub ma chen po 
[\[261a.7\]]spyod yul ma/_klu chen rnam par rol mdzad ma/_bcom ldan 'das ma/_pon tra bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dbab tu gsol swA hA/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_g+hi ri ni g+hari ni/_g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/_dbu dgu dang ldan ma/_sprin chen phreng ldan ma/_klog tshogs phreng ldan ma/_lag gis 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/_sprin lta bu'i na bza' man bsam/_dug drag po thams cad spyod yul ma/_sprin bkod pa la bcibs ma/_'brug 
[\[261b.2\]]sgrogs ma/_sgra sgrogs ma/_klu'i tshogs la skul ma/_lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma/_klu thams cad la ma shol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig ces bskul du gsol swA hA/_ya ra ya ra/_yi ri yi ri/_yu ru yu ru/_
[\[261b.3\]]dza ra dza ra/_dzi ri dzi ri/_dzu ru dzu ru/_dz+ha ra dz+ha ra/_gu tu gu tu/_gu gu tu/_ga Ta ga Ta/_gi Ti gi T+wi/_ha ra ha ra/_hi li hi li/_mu lu mu lu/_ta la ta la/_ti li ti li/_tu lu tu lu/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_mar dmar da/_pra mar da 
[\[261b.4\]]pra b.rasha big nan/_ma tre yod nyA pa ya ti/_swA hA/_bud d+he bud d+he/_bu bud d+he/_su bud d+he/_ha ra pA pa na/_sarba sa twA nAn/_a d+hisha ya pu N+ya ma/_sarba bud d+ha nAn/_d+ha ri ni d+ha re/_shu b+ha ma te/_gu NA graprA pa ne/_ma hA dz+nyA no la ke_/shukla d+harme/_sang+ya pra ti dz+nyA/_ma 
[\[261b.5\]]hA yA nA d+h+yu Shi te lo ka dz+yaiSh+Tha b+ha ga ba ti/_bud d+ha mai tre a yu bu ra ya sarba k+She trA ni/_shu kle shwe twam/_pa ra dA re/_pa na Ta ra ba si ni/_d+hu d+hu ru/_sha ma sha ma/_shAn+ta mA na se/_char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[261b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag pa brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo/_/klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[261b.7\]]gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rab tu char phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rab tu char phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par bskul lo/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rab tu char phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rab tu char phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob 
[\[262a.2\]]shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po chu lha la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dag par 
[\[262a.3\]]bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig 
[\[262a.4\]]swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par 
[\[262a.5\]]bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po dpa' [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po glog gi phreng ba la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig 
[\[262a.6\]]swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po snang ldan 
[\[262a.7\]]gtsug pud can la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_nA ge na ge/_/ma hA nA ge_/g+ho ra mA na se/_nA 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ga hr-id ya/_d+hu maku le/_u gra ro She/_pra tsaN+Da te dzo/_bi Sho gre/_A shA bi she/_a hi g+ho re/_kriSh+Ra ping ga le/_tsa na tsa le/_lo la dzi hwe/_ma hA pha na ka re/_kA la pA she/_rauM dra bA si ni/_Tu Tu ma be/_g+ha Na g+ha Na/_shi khi ni/_ka Na ka Na/_ga Na ga Na/_ma hA ga Na 
[\[262b.2\]]ga Ne/_pa ra pa ra/_pi ri pi ri/_pu ru pu ru/_bi s+phurdza ne/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ma hA b+ho ge_/ma Ni d+ha ri/_phi ri phi ri/_phu ru phu ru/_pha ra pha ra/_bar Sha bar Sha/_dza lAm bu d+ha re/_sham bu sham bu/_ba ta Du tum pe/_d+hud d+hud d+hudad+hum be/_me g+ha pra b+he/_me g+ha bA hine/_D+ha ka D+ha 
[\[262b.3\]]ka D+ha ka D+hu D+hum be/_g+ha NA g+ha NA/_shi ki ni/_ka na ka na/_ga Na ga Na/_ma hA nA ga ga ne/_ni rA tra N+ya/_pa dza ra da kA ri ma hA nA gA d+hi ba ta ye/_g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma pa ya sti ka/_dzAng gA ri b+hu dzang sha me/_pi ka ta sang ka te/_g+ho ra bi s+phurdza ni bi dzr-im b+han+te/_klu thams cad dgug go/_/
[\[262b.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang /_byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/_na maHsarba bu ng+d+he b+h+yaHsid d+han tu man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_'phags pa sprin chen po theg 
[\[262b.5\]]pa chen po'i mdo/_stong phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi'o//_//cho ga ni char cher dbab par 'dod na bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre/_ba dan sngon po dpyang ngo /_/chos smra ba lus 
[\[262b.6\]]bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/_spos dri zhim pos bskus nas zas dkar gsum zos la stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas/_kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sprin 
[\[262b.7\]]chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o/_/chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/gtor ma dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro/_/de la chos smra bas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bya ste/_shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa ba'i lci bas bri bar bya'o/_/lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs 
[\[263a.2\]]su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/chos smra bas rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te 
[\[263a.3\]]sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag nas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab la klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/_'di ni cho ga'o/_/gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/_sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di 
[\[263a.4\]]klog na/_nyin zhag gcig gam/_gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad gdon mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho ni dus las yol kyang srid kyi/_thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang yon tan la 
[\[263a.5\]]gnas te/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sha dang nya la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'o thug dang zho dang 'o ma dang /_'bras chan bu ram can la sogs pa dang /_mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs 
[\[263a.6\]]pa bzhin du the tshom med par bya'o/_/'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 
[\[263a.7\]]ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D236}]@##/_/bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo le'u stong phrag bcu pa las le'u bcu pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i ri lta bu 
[\[263b.2\]]dam pa'i chos kyi gdan seng ge'i khri las slar nur nas rin po che'i sku rten drangs te/_de la sku brten nas dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_khyed la sogs pa slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa byang chub chen 
[\[263b.3\]]po'i sems bskyed de tshor ba dam pa blang bar bya'o/_/ngas da yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos bshad zin na khyed kyis da dung du khong du ma chud do/_/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rnal 'byor na phra ba'i yang phra ba'i bdud kyi las dang /_bdud kyi khams mngon sum du snang ste/_khyed kyis de 
[\[263b.4\]]rig par ma nus na sems yang dag par sbyangs par mi gdags te/_log pa'i lta bar ltung bas khyed bar bar ni phung po'i bdud kyis bar bar ni lha'i bdud/_bar bar ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang lha ma yin gyis byin gyis brlabs te skabs rnyed do/_/nang du sems kyis ma tshor nas rkun po 
[\[263b.5\]]la bu yin par bzung ste/_yang de'i nang nas chung shes tsam gyi thob pa la grub ste chog go snyam du sems pa ni bsam gtan bzhi la chags pa dang mtshungs so/_/de ni mtshams med pa'i dge slong ste 'phags pa thob bo snyam du bsams pas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas pa'o/_/lha tshe zad pa'i 
[\[263b.6\]]khar yang ltas pa mngon du byung ste/_dgra bcom pa la yang phyi ma'i lus len to zhes skur pa btab nas mtshams med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/khyod nyon la legs par soms te yid la gyis shig dang /_ngas da khyod kyi phyir zhib tu bye brag dbye'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[263b.7\]]stsal pa dang /_dga' bo stan las langs pa dang /_'khor gyi nang nas slob pa 'thun pa dag kyang rab tu dga' nas spyi bos btud de lus dang sems shin tu gus shing dang bas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes dgongs pa las slar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dga' bo dang /_'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa khyed la sogs pa shes par gyis shig_/ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshor ba rgyas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_rigs bcu gnyis las skyes pa'i zag pa 
[\[264a.2\]]can gyi 'jig rten par yang so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad mod kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi don nor ba'i nyes pa las thibs po dang sred pa byung zhing skyes so/_/de ltar skyes shing byung nas de'i phyir stong pa rang bzhin yod par 'gyur te thams cad du 'khrul pa yin no/_/
[\[264a.3\]]'khrul pa las rdzus pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'jig rten byung ngo /_/de lta bas na phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo'i zhing khams kyang mi zag pa med do/_/de lta bu ni 'khrul pa'i pho theg can yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi gzhung 'dzugs par shes par byos shig_/nam mkha' 
[\[264a.4\]]stong pa ni nang nas khyed kyi sems las skyes so/_/dper na nam mkha' las sprin glo bur du byung na 'jig rten pa thams cad de'i nang na 'dug pa bzhin te/_khyed las 'ga' zhig gis yang dag pa 'di la ma phyogs na phyogs bcu'i stong pa thams cad kyang zhi zhing byang ste/_nam mkha'i 
[\[264a.5\]]khams kyi yul thams cad ci'i phyir g.yo/_rab tu g.yo bar mi 'gyur/_phyogs bcu'i zag pa zad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dgra bcom pa dag khyed bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor spyod de/_sems dang zhing sa le bar de bzhin nyid la rtse gcig gi ting 
[\[264a.6\]]nger 'gyur na bdud kyi rgyal po thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_sems can ma rabs la sogs pa'i khang khyim kun ni rnyil/_sa chen po ni rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/chu'i nang na gnas pa dang /_skam la gnas pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'phur ba de 
[\[264a.7\]]dag khyed la sogs pas/_ci'i phyir rnyil zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/_lha ma yin dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha'i bdud dag zhe sdang che bar g.yo ba yang yod de/_khyed bsam gtan bsgom pa'i thad du 'ongs nas gnod pa byas su zin kyang mtshan ma'i dri ma la goms pa'i nang nas khyed kyis tshor 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ba'i snying por gtugs na/_de'i phyir 'od pa rlung gis phog pa bzhin/_chu la ral gri btab pa ltar/_gcig gis gcig la gnod par mi 'gyur/_phas kyis rgol ba'i chab srom sra ba la khyod kyi drod kyis chu tshan khol bas khad kyis nye zhing myur du 'ju ba'i phyir bdud la sogs pas 
[\[264b.2\]]byin gyis brlabs kyang rang nyon mongs su zad de don med do/_/de ltar na 'gron dang mtshungs te grub pa dang /_bshig cing gyes par yang byed de/_khyed kyi sems kyi nang nas phung po lnga'i bdag po 'khrul te 'gron gyis skabs rnyed na de nyid du tshor bas chud par bsam gtan du 
[\[264b.3\]]bsgoms na 'khrul par mi 'gyur te/_khyed la bdud kyi rgol bas mi thub bo/_/phung po byang ba'i gsal ba la zhugs na phyin ci log gi tshogs kun so sor med par 'gyur te snang bas ni mun nag sel nus so/_/nye bar 'ongs kyang rang dul bar 'gyur na/_bsam gtan pa la 
[\[264b.4\]]gnod pa byed lta ga la zhig spobs/_de ltar tshor bas chud par ma byas na phung pos slu ba yin no/_/dga' bo khyod ni bdud kyi bur 'gyur te/_bdud kyi mi la sgrub pa byed do/_/ma thad ga lta bu mthu chung yang sngags kyi mthu'i phyir khyod kyi tshul khrims 'jig par nus so/_/khri 
[\[264b.5\]]phrag brgyad kyi spyad pa'i nang nas/_tshul khrims gcig bshig kyang sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir khyod ma rmongs ma 'thoms te/_de ni bsod nams yod pa'i phyir khyod kyi rin po che'i lus ma 'khyams so/_/dper na blon po chen po'i khang khyim skad cig so sor bgos te khyed 
[\[264b.6\]]la med na skyabs byed mi nus pa dang 'dra'o/_/dga' bo shes par gyis shig_/khyed byang chub kyi snying por rnal 'byor na dang zhing gsal bas g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba thams cad kyis mi skul te/_drang ba dang brjod par ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas na mtshan ma thams 
[\[264b.7\]]cad zad de/_sgrib pa med na de ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa mun nag gi nang du phyin pa dang mtshungs te/_rang bzhin gsal zhing dngas mod kyi/_da dung sems kyi 'od ma byung bas de ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsgribs pa'o/_/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]mig dang ldan pas ni phyogs bcur sa ler snang ste/_ci yang lus pa med de/_de'i ming ni gzugs kyi phung po zad de/_mi de ni bskal pa'i snyigs ma las 'das so/_/don de la brtags na yang dag ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi rtsa ba bsrab pa'i phyir ro/_/dga' bo de lta bu 
[\[265a.2\]]la gnas shing sbyangs na gsal zhing dngas te/_khams bzhi ma 'khrugs pa las sems skad cig tsam zhig lus thogs pa med par snang ste/_de'i ming ni dang zhing gsal ba mngon du lung par 'bab par bsgoms pa las/_yud tsam zhig byung ba yin gyi 'phags par gyur pa ni 
[\[265a.3\]]ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsams na dge ba'i mngon rtags su ni rung gi de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na de log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/dga' bo yang sems de nyid sbyangs shing dang ste/_lus kyi nang dngas shing gsal ba las yud tsam zhig mi de'i 
[\[265a.4\]]lus kyi nang nas srin grol ma glo bur du byung yang lus kyi rang bzhin ji bzhin te/_smas shing nyams pa yang med par mthong ngo /_/de'i ming ni gzugs kyi yan lag dang /_gsal ba'i lung par 'bab pa'i brtson 'grus las gyur pa yin gyi/_'phags pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa ni 
[\[265a.5\]]ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsams na dge ba'i ltas su ni rung gi_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na de log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/dga' bo yang sems de nyid kyis sbyangs shing dang na de'i tshe sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams 
[\[265a.6\]]'gron dang /_sbyin bdag ji bzhin pa la mi 'gyur ba la spyod pas 'dzin pa'i lus ma gtogs par gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing mnyam par gzhag pa las sems skad cig tsam zhig nam mkha' stong pa las cig car du phyogs bcu nas chos zab mo'i don 'chang ba lta bu'i sgra thos 
[\[265a.7\]]so/_/de'i ming ni sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa ldang dub las dge ba'i rgyu grub pa yin te/_dge ba'i mtshan ma ni yin gyi 'phags pa'i 'bras bu ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems na lam log par ltung ngo /_/dga' bo yang sems de gsal zhing sa le ba'i nang 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]nas sems skad cig 'od byung ste/_phyogs bcu khyab par 'dzam bu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/_rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur nas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i 'od brtsegs pa'i khang pa na bzhugs te/_sangs 
[\[265b.2\]]rgyas bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing sa ya phrag brgya'i zhing dang pad mor bcas pa lta bur byung bar snang ste/_de'i ming ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas chud cing 'jug pa'i chags pa ste/_sems sbyangs pa'i 'od las 'jig rten thams cad snang ba de yang thang cig tu zad de dge ba'i 
[\[265b.3\]]mtshan mar ni rung gi 'phags pa'i 'bras bu ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du 'dzin na lam 'og ma'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de dang zhing gsal bar sbyangs pa las dpyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par brnyas shing btul/_'dul bcil te 'phar nas de'i tshe sems 
[\[265b.4\]]skad cig tsam zhig phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' las rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog tu gyur te/_bar bar ni kha dog sna brgyad par 'gyur ro/_/yang khyab par gang ba ni sngon po ser po dmar po dkar po dag so so nas ma 'dres pa lta bur snang ste de ni brnyas shing btul bcil te 'phar 
[\[265b.5\]]ba las gyur te/_de yang thang cig tu zad pas 'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsams na de dge ba'i mtshan mar ni rung gi de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bzung na/_lam log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de yun ring du sbyangs te/_
[\[265b.6\]]ma 'phrogs shing dang ba las sems skad cig tsam zhig mtshan mo'i mun gnag nang nas rdzas sna tshogs mthong ste/_nyin mo mthong ba dang mtshungs so 'di ltar mthong ba de'i ming ni sems phra ba'i yang phra ba'i dang ba las gyur pa yin te/_dge ba'i mtshan ma yin gyi 'phags par gyur pa ma 
[\[265b.7\]]yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de nam mkhar rgyas par bsgoms pa las sems skad cig tsam zhig khams bzhi yang rtswa shing dang 'dra bar mthong ste/_mes bsregs mtshon chas gtubs kyang mi tshor ro/_/
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]me'i 'od kyis mched kyang tshig par mi 'gyur zhing /_sha bcad na yang shing bzhogs pa dang mtshungs so/_/de'i ming ni rdul phra mo 'dus pa khams bzhi'i phung po ma pa las de ltar gyur te/_de yang skad cig gcig tu zad de/_dge ba'i mtshan mar ni rung gi 
[\[266a.2\]]'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du 'dzin na ni log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de yongs su dag par bsgrubs te/_brtson 'grus kyi spyod yul gyi mthar gnas pa las skad cig tsam zhig sems kyi phyogs bcu'i sa chen po dang /_ri dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]chu klung mthong ste/_de nyid sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur nas rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing /_snod gang bas khyab cing gang ba dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa brgyan pa na bzhugs te/_nam mkha' gang bar 
[\[266a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/yang 'og gi phyogs su sems can dmyal ba mthong /_steng gi phyogs su yang lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dag bsgribs pa med pa lta bur mthong ste/_de'i ming ni skyo ba dang dga' bas bying ba'i 'du shes zab tu zhen pa yun rings pa las gyur pa yin gyi 'phags 
[\[266a.5\]]par gyur pa ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na dge ba'i mtshan ma ni yin gyi/_de la 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du 'dzin na ni log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de dad pa yun ring du sbyangs pa las sems skad cig tsam zhig nam gyi 
[\[266a.6\]]gung la rgyang ring po na tshong dus dang /_grong khyer dang /_gnyen bshes kyang mthong ngo /_/bar bar ni gtam zer ba'i sgra yang thos shing /_bar chad kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa lta bu yang mthong na/_de'i ming ni sems mnan cing bcil ba las gyur pa yin te/_dge ba'i ltas ni 
[\[266a.7\]]yin gyi/_'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/yang sems de dang bar yun ring du sbyangs pa las rkyen med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gi lus dang cha byad bsgyur zhing rnam pa sna tshogs lta bur mthong ste/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]de'i ming ni slu ba'i sems te lha ma yin khong du zhugs pa'o/_/bar bar ni lha'i bdud kyis bslus te/_sems kyi khong du zhugs nas thogs pa med par chos zab mo'i don 'chad mkhas te de ni 'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsams na bdud 
[\[266b.2\]]kyi las de zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du bsams na log pa'i khams su ltung ngo /_/dga' bo de rnams bcu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi snga ltas yin te/_'di kun ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no/_/de dag ni bsgom pa nor ba las de'i phyir 'di 'dra bar gyur te/_
[\[266b.3\]]pho theg can gyi skye bor bslad pas rang gi drod ma zin te/_rgyu rkyen de lta bu dang phrad nas 'khrul bar rang gis ma shes te/_bdag 'phags pa'o snyam du sems pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]chen por 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyed la sogs pa de lta bu la rten 
[\[266b.4\]]par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i phyin ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la/_don de dag shod cig_/ston cig_/lha'i bus bdud kyi skabs ma rnyed par gzugs su bzung ste/_chongs la man ngag bzhag cing skyabs dang bsrung ba byas na bla na med pa'i don grub 
[\[266b.5\]]bo/_/dga' bo rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin dang /_zhi gnas la snyoms par zhugs te/_gzugs kyi phung po zad na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems mthong ste/_dper na me long dag pa'i nang na gzugs snang ba bzhin te/_spyad du nus par thob pa'o/_/log pa'i slad 
[\[266b.6\]]mas sems la phog na g.yo bar mi nus te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis non pa ltar rkang lag dang snga ma kho bzhin zhing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang thos pa ma 'khrul to/_/de'i ming ni tshor ba'i phung pos bsgribs pa'o/_/de ste non pa las sangs nas sems lus dang bral te slar 'dod la rtog na 'gro 
[\[266b.7\]]ba dang 'dug pa la rang dbang du gyur te sgrib pa med do/_/de'i ming ni tshor ba'i phung po zad de/_mi de ni lta ba'i snyigs ma las 'das so/_/don de la brtags na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi rtsa ba gsog gi phyir ro/_/dga' bo rigs kyi bu dag de dag de la gnas te/_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]nang shin tu bsgribs pa las/_sems la nang nas gsal ba byung ste/_'od zer chen po thob nas sems kyi skad cig tsam zhig mi zad pa'i snying rje skyes nas sbrang bu lcags phye la yang bu gcig pa bzhin byams par lta zhing /_de bzhin du snying rje'i sems skyes 
[\[267a.2\]]nas mi tshor bar mchi ma byung ste/_de'i ming ni lhag par spyod pa grags pa 'di las byung ba yin te/_de la tshor ba ni nyes pa med de 'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la tshor bas chud na nor bar mi 'gyur te/_ring zhig nas zhi zhing 'byung ngo /_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du 
[\[267a.3\]]sems na ni snying rje'i bdud khong du zhugs te/_mi dag mthong na snying rje skye zhing mchi ma mi 'chad par 'byung ste/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas log par gol bar ltung ngo /_/yang dga' bo ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas rigs kyi bu dag gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi bar mthong /_tshor 
[\[267a.4\]]ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ste/_rgyal ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du byung ba las de sems kyi skad cig tsam zhig bskyod du med pa'i sems skyes te/_dpa' brtun cing mgyogs par brtun ngas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sems te/_yud tsam zhig bskal pa grangs 
[\[267a.5\]]med pa gsum 'das par nus so snyam du sems so/_/de'i ming ni yon tan gyis myur ba'i lhag par thal ches pa'i khyad du gsod pa'o/_/de la tshor na ni nyes pa med de 'phags par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no/_/de la tshor bas chud na ni mi 'gyur te ring zhig nas zhi zhing 'byung ngo /_/
[\[267a.6\]]de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems na smyon pa'i bdud khong du zhugs te/_mi dag mthong na ngoms shing nga rgyal skyes nas rlom sems dpe med pa ni sangs rgyas ni bla mar mi byed mi ni 'og mar mi rtsi ste/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin de'i nang 
[\[267a.7\]]nas rigs kyi bu dag gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ba las ye shes kyi stobs ni zhen cing phra ste/_phyir log nas ci yang ma mthong ste/_sngon las gsar gyi don ni ma mthong /_phyi ma sems de stor nas/_sems kyi nang nas sems kyi skad cig 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]tsam zhig shin tu brtson 'grus kyi skom pas gdungs te/_dus thams cad du ma gyes par sems gcig tu dran nas sems des brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid du gyur to snyam du sems te/_de'i ming ni shes rab 'chal par bsgom pa ste/_rang 'khyams pa yin no/_/de la tshor 
[\[267b.2\]]na ni nyes pa med de 'phags par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems na dran pa'i bdud khong du zhugs te rtag tu sems 'dzin par gcig tu dmigs te/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas log pa'i gol bar ltung ngo /_/yang de rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 
[\[267b.3\]]'dzin gyi nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ba las/_shes rab kyi stobs ni ting nge 'dzin gyis non nas rtul cing /_rno ba'i sems ni stor bas rgyal ba'i rang bzhin sems kyi nang nas dran pa la ni rang gi sems la the tshom skyes nas 
[\[267b.4\]]rang rnam par snang mdzad yin no snyam du sems so/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]thob pa la chog pa snyam du 'dzin pa de'i ming ni rtag par chud pa'i sgom pa ni stor cing nub/_shes shing mthong ba ni bying ba'o/_/de la tshor na ni nyes pa med de/_'phags par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems 
[\[267b.5\]]na zhan cing dman pa'i chog mi shes pa'i bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs te/_mi dag mthong na rang gis bla na med pa'i don dam pa 'thob bo zhes smras te yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung 
[\[267b.6\]]po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ba las don gsar du ni ma thob/_rnying pa'i sems ni stor te/_gnyi ga ma yin nas rang la dga' ba'i bag tsha ba'i sems skyes nas/_skad cig tsam zhig sems kyi skye shi thams cad 'tshe ba'i mya ngan grangs med par skyes te/_
[\[267b.7\]]lcags kyi khri tsha ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang mtshungs/_dug 'thungs pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba mi 'dod par sems te/_rtag par mi gzhan la srog chod la rnam par grol ba blang bar byos shig zer ro/_/de'i ming ni spyod pa'i thabs stor ba ste/_de la tshor na ni nyes pa med de/_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'phags par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems na rigs gcig pa'i mya ngan can gyi bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs te/_lag pa na mtshon cha thogs nas bdag gi sha gcod cing tshe med par byed pa la dga'o/_/bar bar ni rtag tu mya ngan 
[\[268a.2\]]skyes nas 'bros te/_ri dang lung du 'gro zhing mi dag mthong bar mi dga' ste/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ste/_rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[268a.3\]]nang nas sems kyi skad cig tsam zhig bdag gi sems dpag tu med par dga' ches pa bdag la rang dbang med par skyes so/_/de'i ming ni shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin bde bas bcings pa de la tshor na ni nyes med de/_'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la bdag 'phags 
[\[268a.4\]]pa'o snyam du sems na rtag tu sred par dga' ba'i rigs gcig pa'i bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs te/_mi dag mthong na dgod cing /_grong bar na bdag glu len cing bro rdung ste/_bdag rang gis bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba thob bo snyam du sems shing /_yang 
[\[268a.5\]]dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin gyi nang na/_gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni snang zhing gsal ba las bdag ni chog go snyam du sems nas gzhi med par sems kyi skad cig tsam zhig nga rgyal chen po 
[\[268a.6\]]g.yos te/_de bzhin du nga dang /_cher sems pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'i nga rgyal dang /_nga zhes zer ba'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o zhes zer ba'i nga rgyal dang /_cung zad ces zer ba'i nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal rnams cig char du skyes te/_sems kyi nang nas bla ma'i 
[\[268a.7\]]phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang tshong dpog na/_'og ma sa'i nyan thos dang /_de'i rang sangs rgyas lta ci smos/_de'i ming ni bdag nyid rgyal ba thob ste/_'chal pa'i shes rab kyis rang skyabs med pa'o/_/de la tshor na ni nyes med de/_'phags par 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems na nga rgyal chen po'i bdud sems kyi nang du zhugs te/_mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang la phyag mi 'tshal/_d+har ma dang sku gzugs dag la 'dral bar byed/_yon bdag dag la 'di skad du smras te/_la la 
[\[268b.2\]]ni gser dang /_gar ba dang sa dang shing dang chu shun dang shing lo'o/_/la la ni ras dang me tog go zhes nas rang gus par mi byed cing /_sha'i lus ni yang dag par rtag pa yin no zhes phyin ci log par sa dang /_shing dag la yid rton par byed pa ni yang dag par na log pa yin no 
[\[268b.3\]]zhes ston te/_dad cing yid ches bdag la shig cing grol te 'or la/_sa'i 'og tu sbos shig zer zhing /_sems can dag la the tsom dang skur pas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/yang rigs 
[\[268b.4\]]kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ste/_dang zhing gsal ba'i nang nas don rgyas shing dang ba 'dir spyod pa rig pa'i rjes su gzhol ba chen po 'thob ste/_sems kyi skad cig tsam zhig dpag tu med par yang zhi 
[\[268b.5\]]zhing bde ba'i sems skyes nas rang gis rang dbang chen po thob ste/_'phags pa'o snyam du sems so/_/de'i ming ni shes rab dang zhing yang ba'i rgyu kun thob pa ste/_de la tshor na ni nyes pa med de/_'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems 
[\[268b.6\]]na yang zhing dang bsred par rigs gcig pa'i bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs nas bdag grub ste rdzogs so snyam zhing yang 'bogs pa la mi brtson no/_/ma thos pa'i dge slong de skur pa 'debs/_the tsom dang le lo byed pa ni phyis mtshams med pa sems can dmyal 
[\[268b.7\]]bar ltung ste/_yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin gyi nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi zhing gsal ba'o/_/tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal zhing byang ste/_gsal ba'i tshor ba'i nang nas stong pa'i rang bzhin thob ste/_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]de'i nang nas sems skad cig tsam zhig zhi ba'i 'gog pa la zhugs nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med do zhes phyogs gcig pa'i stong pa la zhugs te/_stong pa la mngon sum du snang ba'i bar du sems skyes nas rtag tu 'chad cing 'gog pa shes so snyam du sems 
[\[269a.2\]]te/_de la tshor na ni nyes med de/_'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags par gyur pa'o snyam du sems na stong pa'i bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs te khrims bsrung ba la skur pa 'debs so/_/de'i ming ni theg pa chung ngu ste/_mi des rtag par yid ches 
[\[269a.3\]]pa'i yon bdag la 'di skad du smras te/_byang chub sems dpa' la bsrung ba dang zhig pa med kyis chang 'thung sha zo/_/g.yem dar rgyas par shod cig ces so/_/bdud kyi stobs kyi phyir mi dag kyang sdud do/_/mi dag kyang the tsom dang skur pa mi 'debs te/_sems 
[\[269a.4\]]la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ring du zhugs so/_/bar bar ni[(]rkyag [,]skyag [)] pa za gcin 'thung yang sha chang dang mtshungs so/_/de dag thams cad stong par ro gcig ces nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang 'dul ba bshig go/_/gcig tu ma nges pa'i mi dag sdig nang du yang btsud de/_de ni 
[\[269a.5\]]yang dag pa'i gral stor nas gol ba'i log par ltung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin gyi nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni zhi/_tshor ba'i phung po ni gsal shing byang ba las 'das shing stong par snang ba'i sems 'dus pa'i nang du zab tu zhen pas/_yud tsam zhig dpag 
[\[269a.6\]]tu med pa'i srid pa'i sems skyes nas/_srid pa'i mthar phyin pas smyos su cha ste/_nyid du g.yem pa spyod do/_/de'i ming ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ltas bde bar bgrod pa sems kyi nang du zhen te/_shes rab med pas rang la skyabs med de/_mi dag kyang g.yem pa spyod du btsud 
[\[269a.7\]]do/_/de la tshor na ni nyes med de/_'phags par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de la 'phags pa tsam du sems na 'dod chags kyi bdud sems kyi khong du zhugs te/_'dod chags kyi phyogs ni byang chub kyi lam yin par ston te/_khyim bdag dang mtshungs par g.yem 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]par spyod cig_/g.yem par spyod pa de ni chos kyi bu 'dzin pa yin no zhes ston to/_/lha ma yin gyi stobs kyis phyi ma'i dus na ma rabs glen pa'i grangs ni brgya'am/_de bzhin du nyis brgya'am/_sum brgya'am/_bzhi brgya'am/_lnga brgya'am/_drug brgya'am/_
[\[269b.2\]]mang po stong khri'i bar dag la yang ston te/_de nas yang mi de la bdud skyo zhing chog pa'i sems skyes nas/_lus las bral ba dang /_gzi brjid med par gyur nas rgyal po'i gyod la thogs so/_/sems can dag the tsom bskur te/_mtshams med pa'i sems can 
[\[269b.3\]]dmyal bar ltung bar byed do/_/de rnam pa bcu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi snga ltas yin te/_'di kun ni tshor ba'i phung po yin no/_/de dag ni sgom pa nor ba las de'i phyir 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te/_pho theg can gyi skye bo rnams la bslang nas/_bdag rang gi nyams drod ma zin te/_rgyu 
[\[269b.4\]]rkyen de lta bu dang phrad nas 'khrul pa rang gis ma shes te/_bdag la 'phags pa'o snyam du sems pa de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]chen por 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/khyed la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' le te nga 'das pa'i phyir na 
[\[269b.5\]]sems can thams cad la khyad par man ngag gzhag cing 'di'i don ston to/_/tshor bar gyis shig_/lha'i bdud kyis skabs mi rnyed par gzungs su bzung ste/_gdams shing bsrungs na bla na med pa'i lam 'grub bo/_/dga' bo rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 
[\[269b.6\]]bsgoms pas tshor ba'i phung po zad nas zag pa ma zad mod kyi/_sems lus dang bral ma thag tu bya skon pa nas phyung ba dang mtshungs te/_de lta bu 'byor grub na ma rabs kyi lus las bla ma'i byang chub kyi 'phags pa'i gral drug cu'i bar du yid kyi lus thob ste/_
[\[269b.7\]]'gro ba dang 'ong ba la thogs pa med do/_/dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa las ma sad par rmi la [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin smra mod kyi/_de'i don rang gis mi shes kyang /_su dag ma log pa'i de'i sa ni tshig kun go ste/_de'i ming ni 'du shes kyi phung pos bsgribs 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa'o/_/g.yo ba'i mtshan ma de zad na spros pa kun zhi zhing byang ste tshor zhing gsal bas sems kyi dri ma'i gos pa phyis pa dang mtshungs so/_/'khor ba gcig pu'i skye shi'i mgo mjug tu khyab par bltas na/_de'i ming ni 'du shes kyi phung po zad pas de ni
